MESSAGE.JP: 放課後。
MESSAGE.EN: After school.
MESSAGE.Translation: After school.

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長室へ足を向ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I walked toward the dorm heads' room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I walked toward the dorm heads' room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（二木さん？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Futaki-san?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Futaki-san?)

MESSAGE.JP: 足を止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I halted.
MESSAGE.Translation: I halted.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…いまさら、何を？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...after all this time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...after all this time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「二木の家に連絡が入ったそうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝It seems someone has informed the Futakis.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝It seems someone has informed the Futakis.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…叔父さまたちが来るのかしらね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I wonder if the uncles are coming.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I wonder if the uncles are coming.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「あなた自身のミスです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝It's your own mistake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝It's your own mistake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「あらぬ疑いを掛けられたら…どうなるか、わかっていますね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝To have doubts on you... you know what will happen, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝To have doubts on you... you know what will happen, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…お役目ご苦労なことね、本当に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...You are playing your role well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...You are playing your role well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「楽しい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Are you enjoying it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Are you enjoying it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「…好きでやっているとでも？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝...You think I'm doing this because I like it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝...You think I'm doing this because I like it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…そうね。あなたには感謝してる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Right. I should be grateful to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Right. I should be grateful to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「３人部屋を抜けることも黙認してくれて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You let me leave the triple room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You let me leave the triple room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「お互い様ですよ。あなたたち姉妹と一緒では」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝No need to thank me. I hated living with you two...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝No need to thank me. I hated living with you two...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「せっかく自由なのに、つまらなかったので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝That was so pointless after finally achieving freedom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝That was so pointless after finally achieving freedom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「四六時中喧嘩ばかり。そんなギスギスした部屋にいたのですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝You were fighting all the time. The air was always heavy in that room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝You were fighting all the time. The air was always heavy in that room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…迷惑を掛けたわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I've caused you trouble, haven't I.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I've caused you trouble, haven't I.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「もう過ぎたことですけどね…どうするんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝It's already done... but what are you going to do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝It's already done... but what are you going to do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「葉留佳さんと仲良くしている姿は…見せられませんよ、あのひとたちには」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝You can't let them see you being friendly with Haruka-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝You can't let them see you being friendly with Haruka-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ここのところはずっと報告してなかったらしいじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Haven't you been reporting everything this whole time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Haven't you been reporting everything this whole time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「あそこは空気が薄いから、耳が遠いのでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝They are pretty far away, so it may be a while before they get word.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝They are pretty far away, so it may be a while before they get word.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…そうかもね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Maybe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Maybe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「けれど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝However.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝However.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「私もお役目おしまいのようです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝It seems my role is over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝It seems my role is over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「短い間でしたが、ありがとうございました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝It was a short time, but thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝It was a short time, but thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「…そうそう。佳奈多さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝...Right right. Kanata-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝...Right right. Kanata-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「『相手』が用意されているようです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝It seems the ❛partner❜ has been selected.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝It seems the ❛partner❜ has been selected.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…そう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「驚かないのですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝You don't seem surprised.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝You don't seem surprised.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それが当初の約束だった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That was the promise in the first place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That was the promise in the first place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「葉留佳さんはこのことを…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝Does Haruka-san know anything...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝Does Haruka-san know anything...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「妹は知らないわ。知る必要もない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝She does not. And has no need to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝She does not. And has no need to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「…そうですか。そう仰るなら仕方ない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝...Is that so? Fair enough if you say so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝...Is that so? Fair enough if you say so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「私は三枝の家の人間ですが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝I'm from the Saigusa family, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝I'm from the Saigusa family, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「私自身も、私の両親たちも…あなたには期待していたんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝My parents and myself... we all had expectations of you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝My parents and myself... we all had expectations of you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「葉留佳さんには、わかってもらえませんでしたが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝I couldn't get Haruka-san to understand...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝I couldn't get Haruka-san to understand...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…あの子には敵が必要だったのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...That girl needed an enemy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...That girl needed an enemy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「でしょうね。馬鹿らしいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝Right. Isn't that silly?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝Right. Isn't that silly?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「本当に、馬鹿らしいです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝Really, it's stupid...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝Really, it's stupid...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたの転校先に葉留佳が行くかもしれないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It's possible that Haruka-san will go to the same school you transfer to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It's possible that Haruka-san will go to the same school you transfer to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そうしたら、友達になってあげて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝If that happens, please become her friend.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝If that happens, please become her friend.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「色々うるさいけど…優しい子なの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝She's noisy... but she is a kind girl.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝She's noisy... but she is a kind girl.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「恐がりで…弱くて泣き虫だから。見かけたら、声を掛けてくれない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Easily scared... weak and a crybaby. If you see her, won't you call out to her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Easily scared... weak and a crybaby. If you see her, won't you call out to her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「…あなたは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝...You are...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝...You are...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「…ほんとうに…いえ…なんでもありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝...Really... no... it's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝...Really... no... it's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子@「では」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝Well then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝Well then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女は一礼して去っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: The girl bowed and left.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girl bowed and left.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんのルームメイト…だった子か？
MESSAGE.EN: Was she Futaki-san's roommate?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was she Futaki-san's roommate?

MESSAGE.JP: 会話を聞くとそれらしいが。
MESSAGE.EN: The conversation seemed to indicate that.
MESSAGE.Translation: The conversation seemed to indicate that.

MESSAGE.JP: 心なしか、肩を落としている二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san let her shoulders drop listlessly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san let her shoulders drop listlessly.

MESSAGE.JP: 声を掛けようとした僕。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought about calling out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought about calling out.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nn?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nn?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 背中をちょんちょん、と突かれて振り返った。
MESSAGE.EN: My back was being poked, and I turned to look back.
MESSAGE.Translation: My back was being poked, and I turned to look back.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やは、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ya, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ya, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 元気のない葉留佳さんが目の前にいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san didn't look very energetic.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san didn't look very energetic.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…葉留佳さん、今の会話…聞いてた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Haruka-san, did you hear that conversation just now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Haruka-san, did you hear that conversation just now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん…もう…その話は知ってるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yeah... well... I already knew that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yeah... well... I already knew that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小さく頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded slightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded slightly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…さっきの子は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...The girl earlier...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...The girl earlier...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私たちの監視役の子」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She is our monitor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She is our monitor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いとこのはとこ、だったかなぁ…よくしらないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She is my second cousin, I think... well, something like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She is my second cousin, I think... well, something like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「監視、って誰に監視されてるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You said monitor, for who?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You said monitor, for who?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私たちの法的保護者だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Our legal guardian.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Our legal guardian.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…あの子の目があるからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Since she was monitored.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Since she was monitored.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おねえちゃんは自省を強いられていた、というわけなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan had to be careful of her conduct.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan had to be careful of her conduct.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「常に優秀で、品行方正でなければならなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She must always be an upright, outstanding person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She must always be an upright, outstanding person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…私と仲良くすることもできなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...She can't even befriend me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...She can't even befriend me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そうだったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Is that so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Is that so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私は元々待遇が悪くて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I've always been treated poorly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I've always been treated poorly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どーにでもなれーって感じだったけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I just didn't care.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I just didn't care.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おねえちゃんや周りの迷惑も顧みない、馬鹿な行為だったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It was stupid of me, not thinking how I caused trouble to Onee-chan and everyone else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It was stupid of me, not thinking how I caused trouble to Onee-chan and everyone else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「反省してるんだよ、色々なこと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm sorry about all the things I've done...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm sorry about all the things I've done...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは二木さんの後ろ姿をじっと見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was intently looking at Futaki-san from behind.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was intently looking at Futaki-san from behind.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、『相手』って何のことか知ってる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, do you know what ❛partner❜ referred to?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, do you know what ❛partner❜ referred to?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…多分、おねえちゃんの結婚相手のことじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...It's probably Onee-chan's fiancee.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...It's probably Onee-chan's fiancee.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「結婚!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's getting married!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's getting married!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おねえちゃんは実家の跡継ぎだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Since she is the heiress of the main family.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Since she is the heiress of the main family.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…でも、もっと先のことだと思ってた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...However, I didn't think it'd be this early...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...However, I didn't think it'd be this early...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは目を伏せた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san cast her eyes down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san cast her eyes down.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「事情、知ってるんだね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you know the situation?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you know the situation?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…『私がかわいそうだから』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...❛Because I'm pitiful.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...❛Because I'm pitiful.❜❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だから、ここに連れてきたんだと思ってたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I thought that's why I was taken here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I thought that's why I was taken here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも、違うみたい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But that seems to be wrong...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But that seems to be wrong...❞

MESSAGE.JP: おかあさんたちが言うにはね、と葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Mother and everyone said that, Haruka-san whispered.
MESSAGE.Translation: Mother and everyone said that, Haruka-san whispered.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「かなたは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Kanata...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Kanata...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私の身代わりになったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She became my replacement.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She became my replacement.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…私…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…なにしてるんだろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...what am I doing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...what am I doing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 俯いて葉留佳さんは語ってくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san spoke while hanging her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san spoke while hanging her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 複雑な家の事情を。
MESSAGE.EN: A complicated family situation.
MESSAGE.Translation: A complicated family situation.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりの確執と和解の話を。
MESSAGE.EN: Their falling out and reconciliation.
MESSAGE.Translation: Their falling out and reconciliation.

MESSAGE.JP: 長い話だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a long story.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a long story.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんと…二木さんは、生まれたところが悪かった。
MESSAGE.EN: But if I had to sum it up...
MESSAGE.Translation: But if I had to sum it up...

MESSAGE.JP: 要約してしまえば、それだけの話だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san and Futaki-san were born in a horrible place.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san and Futaki-san were born in a horrible place.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…私は、家のことなんかどうでもよかったの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I didn't really care about my family.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I didn't really care about my family.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おねえちゃんと仲直りしたかったの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wanted to make up with Onee-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wanted to make up with Onee-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「こんなことでもない限りは、ずっと失われてたはずの機会だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I never thought I'd get this chance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I never thought I'd get this chance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「願ったのはそれだけ…ほんとうに、それだけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I only wished for that... really, just that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I only wished for that... really, just that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…家の連中のことはね、いいの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Everyone else in the family doesn't matter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Everyone else in the family doesn't matter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「最初から、望んじゃいなかったんだ、家のことなんか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I didn't wish for a family in the first place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I didn't wish for a family in the first place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だって、ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Since, you know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Since, you know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うらみを晴らしたいわけじゃなかったし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I didn't want to let go of my resentment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I didn't want to let go of my resentment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私は私自身ひとりなのが、さみしくて苦しかっただけなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I was lonely and suffering by myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I was lonely and suffering by myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私は、いていい居場所が欲しかったんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wanted a place where I belong...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wanted a place where I belong...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私だけが不幸だとは、もう思いこんでないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't think I am the only unfortunate one anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't think I am the only unfortunate one anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「誰かのせいにもしたくないよ。誰が悪いとも、思ってない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't want to blame anyone. It's nobody's fault.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't want to blame anyone. It's nobody's fault.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私は、何があっても、私なんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No matter what happens, I am myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No matter what happens, I am myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私は私でいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm okay being myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm okay being myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それを教えてくれたひとがいたからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Someone taught me that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Someone taught me that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「教えてくれたひと？　誰？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Someone taught you that? Who?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Someone taught you that? Who?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはうっすら微笑んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san smiled gently.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san smiled gently.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…とても優しいひとだったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Someone very kind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Someone very kind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうしようもない私を好いてくれた優しい人…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Someone kind enough to like the useless me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Someone kind enough to like the useless me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あんまり優しいから、一度だけで満足しちゃったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝They were much too kind, so that one time was enough for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝They were much too kind, so that one time was enough for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「その奇跡みたいな一度だけの優しさで、満足しちゃったんだ、私…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That single miracle-like moment of kindness... That was enough for me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That single miracle-like moment of kindness... That was enough for me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ささやくように呟かれた言葉。
MESSAGE.EN: The faintly muttered words.
MESSAGE.Translation: The faintly muttered words.

MESSAGE.JP: どきり、とした。
MESSAGE.EN: I was shocked.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was shocked.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは『いつもみたいじゃない』笑顔をしているように思えて。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san's smile was somehow ❛different from usual.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san's smile was somehow ❛different from usual.❜

MESSAGE.JP: どうしてかわからないけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't understand why.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't understand why.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そのひとががんばれって言ってくれたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That person told me to try my best.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That person told me to try my best.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私、がんばってもいいかな、って思ったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I, for once, thought that maybe I should try.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I, for once, thought that maybe I should try.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…それなのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Despite all of that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Despite all of that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私の代わりにおねえちゃんが独りになっちゃ意味がないじゃん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's meaningless if Onee-chan becomes lonely in my place...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's meaningless if Onee-chan becomes lonely in my place...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…全然意味がないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...It's completely meaningless...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...It's completely meaningless...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが元気がなかった理由。
MESSAGE.EN: The reason Haruka-san had been down lately.
MESSAGE.Translation: The reason Haruka-san had been down lately.

MESSAGE.JP: 無力感が葉留佳さんに覆いかぶさっていたのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She had been overwhelmed by her feeling of helplessness.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had been overwhelmed by her feeling of helplessness.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私、ほんと役立たずな子だなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I am really a good-for-nothing kid..❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I am really a good-for-nothing kid..❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そんなことないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...That's not true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...That's not true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…二木さん、葉留佳さんの話をするとき、いつもと違った感じだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...When Futaki-san talks about you, she feels different.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...When Futaki-san talks about you, she feels different.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そもそも僕や周りのひとたちに対する態度も和らいだ気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: Actually, she has become much friendlier to me and everyone else.
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually, she has become much friendlier to me and everyone else.

MESSAGE.JP: その理由はなんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder what changed her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder what changed her.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そう、なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Is that so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Is that so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…多分…葉留佳さんが、がんばって二木さんに話しかけてたからじゃないのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... probably... maybe it's because you tried so hard to talk to her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... probably... maybe it's because you tried so hard to talk to her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんはそれが嬉しかったんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san was happy about that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san was happy about that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そう、なのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Is, is that so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Is, is that so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だとしたら、嬉しいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm happy to hear that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm happy to hear that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…がんばっておねえちゃんともっと話してみる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I'll try and speak to Onee-chan more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I'll try and speak to Onee-chan more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、それがいいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I think that's great.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I think that's great.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうだね。いつか得た強さを…失わないためにもがんばらないとね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's right. I can't lose this strength... that I was given.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's right. I can't lose this strength... that I was given.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ありがと、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Thanks, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Thanks, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「『理樹くんは優しいな』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝❛Riki-kun sure is kind.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝❛Riki-kun sure is kind.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やっぱり、優しいな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Really, you are kind...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Really, you are kind...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう呟く葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san mutters.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san mutters.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんも、おねえちゃんと話してあげてほしいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, try to talk to Onee-chan as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, try to talk to Onee-chan as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私と同じように…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Like you did to me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Like you did to me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ううん、なんでもない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No, it's nothing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No, it's nothing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あの通りの性格だけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You know how she is, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You know how she is, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おねえちゃんのこと、好いてあげてほしいの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Please try to find it in yourself to like Onee-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Please try to find it in yourself to like Onee-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「嫌わないであげてほしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Please don't hate her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Please don't hate her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「嫌われて平気なひとなんかいないからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There is nobody who can live normally being hated.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There is nobody who can live normally being hated.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「誰かに好かれることって、すごく素敵なことだからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Being liked by someone is a wonderful thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Being liked by someone is a wonderful thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今、辛いのはおねえちゃんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Right now, Onee-chan is the one suffering.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Right now, Onee-chan is the one suffering.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うん。わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah, I got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah, I got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃ、行くね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ばいばい、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Bye-bye, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Bye-bye, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは階段を下りていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san descended the staircase.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san descended the staircase.

MESSAGE.JP: 女子寮へ向かったのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She headed toward the girls' dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: She headed toward the girls' dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はそれを見送ったのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I watched her go.
MESSAGE.Translation: I watched her go.

MESSAGE.JP: はるかとは二週間ごとに会っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I meet Haruka once every two weeks.
MESSAGE.Translation: I meet Haruka once every two weeks.

MESSAGE.JP: どうして一緒にいられないのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Why can't we be together?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why can't we be together?

MESSAGE.JP: どうして他の子たちみたいに『おとうさん』や『おかあさん』がいないのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Why can't we have a ❛mom❜ and ❛dad❜ like all the other kids?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why can't we have a ❛mom❜ and ❛dad❜ like all the other kids?

MESSAGE.JP: くらべあいをさせられるのはどうしてか。
MESSAGE.EN: Why is it that we are being compared to others?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why is it that we are being compared to others?

MESSAGE.JP: わたしにはわからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't understand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't understand.

MESSAGE.JP: はるかにも、わからなかったと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I think Haruka didn't, either.
MESSAGE.Translation: I think Haruka didn't, either.

MESSAGE.JP: 『佳奈多、よく頑張ったね』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Kanata, you did well.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Kanata, you did well.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ありがとう、おじさま」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Thank you, Uncle.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Thank you, Uncle.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 教えられているように、スカートのすそをつまんでおじぎをする。
MESSAGE.EN: As I was taught, I held my skirt's hem and bowed.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I was taught, I held my skirt's hem and bowed.

MESSAGE.JP: いつもはこわいおじさまも、わたしが勝つとやさしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though he was normally scary, he'd mellow when I won.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though he was normally scary, he'd mellow when I won.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日はごほうびをくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: I got a reward today.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got a reward today.

MESSAGE.JP: 手にするととても重たい。
MESSAGE.EN: It was really heavy.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was really heavy.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「なんだろう…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝What is this...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝What is this...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「わぁーっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Waa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Waa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: きらきらと光るとてもきれいなビー玉。
MESSAGE.EN: Shiny, sparkling marbles.
MESSAGE.Translation: Shiny, sparkling marbles.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「すごーい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Woow!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Woow!❞

MESSAGE.JP: いろいろな色が、袋の中に入っている。
MESSAGE.EN: There were different colored ones in the pouch.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were different colored ones in the pouch.

MESSAGE.JP: それで遊んでいなさい、とおとなたちは言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Play with that, said the adults.
MESSAGE.Translation: Play with that, said the adults.

MESSAGE.JP: いつものお話し合い。
MESSAGE.EN: Same as always.
MESSAGE.Translation: Same as always.

MESSAGE.JP: わたしは、はなれのへやへ行く。
MESSAGE.EN: I went to an empty room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went to an empty room.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「いくつあるのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I wonder how many there are.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I wonder how many there are.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 畳の上に、ビー玉を広げる。
MESSAGE.EN: I spread them out on the tatami mat.
MESSAGE.Translation: I spread them out on the tatami mat.

MESSAGE.JP: たくさんある。
MESSAGE.EN: There were a lot.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were a lot.

MESSAGE.JP: あお、あか、むらさき、みどり、きいろ。
MESSAGE.EN: Blue, red, purple, green, yellow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Blue, red, purple, green, yellow.

MESSAGE.JP: かたん、と音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: Then, I heard a clatter.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then, I heard a clatter.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はるか！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Haruka!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Haruka!❞

MESSAGE.JP: しょうじに手を当てたはるかが立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka stood there with her hand on the sliding door.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka stood there with her hand on the sliding door.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「どうしたの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝What's the matter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝What's the matter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…なんでもない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...It's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...It's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「うん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: はるかは、部屋に入ってくると、わたしから離れて座った。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka entered the room and sat away from me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka entered the room and sat away from me.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Haruka?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Haruka?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 体操座りをしたまま、じっとわたしを見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: She sat down like during gymnastics and stared fixedly at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sat down like during gymnastics and stared fixedly at me.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…なんでもない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今日は通知表の中をみんなの前で読まれた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was made to read out my report card in front of everyone today.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was made to read out my report card in front of everyone today.

MESSAGE.JP: なんかい読まれてもはずかしい。ごかいめぐらいだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: It's still embarrassing, no matter how many times I do it. I think I had to do it five times.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's still embarrassing, no matter how many times I do it. I think I had to do it five times.

MESSAGE.JP: それでもはずかしかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so, it was difficult.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so, it was difficult.

MESSAGE.JP: はるかも、おなじきぶんなのかな。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe Haruka also felt the same.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe Haruka also felt the same.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「三枝のおじさまに怒られたんでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Were the Saigusas mad at you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Were the Saigusas mad at you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「さんがっき、がんばればいいよ。ほら、あそぼう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝It's fine if you try harder in the third term. Come on, let's play.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝It's fine if you try harder in the third term. Come on, let's play.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はーるかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Ha-ruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Ha-ruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「おいで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Come here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Come here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わたしたちはふたごだけれど、おねえさんなのは自分だとしっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: We were twins, but I was told I am the older sister.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were twins, but I was told I am the older sister.

MESSAGE.JP: おじさまたちもそう言うから、そうなのだろうとおもっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Since everyone said so, I honestly believed that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since everyone said so, I honestly believed that.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、はるかがげんきないときは、わたしがしんぱいしなくちゃ。
MESSAGE.EN: Therefore, I had a responsibility to take care of Haruka.
MESSAGE.Translation: Therefore, I had a responsibility to take care of Haruka.

MESSAGE.JP: いもうとのことをしんぱいするおねえさんは、よいおねえさん。
MESSAGE.EN: A good older sister should be worrying about her younger sister.
MESSAGE.Translation: A good older sister should be worrying about her younger sister.

MESSAGE.JP: いつか見たえほんのおねえさんみたいに、わたしは、よいおねえさんになるのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to become a good older sister, like the one in a picture book I saw.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to become a good older sister, like the one in a picture book I saw.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はるかが動かないので、わたしはビー玉をいくつか持って近くに行った。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka wasn't moving, so I scooted over with the marbles.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka wasn't moving, so I scooted over with the marbles.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「きれいでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Aren't they pretty?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Aren't they pretty?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「いっしょにあそぼうよ。ね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Let's play together, alright?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Let's play together, alright?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: うなずいて、かすかに笑うはるか。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded and smiled weakly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded and smiled weakly.

MESSAGE.JP: はるかは、たいそうすわりのまま、だまってゆびさきでビー玉を転がしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka, still sitting in the same posture, silently rolled a marble between her fingers.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka, still sitting in the same posture, silently rolled a marble between her fingers.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…きれいだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...They're beautiful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...They're beautiful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「二木のおじさまからもらったんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I got this from one of the Futaki's.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I got this from one of the Futaki's.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ふーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はるかは？　はるかはなにかもらったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝How about you?　Did you get anything?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝How about you?　Did you get anything?❞

MESSAGE.JP: はるかはだまってあたまをふった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka quietly shook her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka quietly shook her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「そう、なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Is that... so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Is that... so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「かなたにまけたから、しょうがないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It can't be helped, since I lose to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It can't be helped, since I lose to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「まけたこは、ごほうびなしなの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The losing child doesn't get any rewards.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The losing child doesn't get any rewards.❞

MESSAGE.JP: せみの声がする。
MESSAGE.EN: The cicadas were crying.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cicadas were crying.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…じゃあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Well then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Well then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: きまずい空気をふきとばすように、わたしは言った。
MESSAGE.EN: I said, as if to expel the awkward atmosphere.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said, as if to expel the awkward atmosphere.

MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はるかにはんぶんあげる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I will give you half of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I will give you half of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「え…い、いいよ、ほしくないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eh... i-it's fine. I don't really want them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh... i-it's fine. I don't really want them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「たくさんあるから、だいじょうぶだいじょうぶ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝It's fine, it's fine. There are a lot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝It's fine, it's fine. There are a lot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ほら、あげる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Here, take these.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Here, take these.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手の中にいっぱいのビー玉。
MESSAGE.EN: I held out the marbles in my hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: I held out the marbles in my hands.

MESSAGE.JP: こんなにたくさんあるのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There were so many of them.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were so many of them.

MESSAGE.JP: 半分あげても、まだいっぱいあるんだから。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if I gave away half of them, there would still be a lot left.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if I gave away half of them, there would still be a lot left.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いらないっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't need them!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't need them!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「あっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はるかがわたしの手を払った。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka slapped away my hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka slapped away my hands.

MESSAGE.JP: じゃらじゃら、と音を立ててビー玉がおちる。
MESSAGE.EN: Jingling, jingling. The marbles fell down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Jingling, jingling. The marbles fell down.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いらない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't need them...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't need them...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はるか…いいんだよ、ほんとうに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Haruka... it's alright, I mean it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Haruka... it's alright, I mean it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「あげるから、きにしなくても」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I'll give them to you, so don't be so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I'll give them to you, so don't be so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それは、かなたがもらったものだもん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Those are Kanata's.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Those are Kanata's.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「わたしのじゃないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝They are not mine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝They are not mine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いらない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't need them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't need them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はるか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Haruka...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Haruka...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「かなたがもってなよ…わたし、いらないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You should keep them, Kanata... I don't need them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You should keep them, Kanata... I don't need them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「かなたのものを、わたし、ほしがらないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't want your things.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't want your things.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「きゅうに…どうしたの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝What's wrong... all of a sudden...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝What's wrong... all of a sudden...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: しんせきのひとたちの前で、いろいろさせられること。
MESSAGE.EN: I was made to do many things in front of our relatives.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was made to do many things in front of our relatives.

MESSAGE.JP: それは楽しかったことなんてないけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: They weren't fun at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: They weren't fun at all.

MESSAGE.JP: おわったあと、はるかとあそぶことを、わたしはすごく楽しみにしていたのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But when I was done, I could look forward to playing with Haruka.
MESSAGE.Translation: But when I was done, I could look forward to playing with Haruka.

MESSAGE.JP: あめやクッキーもふたりでわけたし。
MESSAGE.EN: Sharing sweets and cookies.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sharing sweets and cookies.

MESSAGE.JP: もらったものをつぎに会うときにかえっこしたりしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: And exchanging what we got the next time we met.
MESSAGE.Translation: And exchanging what we got the next time we met.

MESSAGE.JP: はるかはどうしてかそれをはじめはいやがる。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka was somewhat unhappy about it at first.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka was somewhat unhappy about it at first.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、けっきょくうけとる。
MESSAGE.EN: But she eventually relented.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she eventually relented.

MESSAGE.JP: りゆうは、わからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't really understand why.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't really understand why.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「どうしたの、はるか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝What's wrong, Haruka...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝What's wrong, Haruka...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いらないから。いらない。いらないのっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I just don't want it. I really don't want it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I just don't want it. I really don't want it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: パン。
MESSAGE.EN: Slap.
MESSAGE.Translation: Slap.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 伸ばしたわたしの手を、はるかが払う。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka brushed my hands away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka brushed my hands away.

MESSAGE.JP: わたしはこまった。
MESSAGE.EN: That put me at a loss for words.
MESSAGE.Translation: That put me at a loss for words.

MESSAGE.JP: 畳のうえに広がったビー玉。
MESSAGE.EN: The marbles fell all over the tatami mat.
MESSAGE.Translation: The marbles fell all over the tatami mat.

MESSAGE.JP: たいようできれいに光っている。
MESSAGE.EN: They shone brightly under the sunlight.
MESSAGE.Translation: They shone brightly under the sunlight.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、今はそのきれいさがへった気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: However, I felt they were no longer as beautiful as before.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, I felt they were no longer as beautiful as before.

MESSAGE.JP: どうしてかわからないけれど、
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't explain why, but...
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't explain why, but...

MESSAGE.JP: それから、とてもかなしくなった。
MESSAGE.EN: That was very sad.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was very sad.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…わたしがもらったものだから、はるかがもってちゃいけないっていうの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Since it's something I got, you can't have it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Since it's something I got, you can't have it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: はるかは何度もうなずく。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka nodded many times.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka nodded many times.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「でも、わたしがあげるっていってるんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝But I am giving this to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝But I am giving this to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うつむいたまま、頭をふるはるか。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka shook her head, still wordless.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka shook her head, still wordless.

MESSAGE.JP: わたしはためいきをついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I sighed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sighed.

MESSAGE.JP: どうしたら、いいのかな。
MESSAGE.EN: What should I do now?
MESSAGE.Translation: What should I do now?

MESSAGE.JP: はるかは、ときどきよくわからないことをする。
MESSAGE.EN: Sometimes, I just can't understand how Haruka thinks.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sometimes, I just can't understand how Haruka thinks.

MESSAGE.JP: さみしそうだから、てをつないであげたら、おこったり。
MESSAGE.EN: When I held my hands out to her because she looked lonely, she would get mad.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I held my hands out to her because she looked lonely, she would get mad.

MESSAGE.JP: あたまなでてあげようとしたら、ないていやがったり。
MESSAGE.EN: She would cry when I tried to pat her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She would cry when I tried to pat her head.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、わたしがやめようとすると、とてもかなしそうなかおをするのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: However, when I stopped, she would make a very sad face.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, when I stopped, she would make a very sad face.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はるかは、ごうじょうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Haruka, you sure are stubborn.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Haruka, you sure are stubborn.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…じゃ、あげるのやーめたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...I won't give them to you anymore then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...I won't give them to you anymore then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: だから、わたしは『いつもみたいに』した。
MESSAGE.EN: So I did ❛the usual thing.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: So I did ❛the usual thing.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝?❞

MESSAGE.JP: かおをあげたはるか。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka lifted her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka lifted her face.

MESSAGE.JP: なんでそんなかお、するの？
MESSAGE.EN: Why are you making that face?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why are you making that face?

MESSAGE.JP: ほしいなら、あげるのに。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd have given you the marbles if you wanted.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd have given you the marbles if you wanted.

MESSAGE.JP: なきそうな、かお、して。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked as she was going to cry.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked as she was going to cry.

MESSAGE.JP: 全部あげたっていいんだよ。
MESSAGE.EN: I can give her all of them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can give her all of them.

MESSAGE.JP: はるかになら、全部あげてもいい。
MESSAGE.EN: For Haruka, I wouldn't mind giving her all of them.
MESSAGE.Translation: For Haruka, I wouldn't mind giving her all of them.

MESSAGE.JP: ほかにはなにもいらない。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't need anything else.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't need anything else.

MESSAGE.JP: はるかがいてくれさえ、すれば。
MESSAGE.EN: As long as Haruka is there.
MESSAGE.Translation: As long as Haruka is there.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…でもそれだと、はるかがかわいそうだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...But I don't want you to be sad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...But I don't want you to be sad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「いっこだけ、はるかに貸してあげる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝So I will lend you this single marble.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝So I will lend you this single marble.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わたしは『いつもみたいに』いじわるないいかたをする。
MESSAGE.EN: I teased her ❛as usual.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I teased her ❛as usual.❜

MESSAGE.JP: そうすると、はるかは、もっとかなしそうになる。
MESSAGE.EN: If I did that, Haruka would become sadder.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I did that, Haruka would become sadder.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「わたしが返して、っていったらすぐ返すんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝You have to return it right away if I say so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝You have to return it right away if I say so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「あげないからね。貸すだけだから。わたしのものだから、はるかにはあげない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I'm not giving it to you, just lending. Since it's mine, I won't give it to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I'm not giving it to you, just lending. Since it's mine, I won't give it to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はるかのめに、なみだがたまっている。
MESSAGE.EN: I held back my tears for Haruka's sake.
MESSAGE.Translation: I held back my tears for Haruka's sake.

MESSAGE.JP: さっきまで、あげるって言ったわたしが『いじわる』するから、こんらんしているのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was bewildered. I first told her I'd give her the marbles but now was ❛teasing❜ her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was bewildered. I first told her I'd give her the marbles but now was ❛teasing❜ her.

MESSAGE.JP: ごめんね、はるか。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sorry, Haruka.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sorry, Haruka.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、こうしたらうけとってくれるよね。
MESSAGE.EN: But you will take it if I do this, right?
MESSAGE.Translation: But you will take it if I do this, right?

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「けど、いじっぱりなはるかには、いっこだけ、貸してあげる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Because you're so stubborn, I will lend you only one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Because you're so stubborn, I will lend you only one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…どの色でもすきなの、貸してあげる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Pick a color, I will lend it to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Pick a color, I will lend it to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: おどおどしながら、はるかはわたしとビー玉をみくらべる。
MESSAGE.EN: Hesitantly, Haruka looked over my marbles.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hesitantly, Haruka looked over my marbles.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いっこ、だけ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Only, one...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Only, one...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「どれがいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Which one you want?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Which one you want?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ほら、早くえらんで。早くしないと、かたづけちゃうよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Come on, pick one already. If you are slow, I will put them away, you know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Come on, pick one already. If you are slow, I will put them away, you know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: まよっているはるかをせかすように言った。
MESSAGE.EN: I spoke to hurry up the puzzled Haruka.
MESSAGE.Translation: I spoke to hurry up the puzzled Haruka.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ま、まってよ、かなたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...W-wait, Kanata.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...W-wait, Kanata.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いま、きめるからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'll pick one now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'll pick one now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はるかは、たいそうすわりをやめて、ビー玉をみはじめた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka stood up and started looking at the marbles.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka stood up and started looking at the marbles.

MESSAGE.JP: わたしはうれしかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was happy.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだ、やっぱり、ほしかったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She really did want some, after all.
MESSAGE.Translation: She really did want some, after all.

MESSAGE.JP: 本当にいじっぱりだなぁ、はるかは。
MESSAGE.EN: She really was obstinate, that Haruka.
MESSAGE.Translation: She really was obstinate, that Haruka.

MESSAGE.JP: いっこずつ、貸してあげればいい。そのうち半分こにできるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Just lending her one at a time, I should be able to give her half of them eventually.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just lending her one at a time, I should be able to give her half of them eventually.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「この色はどうかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝How about this color?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝How about this color?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「みどり色はきらいだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I hate green...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I hate green...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「なんで？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Why?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…おいしく…ないし…どろみずおもいだすから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...It's... yucky... it reminds me of muddy water...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...It's... yucky... it reminds me of muddy water...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「すききらいしてるの？　だめだよ、はるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Being picky? That's no good, Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Being picky? That's no good, Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: やさいがきらいなのかな。残したりしてるのかも。
MESSAGE.EN: Does she hate vegetables? She might be leaving them at meals.
MESSAGE.Translation: Does she hate vegetables? She might be leaving them at meals.

MESSAGE.JP: どろみずってなんだろ？
MESSAGE.EN: What was that about ❛muddy water❜?
MESSAGE.Translation: What was that about ❛muddy water❜?

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「これはどう？　わたし、きれいだとおもうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝How about this? I think it's beautiful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝How about this? I think it's beautiful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あかとむらさきがまじったビー玉。
MESSAGE.EN: I showed her a marble of red and purple.
MESSAGE.Translation: I showed her a marble of red and purple.

MESSAGE.JP: 少し他のよりおおきいので、よけいにきれいなビー玉。
MESSAGE.EN: It was slightly bigger than the other marbles, making it all the more beautiful.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was slightly bigger than the other marbles, making it all the more beautiful.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん。わたしもそうおもう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yeah, I think so too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yeah, I think so too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「じゃこれ、貸してあげる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I'll lend it to you then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I'll lend it to you then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そっとはるかの手のひらにのせた。
MESSAGE.EN: I gently placed it on her palm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gently placed it on her palm.

MESSAGE.JP: はるかはわたしの手を払わなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka didn't brush my hand away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka didn't brush my hand away.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「無くしちゃだめだよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝You must not lose it, got it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝You must not lose it, got it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: はるかの手をビー玉越しににぎる。
MESSAGE.EN: I tightly clasped my hands around hers that held the marble.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tightly clasped my hands around hers that held the marble.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぎこちなく、はるかがにぎりかえしてくれて、わたしはうれしかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka clumsily returned my grasp. I was happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka clumsily returned my grasp. I was happy.

MESSAGE.JP: はるかの手はいつもつめたくて、かさかさしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka's hands were always so cold and dry.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka's hands were always so cold and dry.

MESSAGE.JP: いつもよごれていた。
MESSAGE.EN: They were always dirty.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were always dirty.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「わかった…ありがと…おねえちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I know... thank you... Onee-chan...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I know... thank you... Onee-chan...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…貸すだけだからね。すぐ返して、っていうかもしれないんだからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...I am only lending it to you, so I may ask for it back right away, understand?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...I am only lending it to you, so I may ask for it back right away, understand?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん…わかってる。わかってるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah... I get it, I get it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah... I get it, I get it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ビー玉をにぎったまま、はるかが言う。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka answered while still clutching the marble tight.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka answered while still clutching the marble tight.

MESSAGE.JP: にぎっている間に、はるかの手があったかくなってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Her hands had gotten a bit warmer.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her hands had gotten a bit warmer.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ありがと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おねえちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わたしは、おねえちゃん、と口にするときの、はるかのえがおが、だいすきだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I loved Haruka's smile when she called me ❛Onee-chan.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I loved Haruka's smile when she called me ❛Onee-chan.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 目が覚めてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり葉留佳さんと二木さんのことを気にしているのだろうか、僕は。
MESSAGE.EN: I really am interested in Haruka and Futaki-san's situation.
MESSAGE.Translation: I really am interested in Haruka and Futaki-san's situation.

MESSAGE.JP: 制服を着ると、真人を起こさないようにそっと部屋を出た。
MESSAGE.EN: I put on my uniform and left the room, trying not to wake up Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put on my uniform and left the room, trying not to wake up Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 女子寮の前で、聞き慣れた声がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard a familiar voice in front of the girls' dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard a familiar voice in front of the girls' dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おねえちゃんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんと二木さんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Haruka-san and Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Haruka-san and Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「待ってよおねえちゃん！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Wait up, Onee-chan!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Wait up, Onee-chan!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 足早に校舎へと向かおうとする二木さんの手を掴む葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san gripped Futaki-san's hand, as she was hurrying to the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san gripped Futaki-san's hand, as she was hurrying to the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: ぱん、と音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: *Slap*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Slap*.

MESSAGE.JP: 手が振り払われた音。
MESSAGE.EN: The sound of a hand being slapped away.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sound of a hand being slapped away.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝?!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝?!❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 振り払った方も…振り払われた方も、ひどく辛そうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The one being brushed away... and the one brushing the hand away... they both looked pained.
MESSAGE.Translation: The one being brushed away... and the one brushing the hand away... they both looked pained.

MESSAGE.JP: 拒絶されたことも、拒絶したことも。
MESSAGE.EN: Both the one rejecting and the one being rejected.
MESSAGE.Translation: Both the one rejecting and the one being rejected.

MESSAGE.JP: こころが痛いのだろう、顔を歪めて、ふたりは身を震わせている。
MESSAGE.EN: As if reflecting the pain in their hearts, their faces twisted and their bodies quivered.
MESSAGE.Translation: As if reflecting the pain in their hearts, their faces twisted and their bodies quivered.

MESSAGE.JP: 見ていられなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't stand watching.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't stand watching.

MESSAGE.JP: 願っていることはきっと同じはずなのに、どうして上手くいかないんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: They both had the same wish, but that didn't bring them closer.
MESSAGE.Translation: They both had the same wish, but that didn't bring them closer.

MESSAGE.JP: 想いはひとつのはずなのに、どうしてすれ違ってしまうんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Their feelings were the same, yet they kept misunderstanding each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: Their feelings were the same, yet they kept misunderstanding each other.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…かなた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Kanata.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Kanata.❞

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、それでも。
MESSAGE.EN: Still,
MESSAGE.Translation: Still,

MESSAGE.JP: 拒絶されてもなお、葉留佳さんは目を逸らさなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka didn't avert her eyes even after being rejected.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka didn't avert her eyes even after being rejected.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんに呼びかける。
MESSAGE.EN: She called out to Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: She called out to Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: いつか得た強さ、と葉留佳さんは言った。
MESSAGE.EN: The strength Haruka-san said she gained.
MESSAGE.Translation: The strength Haruka-san said she gained.

MESSAGE.JP: だとしたら呼びかけるのは、その強さなのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: That act of calling out to her, it was probably that strength.
MESSAGE.Translation: That act of calling out to her, it was probably that strength.

MESSAGE.JP: 目を逸らしたのは二木さんのほうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The one who averted her eyes was Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: The one who averted her eyes was Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ねぇ、かなた。聞いてよ、かなた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey, Kanata. Listen to me, Kanata.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey, Kanata. Listen to me, Kanata.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「うるさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Stop that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Stop that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「かなた、かなた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Kanata, Kanata...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Kanata, Kanata...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…うるさいっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Shut up!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Shut up!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そんな甘ったれた声で私を呼ばないでっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Don't call my name like a spoiled child!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Don't call my name like a spoiled child!❞

MESSAGE.JP: その言葉に、葉留佳さんは言葉を失ったようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was silenced by that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was silenced by that.

MESSAGE.JP: 青ざめて立っている。
MESSAGE.EN: She stood there, pale.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stood there, pale.

MESSAGE.JP: そのまま校舎へと消える二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san disappeared into the school buildings.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san disappeared into the school buildings.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, what's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, what's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今日から一緒に教室へ行こうって言ったんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I was going to ask her to walk to the classroom together today, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I was going to ask her to walk to the classroom together today, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「怒られちゃった。あはは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She got mad at me. Ahaha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She got mad at me. Ahaha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「親戚たちがいつ来るかわからないからだろうけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She's probably afraid our relatives may come at any moment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She's probably afraid our relatives may come at any moment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「見られてもいいと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Personally I don't mind being seen with her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Personally I don't mind being seen with her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それなのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yet...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yet...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だめなのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Maybe that's no good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Maybe that's no good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やっぱり無理なのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I guess that's impossible after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I guess that's impossible after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなことないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's not true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's not true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんが、そう願うのなら、きっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you truly wish that, then I'm sure it'll work out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you truly wish that, then I'm sure it'll work out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「想いは通じるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Your feelings will get through.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Your feelings will get through.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そうだね。諦めちゃだめだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...That's right. I mustn't give up now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...That's right. I mustn't give up now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: よかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm glad.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm glad.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはあれだけ拒絶されても挫ける様子はないようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It seems Haruka-san won't give up after being rejected.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seems Haruka-san won't give up after being rejected.

MESSAGE.JP: 昼休み。
MESSAGE.EN: During lunch break.
MESSAGE.Translation: During lunch break.

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下で、中庭で。
MESSAGE.EN: In the corridor in the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the corridor in the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: 少し前までの葉留佳さんからは想像できないぐらいに、話しかけている。
MESSAGE.EN: Only a short while back, no one could've imagine Haruka-san trying to talk to Futaki-san this much.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only a short while back, no one could've imagine Haruka-san trying to talk to Futaki-san this much.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ねぇ、かなた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey, Kanata.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey, Kanata.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「覚えてる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Do you remember?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Do you remember?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私…途中で忘れちゃったけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I... forgot it for a while.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I... forgot it for a while.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも思い出したことがあって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But I remembered again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But I remembered again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…つまらない思い出話なんか聞きたくないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I don't want to listen to boring memories.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I don't want to listen to boring memories.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「忙しいから。邪魔しないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm busy, so please don't disturb me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm busy, so please don't disturb me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは、葉留佳さんを拒絶する。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san turned Haruka-san down cold.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san turned Haruka-san down cold.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「委員会のお仕事？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Is it committee work?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Is it committee work?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「しょうがないか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I guess it can't be avoided...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I guess it can't be avoided...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは俯いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san hung her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san hung her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんの顔。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san's face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san's face.

MESSAGE.JP: あからさまにほっとしている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was plainly relieved.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was plainly relieved.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃ、いつ忙しくなくなる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Then, when would you be free?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Then, when would you be free?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 顔を上げた葉留佳さんの台詞に、二木さんの顔が引きつった。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san's face stiffened at Haruka-san's follow up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san's face stiffened at Haruka-san's follow up.

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...❞

MESSAGE.JP: まさか食い下がってくるとは思わなかったのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She probably hadn't been expecting Haruka-san to be so persistent.
MESSAGE.Translation: She probably hadn't been expecting Haruka-san to be so persistent.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「忙しくないときに話すから。それならいいでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝We can talk when you're not busy. Is that alright?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝We can talk when you're not busy. Is that alright?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…そんな時間はないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I don't have any free time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I don't have any free time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたと違って…リトルバスターズとかいって遊んでるあなたと違って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I don't have all the free time you do that allows you to hang out with your Little Buster friends.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I don't have all the free time you do that allows you to hang out with your Little Buster friends.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私は忙しいから、そんな時間はない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I am busy, so I don't have any time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I am busy, so I don't have any time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それは、うそだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's a lie.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's a lie.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おねえちゃん、クド公と時々話してるじゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan, you talk to Little Kud from time to time, don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan, you talk to Little Kud from time to time, don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「クド公とは話せて、私とは話せないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So you have time to talk to Little Kud but not me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So you have time to talk to Little Kud but not me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…それは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私、クド公が羨ましいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I am jealous of Little Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I am jealous of Little Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …葉留佳さんはいきなり直球を投げ込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Haruka-san suddenly threw a straight ball.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Haruka-san suddenly threw a straight ball.

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 顔をそむける二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san averted her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san averted her face.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私、もっと話がしたいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I want to talk to you more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I want to talk to you more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今までできなかったぶん、色々な話がしたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝About all the things I couldn't say up till now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝About all the things I couldn't say up till now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私が思っていること、知っていること、伝えたいこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Things I think about, things I know, things I want to tell you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Things I think about, things I know, things I want to tell you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いっぱいあるんだ。言えなかったこと、いっぱい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There are many things I couldn't say. A lot of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There are many things I couldn't say. A lot of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「クド公みたいに、普通に私は話がしたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I want to talk to you normally like Little Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I want to talk to you normally like Little Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「関係ないでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It's none of your business.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It's none of your business.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…私が誰と何を話そうと、あなたには関係ないでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Who I talk to and what about is none of your business.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Who I talk to and what about is none of your business.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「今、私はあなたと話なんかしたくない。関係ないもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I don't want to talk to you. It's really none of your business.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I don't want to talk to you. It's really none of your business.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうだね。関係ないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's right. It's none of my business.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's right. It's none of my business.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おねえちゃんが『関係ないって言うときほど関係して』ほしいんじゃないかなって思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But don't you want to make it your business when someone tells you it's none of your business?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But don't you want to make it your business when someone tells you it's none of your business?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Isn't that right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Isn't that right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ほうっておいて！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Just leave me alone!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Just leave me alone!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんはそれだけ言うと、中庭を出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san spoke sharply and went out into the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san spoke sharply and went out into the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: 独り、残される葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was left by herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was left by herself.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんは…無理してるような気がするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think... Futaki-san is pushing herself too hard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think... Futaki-san is pushing herself too hard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はー…やれやれ。わが姉ながら、強情さには呆れますネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh well... that's my sister; her stubbornness is beyond amazing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh well... that's my sister; her stubbornness is beyond amazing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「何を拒んでいるんだか…いくら私たちに先がないとはいえ、意地っ張りだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wonder what exactly she's rejecting... Even if there's no future for us, what's the use in being so obstinate?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wonder what exactly she's rejecting... Even if there's no future for us, what's the use in being so obstinate?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…さっきの台詞…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What you said just now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What you said just now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ん？　クド公のこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Mn? About Little Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Mn? About Little Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「事実だからね。私、羨ましかったもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's true. I am jealous.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's true. I am jealous.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 素直に葉留佳さんは認めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san acknowledged it right away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san acknowledged it right away.

MESSAGE.JP: 頭に手をやり、息を吐く。
MESSAGE.EN: She put her hand on her head and sighed.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put her hand on her head and sighed.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ひとをね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝People...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝People...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ひとを、独占することはできないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝People can't be monopolized.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝People can't be monopolized.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ひとは、色々なひとに囲まれているから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Because they are surrounded by many people.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Because they are surrounded by many people.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「独り占めすることはできない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝They can't be monopolized.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝They can't be monopolized.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私には私の、おねえちゃんにはおねえちゃんの、関係がある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan and I, we both have others things.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan and I, we both have others things.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だから一面だけを見て、羨ましがっちゃだめなんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's why I can't just look at things one-sidedly and be jealous.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's why I can't just look at things one-sidedly and be jealous.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Isn't that right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Isn't that right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね…そのとおりだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's right... Just like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's right... Just like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「唯ねえには、羨ましがってた時、バレて、怒られたけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝When I was jealous of Yui-nee, she found out and got angry at me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝When I was jealous of Yui-nee, she found out and got angry at me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「姉御以外の呼び方をしたら怒られたってやつ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You mean that time when you called her something other than ❛Anego❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You mean that time when you called her something other than ❛Anego❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうだよ。私は甘えん坊だからなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's right. I am really a spoiled child...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's right. I am really a spoiled child...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「すぐ依存しちゃうんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I always cling onto others.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I always cling onto others.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…唯ねえは厳しくも優しいひとだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yui-nee is strict but kind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yui-nee is strict but kind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「きちんと突き放してくれる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She refused me right away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She refused me right away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そういうところはやっぱり姉っぽいんだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That is really big sister-like, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That is really big sister-like, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笑う葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san is smiling.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san is smiling.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも私の『おねえちゃん』はひとりしかいないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But there's only one ❛Onee-chan❜ for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But there's only one ❛Onee-chan❜ for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「きちんと向き合わなくちゃね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So I must face her properly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So I must face her properly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「さて、わが姉を追うとしますか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well then, shall I follow my sister?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well then, shall I follow my sister?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ばいばい、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Bye bye, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Bye bye, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはそれだけ言うと走っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san left running right after.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san left running right after.

MESSAGE.JP: 『授業参観のお知らせ』
MESSAGE.EN: [Parents' day notice].
MESSAGE.Translation: [Parents' day notice].

MESSAGE.JP: そのプリントにかかれた日、教室はうるさかった。
MESSAGE.EN: The day that was handed out, the classroom burst into noise.
MESSAGE.Translation: The day that was handed out, the classroom burst into noise.

MESSAGE.JP: こなくていい、やりたくない。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛They might not come, I don't want them to come.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛They might not come, I don't want them to come.❜

MESSAGE.JP: そう言ってたクラスメイトたちは、やがてそわそわしだした。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone was on edge.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone was on edge.

MESSAGE.JP: くすぐったくておちつかない、らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: The class couldn't seem to settle down.
MESSAGE.Translation: The class couldn't seem to settle down.

MESSAGE.JP: …じぶんが、同じ気持ちになれないことは、わかっていたから悲しくはなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I already know well that I can never feel like that, so I didn't feel sad at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I already know well that I can never feel like that, so I didn't feel sad at all.

MESSAGE.JP: 悪いことをしたのだという。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm told I did something bad.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm told I did something bad.

MESSAGE.JP: お父さんたちは、おじ様たちにとても迷惑をかけたのだという。
MESSAGE.EN: That I caused trouble for Father and Grandfather.
MESSAGE.Translation: That I caused trouble for Father and Grandfather.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、色々がまんしなさい、と。
MESSAGE.EN: Thus, you need to bear with it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thus, you need to bear with it.

MESSAGE.JP: そう言われていた。
MESSAGE.EN: So I was told.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I was told.

MESSAGE.JP: `先生@「はい、みなさん、もう低学年じゃないのだから落ち着きなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝Alright everyone. You are not first graders anymore, so calm down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝Alright everyone. You are not first graders anymore, so calm down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `先生@「授業はじめますよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝We are starting the lesson.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝We are starting the lesson.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それでも教室の空気はいつもと違っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The atmosphere of the classroom was different from usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: The atmosphere of the classroom was different from usual.

MESSAGE.JP: 私は少し居心地が悪かった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was a bit uncomfortable.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was a bit uncomfortable.

MESSAGE.JP: 後ろをちらりと見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I stole a glance behind me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stole a glance behind me.

MESSAGE.JP: ――知っている顔はいない。
MESSAGE.EN: There were no familiar faces.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were no familiar faces.

MESSAGE.JP: おじ様たちは、こんなことには興味ないのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: My relatives weren't interested in this kind of thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: My relatives weren't interested in this kind of thing.

MESSAGE.JP: 私がテストでいい点を取ればまんぞく。
MESSAGE.EN: They were satisfied as long as I got good grades.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were satisfied as long as I got good grades.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@（…私には、興味ないんだ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@(...They don't have any interest in me.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@(...They don't have any interest in me.)

MESSAGE.JP: そんなこと、とっくにわかっていたから、私は居心地が悪かった。
MESSAGE.EN: I understood that a long time ago, so I felt uncomfortable.
MESSAGE.Translation: I understood that a long time ago, so I felt uncomfortable.

MESSAGE.JP: みんながんばって手を挙げている。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone was trying their best to raise their hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone was trying their best to raise their hands.

MESSAGE.JP: いいところを見せようとしてる。
MESSAGE.EN: Trying to put their best foot forward.
MESSAGE.Translation: Trying to put their best foot forward.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、私は見せるひとがいない。
MESSAGE.EN: However, no one was there for me.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, no one was there for me.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@（それに…教科書のここは、もう終わったもの）
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@(Besides... I already know all of this.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@(Besides... I already know all of this.)

MESSAGE.JP: 半年も前に、独りで読み終えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I had finished reading the textbook on my own six months ago.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had finished reading the textbook on my own six months ago.

MESSAGE.JP: さわがしい教室で、私は黙って俯いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: In the noisy classroom, I quietly hung my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the noisy classroom, I quietly hung my head.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ただいま戻りました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I'm home.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I'm home.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 誰もいない玄関で、私は深々と頭を下げた。
MESSAGE.EN: In the empty corridor, I made a low bow.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the empty corridor, I made a low bow.

MESSAGE.JP: 家の中はしん、としている。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to act proper in the house.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to act proper in the house.

MESSAGE.JP: 出迎えてくれるひとは、いない。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no one coming to greet me.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no one coming to greet me.

MESSAGE.JP: このよの中にはかぞくとたにんしかいない。
MESSAGE.EN: In this world there are only family and strangers.
MESSAGE.Translation: In this world there are only family and strangers.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、この家のなかで、私は独りだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Therefore, in this house, I am alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Therefore, in this house, I am alone.

MESSAGE.JP: おじ様たちがかぞくなのかどうかわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know if my uncles were my family or not.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know if my uncles were my family or not.

MESSAGE.JP: …多分ちがうだろう（だってあのひとたちは私自身には興味がないみたいだもの）。
MESSAGE.EN: ...They probably weren't (since they didn't seem to be interested in me for myself).
MESSAGE.Translation: ...They probably weren't (since they didn't seem to be interested in me for myself).

MESSAGE.JP: かぞくってなんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: What is ❛family❜?
MESSAGE.Translation: What is ❛family❜?

MESSAGE.JP: 誰にでもあるそれが、ほんとうにいいものなら。
MESSAGE.EN: Something nice that everyone should have.
MESSAGE.Translation: Something nice that everyone should have.

MESSAGE.JP: どうして私のそばにそれはないのだろう…？
MESSAGE.EN: Why don't I have that around me...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why don't I have that around me...?

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@（…はるか…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@(...Haruka...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@(...Haruka...)

MESSAGE.JP: いもうとのことを考えると、気が重かった。
MESSAGE.EN: Thinking about my little sister immediately brought my spirits down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thinking about my little sister immediately brought my spirits down.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「つかれた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝So tired...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝So tired...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 眠りたい。
MESSAGE.EN: I was sleepy.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was sleepy.

MESSAGE.JP: けれどそういうわけにもいかない。
MESSAGE.EN: But I couldn't sleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I couldn't sleep.

MESSAGE.JP: 予習と復習。先の学年の勉強を進めなくちゃいけない。
MESSAGE.EN: Preparation and review. I must continue studying the materials for the next school year.
MESSAGE.Translation: Preparation and review. I must continue studying the materials for the next school year.

MESSAGE.JP: 鞄を下ろしたとき、呼び鈴が鳴った。
MESSAGE.EN: The doorbell rang as I put down my bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: The doorbell rang as I put down my bag.

MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `宅配業者@「お届けものです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Courier@❝You have a delivery.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Courier@❝You have a delivery.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…おつかれさまです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いつもの宅配業者のひとだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the usual delivery man.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the usual delivery man.

MESSAGE.JP: 来客など滅多にない。
MESSAGE.EN: Visitors are rare here.
MESSAGE.Translation: Visitors are rare here.

MESSAGE.JP: またどこかからのおくりものだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It's probably a gift from somewhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's probably a gift from somewhere.

MESSAGE.JP: 私は自分の名前をサインして受け取った。
MESSAGE.EN: I signed my name and took the package.
MESSAGE.Translation: I signed my name and took the package.

MESSAGE.JP: `宅配業者@「ありがとうございましたー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Courier@❝Thank you very much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Courier@❝Thank you very much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ふぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Haa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Haa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 軽い小さな箱だった。玄関の脇に箱を置く。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a small box. I set it down by the entrance.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a small box. I set it down by the entrance.

MESSAGE.JP: 中身はおじ様たちがしらべるので、私には関係ない。
MESSAGE.EN: It has nothing to do with me, since my uncles will look at the contents.
MESSAGE.Translation: It has nothing to do with me, since my uncles will look at the contents.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…あれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Huh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Huh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あて先がちらりと見えて、私は首をかしげた。
MESSAGE.EN: I stole a glance at the address, and tilted my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stole a glance at the address, and tilted my head.

MESSAGE.JP: 『さいぐさ　かなた様』
MESSAGE.EN: [Ms. Kanata Saigusa]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Ms. Kanata Saigusa]

MESSAGE.JP: 私あてだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was addressed to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was addressed to me.

MESSAGE.JP: でも珍しい。
MESSAGE.EN: That's strange.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's strange.

MESSAGE.JP: 私を『さいぐさ』と呼ぶひとはあんまりいない。
MESSAGE.EN: Not many people call me ❛Saigusa.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Not many people call me ❛Saigusa.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 親戚以外のひとが悪口を言うときに使ったりするようだ（私は言い返さないことにしている）。
