MESSAGE.EN: It's mostly used by people who aren't my relatives when badmouthing me (I try not to talk back).
MESSAGE.Translation: It's mostly used by people who aren't my relatives when badmouthing me (I try not to talk back).

MESSAGE.JP: あとつぎになったら名乗るように、と言われている。
MESSAGE.EN: I was that told once I became the successor, I would take over the family name.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was that told once I became the successor, I would take over the family name.

MESSAGE.JP: 私はまだあとつぎじゃないらしいから、名乗っちゃだめなのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Since it seemed I was not yet the successor, I couldn't use that name yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since it seemed I was not yet the successor, I couldn't use that name yet.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「誰だろう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I wonder who it's from?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I wonder who it's from?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一瞬気になったが、すぐ忘れることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: That only sparked my concern for a moment. I tried to forget about the package.
MESSAGE.Translation: That only sparked my concern for a moment. I tried to forget about the package.

MESSAGE.JP: よけいなことをして怒られるのはいやだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I hate being scolded for unnecessary things.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hate being scolded for unnecessary things.

MESSAGE.JP: いたいのは、いやだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't want to feel pain.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't want to feel pain.

MESSAGE.JP: 私は部屋へ足を向けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I headed toward my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I headed toward my room.

MESSAGE.JP: ――記憶が、いや、夢がだんだん鮮明になってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: My memories, no, my dreams, gradually become clearer.
MESSAGE.Translation: My memories, no, my dreams, gradually become clearer.

MESSAGE.JP: 恐ろしかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was terrifying.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was terrifying.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、恐ろしかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Just terrifying.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just terrifying.

MESSAGE.JP: 知られることが恐ろしかった。
MESSAGE.EN: If I got busted, it would be terrifying.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I got busted, it would be terrifying.

MESSAGE.JP: 抱えていたものを、手放したら、私は私でいられなくなる。
MESSAGE.EN: If I let go of what I was holding, I couldn't be myself anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I let go of what I was holding, I couldn't be myself anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: それが、本当に恐ろしかった。
MESSAGE.EN: That was truly horrifying.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was truly horrifying.

MESSAGE.JP: 学食で葉留佳さんの相談に付き合っている。
MESSAGE.EN: I was having a discussion with Haruka-san at the school cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was having a discussion with Haruka-san at the school cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おかしなこと、って？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What do you mean by ❛something strange❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What do you mean by ❛something strange❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはフォークでトマトをつっつきながら言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san talked while stabbing the tomato with her fork.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san talked while stabbing the tomato with her fork.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今日の一限目が数学だったんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It was today's first period, math.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It was today's first period, math.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おねえちゃん遅刻してきたんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan was late for class, you know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan was late for class, you know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…遅刻？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Late?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Late?❞

MESSAGE.JP: あの二木さんが？
MESSAGE.EN: That Futaki-san?
MESSAGE.Translation: That Futaki-san?

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「髪がぼさぼさのままで飛び込んできてさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She barged in with her hair in a tangle.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She barged in with her hair in a tangle.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「宿題もやってなくて、先生に当てられてぼろぼろだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She hadn't even done the homework, so she was scolded when the teacher found out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She hadn't even done the homework, so she was scolded when the teacher found out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…珍しく先生に怒られてた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...It's strange for her to be scolded by the teacher...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...It's strange for her to be scolded by the teacher...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そんなに難しくない問題だったんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It wasn't that difficult of a problem either...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It wasn't that difficult of a problem either...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんは宿題やってあったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did you do your homework, Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did you do your homework, Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んーん。やらないよ、私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Huh? I didn't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Huh? I didn't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…え、そうなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Eh, really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Eh, really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「その場で答えちゃうし、数学は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If it's math, I would just answer on the spot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If it's math, I would just answer on the spot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「数学、好きだったの葉留佳さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you like math, Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you like math, Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「好きでもなんでもないよ。ただ、問題を解くのは好きだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't really like it, but I like solving problems.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't really like it, but I like solving problems.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「クイズ番組とか好きだしねー、私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I also like those quiz game shows.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I also like those quiz game shows.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「解く楽しみが減っちゃうでしょ、宿題で問題見ちゃうと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Solving them would be boring if you look at them as homework.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Solving them would be boring if you look at them as homework.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「宿題はやってこないとだめだよ、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You should do your homework, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You should do your homework, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「へーい。忘れなかったらね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ye-s. If I don't forget about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ye-s. If I don't forget about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: まぁそれはともかく。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, whatever.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, whatever.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…二木さんが遅刻、か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...So Futaki-san was late, huh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...So Futaki-san was late, huh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんって予習復習ばっちりなんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She is always well prepared for class though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She is always well prepared for class though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そうだねー…私にはできないや。あんなのは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's right. I can't do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's right. I can't do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「睡眠時間削って完徹でも普通に登校するからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sometimes she would even pull an all-nighter, but she always has perfect attendance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sometimes she would even pull an all-nighter, but she always has perfect attendance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「すごいなぁ、おねえちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan is amazing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan is amazing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 感心したように言う葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san spoke with admiration.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san spoke with admiration.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、それは逆に考えれば…。
MESSAGE.EN: However, if you think of that another way....
MESSAGE.Translation: However, if you think of that another way....

MESSAGE.JP: 予習復習を必死にやってようやくレベルを維持しているってことじゃないのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: She had to study nonstop to maintain her grades.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had to study nonstop to maintain her grades.

MESSAGE.JP: 予習も復習もやらずぶっつけ本番で問題を解くのが好き、という葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Unlike Haruka-san who, instead of studying, liked to solve problems on the spot.
MESSAGE.Translation: Unlike Haruka-san who, instead of studying, liked to solve problems on the spot.

MESSAGE.JP: その差異は確かにあると思った。
MESSAGE.EN: There really was a difference.
MESSAGE.Translation: There really was a difference.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…努力型の、秀才）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...She was talented in working hard.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...She was talented in working hard.)

MESSAGE.JP: 今の二木さんは精神的に追い詰められているのだとしたら。
MESSAGE.EN: If Futaki-san was emotionally driven into a corner now...
MESSAGE.Translation: If Futaki-san was emotionally driven into a corner now...

MESSAGE.JP: いつもの努力にも集中できないのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She might very well be unable to focus on her studies.
MESSAGE.Translation: She might very well be unable to focus on her studies.

MESSAGE.JP: 遅刻をし、妹の前で教師から注意を受けるなんて、よほどだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The effects of which were visible through her being late and being reprimanded by the teacher.
MESSAGE.Translation: The effects of which were visible through her being late and being reprimanded by the teacher.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「寮ではどうしてるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What about at the dorm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What about at the dorm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私から逃げまくってるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She is running away from me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She is running away from me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「少し前までは逆だった気がするんだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I had a feeling it was the reverse just a while ago.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I had a feeling it was the reverse just a while ago.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おかしいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Isn't that strange?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Isn't that strange?❞

MESSAGE.JP: くすくす笑う葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san giggled.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san giggled.

MESSAGE.JP: 不意に真面目な顔になって言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Then she suddenly spoke with a serious face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then she suddenly spoke with a serious face.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ほんとうに、おかしいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It really is strange.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It really is strange.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんは、どう思う？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What do you think, Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What do you think, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やっぱり無理をしているんじゃないかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe she's really pushing herself too hard...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe she's really pushing herself too hard...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それから、葉留佳さんと同じように、どうしたらいいかわからないんだと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But then, I don't have any idea of what to do either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But then, I don't have any idea of what to do either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「小さい頃から、色々なことを学んでこなかったからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I didn't learn much when I was a kid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I didn't learn much when I was a kid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「くだらない競争ばかりで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It was all stupid competitions.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It was all stupid competitions.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いつからだったっけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝When did that start?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝When did that start?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「きっと生まれたときからだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm sure it was from the moment we were born.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm sure it was from the moment we were born.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「最初はおねえちゃんがどうして意地悪するのかわからなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝At first I didn't know why Onee-chan was bullying me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝At first I didn't know why Onee-chan was bullying me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「約束を信じていたから、私はがまんできた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I believed in our promise, so I was able to hang on...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I believed in our promise, so I was able to hang on...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「約束？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Promise?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Promise?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そう、約束」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yes, promise.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yes, promise.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも、私、それを忘れちゃっていたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But I had forgotten about that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But I had forgotten about that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「『あのとき』…あのひとたちに言われたぐらいで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What they told me back then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What they told me back then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「絶望しちゃって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...made me fall into despair.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...made me fall into despair.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そのときから、私は…自分が決めたことも忘れて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ever since, I even forgot... what I had resolved to do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ever since, I even forgot... what I had resolved to do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「逆恨みみたいなこと考えるようになって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I became full of resentment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I became full of resentment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おねえちゃんを追い込んでいたんだろうな、って思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I think I was driving Onee-chan into a corner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I think I was driving Onee-chan into a corner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私のために『わかりやすい敵』になってくれていたのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Even though she made herself out to be an enemy for my sake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Even though she made herself out to be an enemy for my sake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そんなことも、私はわかっていなかったんだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I didn't even understand that much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I didn't even understand that much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…やくそく、っていうのは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...About the promise...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...About the promise...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは俯いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san hung her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san hung her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「『いつかお母さんやお父さん達に一緒に会いにいこう』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝❛Someday, let's go see Mom and Dad together.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝❛Someday, let's go see Mom and Dad together.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「『ふたり、手を繋いで』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝❛The two of us, hand in hand.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝❛The two of us, hand in hand.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「『それまでは』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝❛Until then❜...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝❛Until then❜...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それまでは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Until then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Until then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「――仲が悪いふりをしよう…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝-let's pretend to be enemies...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝-let's pretend to be enemies...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「正解」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Correct.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Correct.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「『ふり』をしているうちに、それがほんとうみたいに思えてくるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Somehow during all that ❛pretending,❜ I came to think of it as real.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Somehow during all that ❛pretending,❜ I came to think of it as real.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「憎くて憎くてたまらなくなる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It was detestable, I couldn't stand it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It was detestable, I couldn't stand it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どれがほんとうかわからなくなっていく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I couldn't tell what was real anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I couldn't tell what was real anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「演じているうちに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝While wearing that mask...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝While wearing that mask...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「自分の見ているものが、ほんとうなのか、わからなくなっていく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I became unable to tell fact from fiction❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I became unable to tell fact from fiction❞

MESSAGE.JP: 顔を上げた葉留佳さんは僕を見つめる。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san turned to look at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san turned to look at me.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「思いこみは、何もかも変えてしまうの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝My assumptions, everything, changed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝My assumptions, everything, changed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「全てが悪意に見えてくる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I saw ill intentions in everything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I saw ill intentions in everything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「自分以外全てが悪いと思い込んでしまう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I came to think of everyone else as evil.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I came to think of everyone else as evil.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そんなわけはないのにね。馬鹿だね、私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...But that can't be true. I am such an idiot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...But that can't be true. I am such an idiot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、葉留佳さんはもう『そうじゃない』んでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Still, you are no longer ❛like that,❜ aren't you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Still, you are no longer ❛like that,❜ aren't you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だから、くじけないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's why, I won't be crushed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's why, I won't be crushed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ひどいこと言うおねえちゃんには」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan who keeps saying mean things...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan who keeps saying mean things...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ほんとのきもちがある、って信じたいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I want to believe that's not how she really feels.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I want to believe that's not how she really feels.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは、頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: 週末が来た。
MESSAGE.EN: The weekend.
MESSAGE.Translation: The weekend.

MESSAGE.JP: クラスの子は土曜日と日曜日がたのしみらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: All my classmates seemed to look forward to weekends.
MESSAGE.Translation: All my classmates seemed to look forward to weekends.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、私はちっとも楽しくなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: However, I was not one bit happy about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, I was not one bit happy about it.

MESSAGE.JP: …今日は、学校のテストの点数を比べあった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Today, the exam results came out.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Today, the exam results came out.

MESSAGE.JP: さいぐさ（むこう）のひとたちの顔は暗い。
MESSAGE.EN: The Saigusas looked grim.
MESSAGE.Translation: The Saigusas looked grim.

MESSAGE.JP: 勝ち誇る二木のおじ様たちは、怒鳴っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The Futakis were screaming.
MESSAGE.Translation: The Futakis were screaming.

MESSAGE.JP: はるかの…いもうとの悪口を、ずっと言っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: They kept bad mouthing Haruka... my little sister.
MESSAGE.Translation: They kept bad mouthing Haruka... my little sister.

MESSAGE.JP: 私も、あの子も、無言でそれを聞いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Both of us listened to it without a word.
MESSAGE.Translation: Both of us listened to it without a word.

MESSAGE.JP: `親戚@「別室へ行っていなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Relative@❝Please go to another room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Relative@❝Please go to another room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 肩が叩かれたのを合図に、部屋をでる。
MESSAGE.EN: I left the room at the tap on my shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: I left the room at the tap on my shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: 別に終わったわけじゃない。もう一つの役割がある。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't over yet. There was still one more thing I had to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't over yet. There was still one more thing I had to do.

MESSAGE.JP: はるかを、いじめなければならない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka, she had to be scolded...
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka, she had to be scolded...

MESSAGE.JP: いもうとにひどい言葉を言ったりしなくちゃいけない。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to say horrible things to my little sister.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to say horrible things to my little sister.

MESSAGE.JP: 私はのろのろと体をうごかした。
MESSAGE.EN: I sluggishly moved my body.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sluggishly moved my body.

MESSAGE.JP: 離れの部屋には、誰もいなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was nobody in the other room.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was nobody in the other room.

MESSAGE.JP: いつも私が先に部屋に入る。
MESSAGE.EN: I entered the room ahead of her as usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: I entered the room ahead of her as usual.

MESSAGE.JP: 前はわからなかった理由も、今ではもう理解している。
MESSAGE.EN: Now I could understand the reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now I could understand the reason.

MESSAGE.JP: 小さなテーブルの上に、箱が置いてあった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a small box left on the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a small box left on the table.

MESSAGE.JP: メモがあった。
MESSAGE.EN: Within was a note.
MESSAGE.Translation: Within was a note.

MESSAGE.JP: 『佳奈多へ。今回の賞品を贈る』
MESSAGE.EN: [To Kanata. Your reward.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [To Kanata. Your reward.]

MESSAGE.JP: 箱の中を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked inside.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「かみどめ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Hair ties...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Hair ties...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 淡い桜色をしたかみどめが入っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There were light pink colored hair ties inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were light pink colored hair ties inside.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「４つ、ある…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝There are... four...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝There are... four...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 同じデザインのかみどめが４つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Four identical hair ties.
MESSAGE.Translation: Four identical hair ties.

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっとこどもっぽいデザインだと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt they were a bit childish.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt they were a bit childish.

MESSAGE.JP: もちろん、私はまだこどもだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course, I was still a kid.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course, I was still a kid.

MESSAGE.JP: 大きめのビー玉みたいなかみどめは、ちいさな子がつけるみたいだなって思った。
MESSAGE.EN: The hair ties looked like large marbles, and it felt like they are put on little children as decoration.
MESSAGE.Translation: The hair ties looked like large marbles, and it felt like they are put on little children as decoration.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「どうして４つ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Why are there four of them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Why are there four of them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 別にいくつあってもおかしくない。
MESSAGE.EN: It didn't really matter how many there were.
MESSAGE.Translation: It didn't really matter how many there were.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、色違いならわかるけれど、同じ物を４つ。
MESSAGE.EN: But these four had exactly the same color.
MESSAGE.Translation: But these four had exactly the same color.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「……ひょっとしたら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝......Could it be?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝......Could it be?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりのための贈り物かもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: They were meant for two people.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were meant for two people.

MESSAGE.JP: 同じ物をふたつずつ。
MESSAGE.EN: One pair each.
MESSAGE.Translation: One pair each.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたごの私たちへの贈り物。
MESSAGE.EN: A gift for us twins.
MESSAGE.Translation: A gift for us twins.

MESSAGE.JP: 思いこみかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe that's what I wanted to believe.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe that's what I wanted to believe.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、そうだったらいいな、と私は考えた。
MESSAGE.EN: But I thought that would be nice.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I thought that would be nice.

MESSAGE.JP: それに確か今日は。
MESSAGE.EN: That's right, today is...
MESSAGE.Translation: That's right, today is...

MESSAGE.EN: October 13th.
MESSAGE.Translation: October 13th.

MESSAGE.JP: かたん。
MESSAGE.EN: *Clang.*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Clang.*

MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Haruka?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Haruka?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 暗い元気の無いはるかが部屋に入ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Dispirited, Haruka entered the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Dispirited, Haruka entered the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 唇のよこが切れて、血が流れている。
MESSAGE.EN: Her lips were cut. Blood was trickling down from them.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her lips were cut. Blood was trickling down from them.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「こんかいも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝This time as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝This time as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「まけました。ごめんなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I lost. Sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I lost. Sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「つぎは、かてるようがんばります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'll try harder to beat you next time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'll try harder to beat you next time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「よろしくおねがいします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I look forward to facing you again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I look forward to facing you again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 畳の上に額をつけて、はるかは言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka said as she prostrated on the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka said as she prostrated on the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: そう言えと、言われたのだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: She was told to say this....
MESSAGE.Translation: She was told to say this....

MESSAGE.JP: それだけ言うと、はるかは部屋の角でうずくまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka went to crouch at the corner of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka went to crouch at the corner of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 精気の無い瞳で、俯いたまま、ぼんやりと畳を見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: With lifeless eyes, her head hanging, she stared at the floor absently.
MESSAGE.Translation: With lifeless eyes, her head hanging, she stared at the floor absently.

MESSAGE.JP: 頬のあざ。
MESSAGE.EN: The bruise on her cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bruise on her cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: 乱れたかみの毛。
MESSAGE.EN: Her disheveled hair.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her disheveled hair.

MESSAGE.JP: ぼろぼろの服…。
MESSAGE.EN: The crumpled clothes...
MESSAGE.Translation: The crumpled clothes...

MESSAGE.JP: 汚れて穴が開いた靴下。
MESSAGE.EN: The dirty torn shoes.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dirty torn shoes.

MESSAGE.JP: だらしないね、と『いつものように』言おうとした。
MESSAGE.EN: I was going to say 'you are so untidy' as usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was going to say 'you are so untidy' as usual.

MESSAGE.JP: そんなんだから私に負けるんだよ、と口にしようとした。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛It's because you're so unorganized that you lost to me.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛It's because you're so unorganized that you lost to me.❜

MESSAGE.JP: はるかはやくたたずのできそこないだね。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Haruka is such a useless girl.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Haruka is such a useless girl.❜

MESSAGE.JP: さいぐさのおじ様たちもあきれていたよ。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛The Saigusas are getting tired of you.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛The Saigusas are getting tired of you.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 本当にはるかはだめなこだね。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛You really are a good for nothing child.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛You really are a good for nothing child.❜

MESSAGE.JP: もう何十回もくり返したから、すらすら言葉は出てくる。
MESSAGE.EN: The insults should come easy, having used them so many times.
MESSAGE.Translation: The insults should come easy, having used them so many times.

MESSAGE.JP: …はず、だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Or so I thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Or so I thought.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、言えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet, I couldn't say it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet, I couldn't say it.

MESSAGE.JP: これはチャンスだ。
MESSAGE.EN: This was my chance.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was my chance.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日という日、届いた贈り物、それから思いついたこと。
MESSAGE.EN: The box that was delivered today. I thought about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: The box that was delivered today. I thought about it.

MESSAGE.JP: かみどめをふたつ握ってはるかのそばに行く。
MESSAGE.EN: I walked toward Haruka, holding two of the hair ties.
MESSAGE.Translation: I walked toward Haruka, holding two of the hair ties.

MESSAGE.JP: しゃがみこんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I squatted down.
MESSAGE.Translation: I squatted down.

MESSAGE.JP: ほこりと汗の匂いがする。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a smell of dust and sweat.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a smell of dust and sweat.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 呼びかけると、ぼんやりとした目が私を見た。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka absentmindedly turned to me upon hearing her name.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka absentmindedly turned to me upon hearing her name.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Haruka?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Haruka?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…なに…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...What...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...What...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう言いながら体を横にずらし、さけるように後ずさりする。
MESSAGE.EN: She twisted her body to the side, as if to avoid me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She twisted her body to the side, as if to avoid me.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なんですか…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What do you want...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What do you want...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 私から、逃げているのだ…胸が張り裂けそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was trying to avoid me... my heart felt as if it was going to break.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was trying to avoid me... my heart felt as if it was going to break.

MESSAGE.JP: 私を怖がっている。それが、とても辛かった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was afraid of me. That really hurt.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was afraid of me. That really hurt.

MESSAGE.JP: こわがらなくてもいいのに。
MESSAGE.EN: You don't have to be afraid.
MESSAGE.Translation: You don't have to be afraid.

MESSAGE.JP: 『いつもいじめてるくせに…』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Even though you bully her all the time...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Even though you bully her all the time...❜

MESSAGE.JP: 心の中で誰かが言う。
MESSAGE.EN: A voice in my head spoke.
MESSAGE.Translation: A voice in my head spoke.

MESSAGE.JP: 『だからあたりまえなんだよ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛It's obvious that would happen.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛It's obvious that would happen.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 誰かが笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: Someone is laughing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Someone is laughing.

MESSAGE.JP: …私はくちびるをかみしめた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I bit down on my lips.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I bit down on my lips.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はるか、聞いて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Haruka, listen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Haruka, listen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「……っ」
耳を両手でふさいで首を振るはるか。
MESSAGE.EN: She clapped her hands around her ears and shook her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She clapped her hands around her ears and shook her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 服のそでからのぞいた腕も、あざだらけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: There were bruises all over her arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were bruises all over her arms.

MESSAGE.JP: かなしくなる。
MESSAGE.EN: It was heartrending.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was heartrending.

MESSAGE.JP: 私たちが何をしたというのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: What did we do?
MESSAGE.Translation: What did we do?

MESSAGE.JP: クラスの子たちがけんかをしたとき先生が言っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Whenever a fight broke out, our teacher would tell us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Whenever a fight broke out, our teacher would tell us.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとを傷つけてはいけません、と。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛You must not hurt others.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛You must not hurt others.❜

MESSAGE.JP: うそくさかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Such lies.
MESSAGE.Translation: Such lies.

MESSAGE.JP: とてもうそくさかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Blatant lies.
MESSAGE.Translation: Blatant lies.

MESSAGE.JP: あんなの、すり傷じゃないか、と思った。
MESSAGE.EN: It was nothing more than a bruise.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was nothing more than a bruise.

MESSAGE.JP: あれぐらいのあざで泣きわめいて、こどもだな、と思った。
MESSAGE.EN: Making a scene out of something so petty? How immature.
MESSAGE.Translation: Making a scene out of something so petty? How immature.

MESSAGE.JP: …謝ったのに、ゆるしてくれない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Even though she apologized, she wasn't forgiven.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Even though she apologized, she wasn't forgiven.

MESSAGE.JP: 何度もごめんなさいと言ったのに、やめてくれない。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter how many times she said ❛I'm sorry,❜ they didn't stop.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter how many times she said ❛I'm sorry,❜ they didn't stop.

MESSAGE.JP: …私たちが、いったい、何をしたというのだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Just what have we done....
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Just what have we done....

MESSAGE.JP: おとうさんたちは、どうして迎えに来てくれないのだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Why didn't Mom and Dad come pick us up...
MESSAGE.Translation: Why didn't Mom and Dad come pick us up...

MESSAGE.JP: 捨てられたんだ、とまわりのひとは言った。
MESSAGE.EN: The people around us said we were abandoned.
MESSAGE.Translation: The people around us said we were abandoned.

MESSAGE.JP: じぶんがたいせつだから私たちを置いて逃げたのだ、と。
MESSAGE.EN: That they left us and ran away by themselves.
MESSAGE.Translation: That they left us and ran away by themselves.

MESSAGE.JP: だから忘れてしまえ…そんなにんげんのことは忘れてしまえ、と。
MESSAGE.EN: So forget about them... forget about those people.
MESSAGE.Translation: So forget about them... forget about those people.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも、いつか迎えにきてくれると、私は信じていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, I believed that one day they would come take us home.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, I believed that one day they would come take us home.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はるか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Haruka...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Haruka...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「落ち着いて、はるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Calm down, Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Calm down, Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「時間ないから、見つかるといけないから、聞いて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝There isn't much time. I can't let the others see us, so listen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝There isn't much time. I can't let the others see us, so listen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「これ、見て」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Here, this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Here, this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はるかに差し出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I showed the hair pins to Haruka.
MESSAGE.Translation: I showed the hair pins to Haruka.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…なに…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...What...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...What...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「今週に届いたの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝These were delivered this week.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝These were delivered this week.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 私がいつもと違うことに気がついたのか、きいてくるはるか。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka listened, noticing that I was not acting like normal.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka listened, noticing that I was not acting like normal.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「誕生日の、週に。送ったひとはわかんないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝It's our birthday this week. I don't know who sent them though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝It's our birthday this week. I don't know who sent them though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「でも、おかあさんからだと、思うの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I think they may be from Mom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I think they may be from Mom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…おか……あ、さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Mo...... m-mom?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Mo...... m-mom?❞

MESSAGE.JP: その単語の意味はなに？　と言いたげな表情をした顔が、泣きそうになった。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to cry when I saw Haruka's expression. An expression that appeared to be asking ❛Mom? What is that?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to cry when I saw Haruka's expression. An expression that appeared to be asking ❛Mom? What is that?❜

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うそ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Impossible...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Impossible...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「多分だけど。私たちのために」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I believe they are for us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I believe they are for us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それは私がそうぞうしただけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was what I wanted to believe.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was what I wanted to believe.

MESSAGE.JP: こどもっぽいかみどめを送るひとは誰か？
MESSAGE.EN: Who would send such childish hair ties?
MESSAGE.Translation: Who would send such childish hair ties?

MESSAGE.JP: それは思いこみだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought about it.

MESSAGE.JP: 私たちを助けに来ないおとうさんたち。
MESSAGE.EN: Why would our parents, who never attempted to save us...
MESSAGE.Translation: Why would our parents, who never attempted to save us...

MESSAGE.JP: にくめと教わっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Whom we were taught to hate...
MESSAGE.Translation: Whom we were taught to hate...

MESSAGE.JP: 私たちを捨てて逃げたのだと教わっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Whom we were taught cast us away...
MESSAGE.Translation: Whom we were taught cast us away...

MESSAGE.JP: でも、何かりゆうがあったのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But there must be a reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: But there must be a reason.

MESSAGE.JP: おじ様たちが言えば言うほど、それはうそくさく思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: The more I listened to my relatives, the less I trusted them.
MESSAGE.Translation: The more I listened to my relatives, the less I trusted them.

MESSAGE.JP: ――クラスの子たちは、とても楽しそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ――The kids in my class seem really happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――The kids in my class seem really happy.

MESSAGE.JP: もんくを言いながらも、かぞくの話をよくする。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite their endless complaints, they always talk about their families.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite their endless complaints, they always talk about their families.

MESSAGE.JP: よくしらないけど…おとうさんとかおかあさんっていうのは…。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't really understand, but...
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't really understand, but...

MESSAGE.JP: 『いいもの』…らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It seems that 'fathers' and ❛mothers❜ are good things.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seems that 'fathers' and ❛mothers❜ are good things.

MESSAGE.JP: かぞくっていうのは、あたりまえにいいもの、らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It seems that having a family is inherently a good thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seems that having a family is inherently a good thing.

MESSAGE.JP: なにがあたりまえか、私にはわからなかったけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know why that's true, though.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know why that's true, though.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰にとってもあたりまえにいいものだとしたら。
MESSAGE.EN: However, if family is supposed to be a good thing,
MESSAGE.Translation: However, if family is supposed to be a good thing,

MESSAGE.JP: …例えば、うまれた日に私たちに贈り物をしてくれてもいいと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: Then I want to believe that our parents would have sent us presents for our birthday.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then I want to believe that our parents would have sent us presents for our birthday.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、かおも知らないそのひとたちからの贈り物。
MESSAGE.EN: No, these presents are from our parents, even if we don't know what they look like.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, these presents are from our parents, even if we don't know what they look like.

MESSAGE.JP: これをそう考えてもいいじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no harm in believing that, right?
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no harm in believing that, right?

MESSAGE.JP: 私たちの夢を確認したかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to believe in that dream.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to believe in that dream.

MESSAGE.JP: 小さいころからの夢…。
MESSAGE.EN: The dream we've had for as long as I can remember.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dream we've had for as long as I can remember.

MESSAGE.JP: その夢はおとうさんたちが私たちをおぼえていなければ意味がない。
MESSAGE.EN: It's a hopeless dream if our parents don't even remember us.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's a hopeless dream if our parents don't even remember us.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、形として、それを信じる物があれば、もっとがんばれると思った。
MESSAGE.EN: But still, as long as I had something I could hold in my hand, I could believe.
MESSAGE.Translation: But still, as long as I had something I could hold in my hand, I could believe.

MESSAGE.JP: 例えおとうさんたちからではなかったとしても、私はそれをりゆうにしたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted them to be the senders, even if they actually weren't.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted them to be the senders, even if they actually weren't.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰かがくれた『よいおねえさん』になるための、チャンスだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I want to take this opportunity to be a good sister.
MESSAGE.Translation: I want to take this opportunity to be a good sister.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「だから、あげる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝So I am giving these to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝So I am giving these to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「え、でも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 差し出したそれを見てはるかは首を振る。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka shook her head at my hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka shook her head at my hands.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ふ、ふたつもいらないよ…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't need two of them...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't need two of them...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はんぶんこにしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Let's share them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Let's share them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 私は４つあるそれをはんぶんにしよう、といった。
MESSAGE.EN: Let's share the four hair ties between us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Let's share the four hair ties between us.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「で、でも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝B-but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝B-but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 受け取らないのは予想通りだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She hesitated, as I expected.
MESSAGE.Translation: She hesitated, as I expected.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「これはふたつ、はるかに持っていて欲しいの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I want you to take two, Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I want you to take two, Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「かなたがいろいろ貰えるのは、勝ったからだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝They're your reward for winning, Kanata.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝They're your reward for winning, Kanata.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私は、負けてるから。それが理由だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I lost. That's why...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I lost. That's why...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なんでも、かなたが持つべきだよ。そう決まっているんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...you should have everything, Kanata. That's how it works.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...you should have everything, Kanata. That's how it works.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 私は右手をスカートにこすりつけた。
MESSAGE.EN: I pressed my right hand against her skirt.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pressed my right hand against her skirt.

MESSAGE.JP: 上手く言えるだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Can I say it well?
MESSAGE.Translation: Can I say it well?

MESSAGE.JP: 誰かに聞かれたらひどいことになるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: If anyone hears us, I am sure we'll be punished.
MESSAGE.Translation: If anyone hears us, I am sure we'll be punished.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, I spoke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, I spoke.

MESSAGE.JP: 舌がもつれる。
MESSAGE.EN: My tongue caught in my throat.
MESSAGE.Translation: My tongue caught in my throat.

MESSAGE.JP: やさしいことばを、私は言えるだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Was I capable of saying something so kind?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was I capable of saying something so kind?

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「お、おねえちゃんは、ひとりじめなんかしないものなの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Your b-big sister is not the kind to hog things for herself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Your b-big sister is not the kind to hog things for herself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言えた…！
MESSAGE.EN: I said it...!
MESSAGE.Translation: I said it...!

MESSAGE.JP: いじめることばかり言っていた、私にも言えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I managed to say it even though everything I had ever said to her was out of spite.
MESSAGE.Translation: I managed to say it even though everything I had ever said to her was out of spite.

MESSAGE.JP: 言葉が出てくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was able to say it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was able to say it.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「え……」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eh......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh......❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「だから、２つ持ってなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝So please take two of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝So please take two of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『いじわる』し続けるのは、いやだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm tired of continuing this ❛bullying.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm tired of continuing this ❛bullying.❜

MESSAGE.JP: いもうとをいじめるなんて…『悪い』ことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: To bully my little sister... that's ❛bad.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: To bully my little sister... that's ❛bad.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 悪いことをし続けるのは『もっと悪い』こと。
MESSAGE.EN: To continue doing bad things is even worse.
MESSAGE.Translation: To continue doing bad things is even worse.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも、それは、せっかく…おかあさん？　…がくれたんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But since those are from... uh... Mom?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But since those are from... uh... Mom?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「かなたが、ぜんぶ持っていればいいよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You can have them all, Kanata...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You can have them all, Kanata...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 目を伏せるはるか。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka's downcast eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka's downcast eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 手がふるえている。
MESSAGE.EN: Her hands were trembling.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her hands were trembling.

MESSAGE.JP: 『私たちが生まれた日』に何をやっているのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Just what is she doing? Today's the day we were born.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just what is she doing? Today's the day we were born.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰だっておめでとう、って言ってくれる日に、がまんしなくちゃいけないなんて、かなしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It's sad we were going through this on the day people should be wishing us ❛happy birthday❜.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's sad we were going through this on the day people should be wishing us ❛happy birthday❜.

MESSAGE.JP: いもうとに、がまんさせちゃ『よいおねえさん』ではないじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: To put my sister through this, I am in no way a ❛good sister.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: To put my sister through this, I am in no way a ❛good sister.❜

MESSAGE.JP: かぞくがもしも『いいもの』だとしたら。
MESSAGE.EN: If ❛family❜ is such a good thing...
MESSAGE.Translation: If ❛family❜ is such a good thing...

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@（…私のかぞくは、はるかだ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@(My family is... Haruka)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@(My family is... Haruka)

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@（いま、ここにいる、私のかぞくは、いもうとしかいない…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@(Here, now, my family... There's no one but Haruka.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@(Here, now, my family... There's no one but Haruka.)

MESSAGE.JP: だったら、大事な贈り物を独り占めになんかしたくなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Therefore, I didn't want to take this important gift all for myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Therefore, I didn't want to take this important gift all for myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 生まれた日に。
MESSAGE.EN: On our birthday.
MESSAGE.Translation: On our birthday.

MESSAGE.JP: 私ははるかのことがだいじだから。
MESSAGE.EN: I treasured Haruka.
MESSAGE.Translation: I treasured Haruka.

MESSAGE.JP: それを伝えるのなら今だとおもった。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought now would be the time to say it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought now would be the time to say it.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ごめんね、はるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I'm sorry, Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I'm sorry, Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうして、謝るの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Why are you... apologizing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Why are you... apologizing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「いつも、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I'm sorry, for everything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I'm sorry, for everything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しばらく無言だった。
MESSAGE.EN: We stayed silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: We stayed silent.

MESSAGE.JP: すごく長い時間、はるかは黙っていた気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought she stayed silent for a really long time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought she stayed silent for a really long time.

MESSAGE.JP: 伸ばされた手。
MESSAGE.EN: Her arms reached out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her arms reached out.

MESSAGE.JP: 触れた指先。
MESSAGE.EN: Our fingertips touched.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our fingertips touched.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたつ、かみどめを握ったいもうとは、かすかに笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: My little sister grasped the hair ties, and smiled lightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: My little sister grasped the hair ties, and smiled lightly.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…よかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I'm glad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I'm glad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「……はるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝......Haruka?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝......Haruka?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「昔約束したとおりなんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Just as you promised when we were young...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Just as you promised when we were young...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私のこと、本気で嫌いになってなくて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You didn't come to hate me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You didn't come to hate me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「よかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm glad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm glad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「……当たり、前、じゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝......Isn't, that... obvious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝......Isn't, that... obvious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 私はくちびるをかみしめた。
MESSAGE.EN: I bit down on my lips.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bit down on my lips.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…手をぬくのも…大変なんだよ。あはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...It was hard too... losing. Ahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...It was hard too... losing. Ahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…手を、抜く？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Losing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Losing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうだよ。私がだめな子でいれば、かなたはいじめられない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's right. As long as I am a bad girl, they won't bully you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's right. As long as I am a bad girl, they won't bully you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私はがまんすることしか才能ないみたいだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It seems I'm very adept at handling it❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It seems I'm very adept at handling it❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「がまんしようって、思ってたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I thought I would try and endure it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I thought I would try and endure it.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Wha... what...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Wha... what...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 必死で競いあって。
MESSAGE.EN: I had tried so desperately.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had tried so desperately.

MESSAGE.JP: 頑張らないとはるかがいなくなっちゃうと言われて。
MESSAGE.EN: I was told she would be gone if I don't work hard.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was told she would be gone if I don't work hard.

MESSAGE.JP: したくもないいもうといじめをしていたのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I didn't want to bully her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I didn't want to bully her.

MESSAGE.JP: この子は、今、何を言ったのだ…？
MESSAGE.EN: Just now, what did she say...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Just now, what did she say...?

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…今よりちいさいころ。時々は、私、勝ってたよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...When we were younger, sometimes I would win, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...When we were younger, sometimes I would win, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私が勝ったとき、かなた、叩かれて泣いてたのを見たの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝When I won, I would see you be beaten up and crying.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝When I won, I would see you be beaten up and crying.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「すごくかなしかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It was really sad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It was really sad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ふたりのどっちかがどうせ叩かれるのなら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If one of us was going to be beaten anyway...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If one of us was going to be beaten anyway...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それなら、だめなこでいようって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It might as well have been me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It might as well have been me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうしたら、かなたはさ、自由になれるよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If I do that, you can be free right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If I do that, you can be free right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「たくさん、勉強して、えらいひとになってさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You'd study a lot, and become a great person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You'd study a lot, and become a great person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私たちみたいな、かわいそうな子を生まないように、してくれるだろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And you'd make sure this wouldn't happen to other kids, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And you'd make sure this wouldn't happen to other kids, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そう、思ったんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's what I believed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's what I believed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ちいさいころ、どんなことがあってもすきでいてくれる、って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No matter what happens, we would still love each other.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No matter what happens, we would still love each other.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…かなた…おねえちゃん、約束してくれたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Kanata... Onee-chan, you promised that when we were small.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Kanata... Onee-chan, you promised that when we were small.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だから、がまんできたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's why I was able to hang on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's why I was able to hang on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ――いもうとは、えがおで、いった。
MESSAGE.EN: ――My little sister said that, with a smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――My little sister said that, with a smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「……はる……か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝......Haru...... ka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝......Haru...... ka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「よかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm glad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm glad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おねえちゃんは、おねえちゃんのままで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan, you're still the same.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan, you're still the same.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私のことならいいよ。がまんする。がんばる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm fine. I will try my best. I will do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm fine. I will try my best. I will do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私はだめな子のままでいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I will keep being the bad child.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I will keep being the bad child.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…かなたなら、できるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...If it's you, Kanata, you can do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...If it's you, Kanata, you can do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おねえちゃん、がんばって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan, do your best.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan, do your best.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私は、おねえちゃんほど、頭いくないみたいだしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I think I'm not as bright as you are.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I think I'm not as bright as you are.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やはは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yahaha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yahaha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「そんな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Such things...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Such things...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「そんなこと、考えてるなんて、私、知らなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I didn't know that such thoughts weighed on you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I didn't know that such thoughts weighed on you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「言っちゃったら、かなた、手加減するでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If I told you, you would go easy, wouldn't you, Kanata?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If I told you, you would go easy, wouldn't you, Kanata?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「テストもがんばらないよね。ねないでがんばってるんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You did your best for the tests, even pulling all-nighters, didn't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You did your best for the tests, even pulling all-nighters, didn't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぼろぼろの姿をしたいもうとはまっすぐ私を見た。
MESSAGE.EN: My tattered little sister looked me straight in the eye.
MESSAGE.Translation: My tattered little sister looked me straight in the eye.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…いつか、仲良くするために」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...For that one day, when we can be together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...For that one day, when we can be together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「仲が悪くないとダメなんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝We must keep our distance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝We must keep our distance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そう決めたの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's how things are.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's how things are.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「がまんすることしか、かなたにあげるものはないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I can't do anything for you except endure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I can't do anything for you except endure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私は、何も、持っていないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Since I... don't have... anything...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Since I... don't have... anything...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「かなたが、ぜんぶ…持っていていいんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Kanata, you can have... everything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Kanata, you can have... everything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ゆずらなくていいの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You don't have to give anything up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You don't have to give anything up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…それでも、かなたは、はんぶんこにしてくれるんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Even so, you would share half of it with me, huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Even so, you would share half of it with me, huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ひとりで持っていればよかったのに。おかあさんのかみどめ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It'd have been alright for you to take all the hair ties from Mom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It'd have been alright for you to take all the hair ties from Mom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…はるか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Haruka...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Haruka...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ありがとう。大事にする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Thank you. I'll treasure them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Thank you. I'll treasure them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どんなことかなたにされても、それがお芝居だって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No matter what you do to me, it's all an act.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No matter what you do to me, it's all an act.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「信じることができるように」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝In order to believe that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝In order to believe that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私、かみどめ、ふたつ、つけてるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I will... put on these hair ties, alright?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I will... put on these hair ties, alright?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 私はうなずいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: 手を繋いで、抱きしめたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to embrace her, holding hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to embrace her, holding hands.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、そうしたら、私は二度といもうとに辛く当たれなくなってしまう気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: But I realized. Once I did that, I would never be able to treat her badly again.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I realized. Once I did that, I would never be able to treat her badly again.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、しなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: So, I didn't.
MESSAGE.Translation: So, I didn't.

MESSAGE.JP: そっと離れる。
MESSAGE.EN: I softly pulled away from Haruka.
MESSAGE.Translation: I softly pulled away from Haruka.

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下から足音が聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: There are footsteps from the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: There are footsteps from the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はじめよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Let's start.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Let's start.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…いつか、終わることのできる日まで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Until the day all of this comes to an end...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Until the day all of this comes to an end...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「みんな、いっしょに、たのしく、くらせるときまで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Until the day... all of us get to live happily together...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Until the day... all of us get to live happily together...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: いもうとを見下ろし、声を張り上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked down at my sister and raised my voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked down at my sister and raised my voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…また負けたはるかはほんとうに、だめなこだね！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...You lost again, Haruka. Such a useless child!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...You lost again, Haruka. Such a useless child!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 語尾が震えた。
MESSAGE.EN: My words were trembling.
MESSAGE.Translation: My words were trembling.

MESSAGE.JP: 私たちは…『仲が悪い姉妹』に、戻った。
MESSAGE.EN: We returned to... being quarreling sisters.
MESSAGE.Translation: We returned to... being quarreling sisters.

MESSAGE.JP: 私はベッドから起きあがった。
MESSAGE.EN: I wake up in my bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wake up in my bed.

MESSAGE.JP: ぽたぽた、とシーツに何かこぼれた。
MESSAGE.EN: *Drip*, something wet is trickling down on the sheet.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Drip*, something wet is trickling down on the sheet.

MESSAGE.JP: ぼんやりとした頭で考える。
MESSAGE.EN: I start thinking foggily.
MESSAGE.Translation: I start thinking foggily.

MESSAGE.JP: 視界がさだまらない。
MESSAGE.EN: I turn my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turn my head.

MESSAGE.JP: ベッドの脇を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: The bedside.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bedside.

MESSAGE.JP: カーテンの隙間からの光で、髪留めがにぶく光っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: My hair ties shine dully from the light streaming through a gap between the curtains.
MESSAGE.Translation: My hair ties shine dully from the light streaming through a gap between the curtains.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@（今更戻れるものですか…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@(We can't go back anymore, can we...?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@(We can't go back anymore, can we...?)

MESSAGE.JP: それにどんな意味があるだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: What meaning would that have?
MESSAGE.Translation: What meaning would that have?

MESSAGE.JP: 意味なんてない。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no meaning to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no meaning to it.

MESSAGE.JP: だからこのままでいい。
MESSAGE.EN: Therefore, this is fine.
MESSAGE.Translation: Therefore, this is fine.

MESSAGE.JP: 今のまま、現状を維持したまま…それだけで私はよかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Keeping things as they are now... I am fine with it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Keeping things as they are now... I am fine with it.

MESSAGE.JP: 目覚ましが鳴る前に起きる。
MESSAGE.EN: I woke up before my alarm clock rang.
MESSAGE.Translation: I woke up before my alarm clock rang.

MESSAGE.JP: 日課となった朝の寮長室。
MESSAGE.EN: It was time for the daily routine at the dorm heads' room.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was time for the daily routine at the dorm heads' room.

MESSAGE.JP: 仕事のリストを受け取った。
MESSAGE.EN: I received the list of tasks.
MESSAGE.Translation: I received the list of tasks.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「…そうそう、直枝くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝...Ah right, Naoe-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝...Ah right, Naoe-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「あなたたち、時々グラウンドで野球をしているみたいだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝You guys play baseball at the field from time to time, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝You guys play baseball at the field from time to time, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「しばらく控えたほうがいいわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝You should hold back for a while.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝You should hold back for a while.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしてです？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why is that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why is that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「…二木さんが、昨日、グラウンドの利用申請の厳格化を通知したみたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝...Futaki-san put up a notice yesterday, restricting the use of the field.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝...Futaki-san put up a notice yesterday, restricting the use of the field.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「今、運動部会はてんやわんやよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Right now, all the sport clubs are in a chaos.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Right now, all the sport clubs are in a chaos.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「おかげでほら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝And that's the reason.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝And that's the reason.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「ご覧の通り苦情の山が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝You can see this mountain of complaints.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝You can see this mountain of complaints.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「しかも当のかなちゃんは手伝ってくれないときたもんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝However, Kana-chan is not coming to help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝However, Kana-chan is not coming to help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「何この理不尽」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝So unreasonable.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝So unreasonable.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「さすがの私にも手に余るわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Even I can't handle this much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Even I can't handle this much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして両手を挙げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She raised her arms in resignation.
MESSAGE.Translation: She raised her arms in resignation.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「まさにお手上げ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I'm just about to give up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I'm just about to give up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なんでそんなことを」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Why would she do that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Why would she do that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「理由も不明だから余計ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I don't know her reasons.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I don't know her reasons.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんと話してみます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I will try to talk to Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I will try to talk to Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「…ほんと？　助かるなぁ。ありがと、直枝くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝...Really? Thanks. You're a lifesaver, Naoe-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝...Really? Thanks. You're a lifesaver, Naoe-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いえ、別の動機もありますから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, it's nothing... Besides, I have my own reasons.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, it's nothing... Besides, I have my own reasons.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「そっか。よろしくね…かなちゃん、最近顔色わるいから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Is that so? Do your best... Recently, Kana-chan doesn't seem too well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Is that so? Do your best... Recently, Kana-chan doesn't seem too well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「ゆっくり寝られてないわね、あれは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Maybe she hasn't been sleeping well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Maybe she hasn't been sleeping well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は頷いて、寮長室を出た。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded and left the dorm heads' room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded and left the dorm heads' room.

MESSAGE.JP: 放課後、委員会室をのぞいてみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: Let's take a look into the committee room after school.
MESSAGE.Translation: Let's take a look into the committee room after school.

MESSAGE.JP: 委員会室をのぞいてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I peeked into the committee room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I peeked into the committee room.

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「…委員長、だいじょうぶですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝...Are you alright, chairman?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝...Are you alright, chairman?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員２@「だいぶお疲れのようですし、休まれても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 2@❝You seems quite tired, maybe you should rest...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 2@❝You seems quite tired, maybe you should rest...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「問題ないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There's no problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There's no problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「しかし、ですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Still...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Still...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「…あちこちから反発の声があがっています」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝...We have opposition from various places.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝...We have opposition from various places.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員２@「せっかく利用方法を緩めたのに…何故活動時間の締め付けを？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 2@❝We just made it easier to get permission... why are we restricting the usage hours?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 2@❝We just made it easier to get permission... why are we restricting the usage hours?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員２@「運動部会から不満があがってます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 2@❝The sports clubs are raising complaints like there's no tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 2@❝The sports clubs are raising complaints like there's no tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 新人戦も、学祭準備もあるのに、と声が上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: They were also making trouble over the newcomers' tournament and school festival preparations.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were also making trouble over the newcomers' tournament and school festival preparations.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…問題があったから元に戻しただけよ。なにか文句でも？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...There were issues, so I just reverted it back. Any problems with that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...There were issues, so I just reverted it back. Any problems with that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「予約がダブって騒いだ生徒がいたの知ってるでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You know we have constant quarrels because the times they reserved overlap, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You know we have constant quarrels because the times they reserved overlap, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員３@「…一握りの部が予約押えまくってしまったんですよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 3@❝...A handful of clubs is hogging all of the field time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 3@❝...A handful of clubs is hogging all of the field time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員４@「そんなの不公平すぎるから抗議するのは当たり前です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 4@❝It's obvious there'd be resistance to such unfairness.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 4@❝It's obvious there'd be resistance to such unfairness.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…じゃその予約を全部なしにして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Then cancel all those arrangements.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Then cancel all those arrangements.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員３@「そんな行き当たりばったりな！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 3@❝We can't do that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 3@❝We can't do that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 傍目からみても、二木さんの言い方は理屈にあっていなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even from an outsider's perspective, Futaki-san's words had no logic to them.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even from an outsider's perspective, Futaki-san's words had no logic to them.

MESSAGE.JP: ささいなことで八つ当たりをしていると思われてもしようがないことをしている。
MESSAGE.EN: Anybody would think that she's so stressed out from every little thing that she's just taking it on the other committee members.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anybody would think that she's so stressed out from every little thing that she's just taking it on the other committee members.

MESSAGE.JP: 委員達もさすがにそれを止めようとしている。
MESSAGE.EN: The committee members were naturally trying to stop that.
MESSAGE.Translation: The committee members were naturally trying to stop that.

MESSAGE.JP: しかし虚勢を張っている二木さんは折れそうもない。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san, however, seemed to be putting up a brave front and wasn't yielding.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san, however, seemed to be putting up a brave front and wasn't yielding.

MESSAGE.JP: 段々しらけた空気が漂いはじめている。
MESSAGE.EN: The atmosphere was starting to turn chilly.
MESSAGE.Translation: The atmosphere was starting to turn chilly.

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「…では決を採りましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝...Then let's vote.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝...Then let's vote.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とうとう焦れたひとりがそう言った。
MESSAGE.EN: An impatient member spoke up.
MESSAGE.Translation: An impatient member spoke up.

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「利用申請方法を変える必要はないと思われますがどうでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Who thinks we don't have to change the way clubs register for the use of the field?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Who thinks we don't have to change the way clubs register for the use of the field?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 賛成、と委員達が手を挙げる。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone raised their hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone raised their hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは教室の中をぐるりと見渡し、そして俯いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san looked over the room, and lowered her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san looked over the room, and lowered her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 反対者はいなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no opposition.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no opposition.

MESSAGE.JP: そのほかの議事も、二木さん抜きで話が進んでいく。
MESSAGE.EN: Other proceedings went ahead without Futaki-san as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: Other proceedings went ahead without Futaki-san as well.

MESSAGE.JP: 委員会は終わったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Finally the committee meeting came to an end.
MESSAGE.Translation: Finally the committee meeting came to an end.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: がらんとした空き教室。
MESSAGE.EN: The classroom had emptied.
MESSAGE.Translation: The classroom had emptied.

MESSAGE.JP: 机に腰掛けて二木さんはぼんやりと外を見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was sitting on a desk, gazing vacantly outside.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was sitting on a desk, gazing vacantly outside.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…なんだ、直枝か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...What, it's Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...What, it's Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんだとはご挨拶だね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What a greeting...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What a greeting...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたと話す気分じゃないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I don't feel like talking to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I don't feel like talking to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さっきの…見てたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I saw... what happened earlier.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I saw... what happened earlier.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたには関係ないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It has nothing to do with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It has nothing to do with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…どうしていきなり厳しくしようと思ったのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why did you suddenly decide to tighten the rules?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why did you suddenly decide to tighten the rules?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 部室の件で根回しをしていた同じひととは思えない。
MESSAGE.EN: It's no surprise the clubs would be outraged.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's no surprise the clubs would be outraged.

MESSAGE.JP: なおさら運動部も反発するだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Until this sudden change of heart, she had been trying to build a consensus between the clubs.
MESSAGE.Translation: Until this sudden change of heart, she had been trying to build a consensus between the clubs.

MESSAGE.JP: 自分たちの代弁者だと思ったのに、いきなり締め付けにかかっては。
MESSAGE.EN: The very person they were counting on to help them tightened the rules instead.
MESSAGE.Translation: The very person they were counting on to help them tightened the rules instead.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「厳しくはなってないわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝They didn't get stricter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝They didn't get stricter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「否決されちゃったし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It was voted down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It was voted down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笑う二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san smiled.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san smiled.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「いいところなしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There's nothing good about me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There's nothing good about me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「無様だわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Unsightly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Unsightly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 俯く二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san hung her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san hung her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんのいいところっていうのは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You handled the committee work very well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You handled the committee work very well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「委員会の仕事を上手くこなしてるとか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I don't think that's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I don't think that's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういうところだけじゃないと、思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...your only good point.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...your only good point.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…私は今のままでいなくちゃいけない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I must remain as I am now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I must remain as I am now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「変わりたくない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I don't want to change.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I don't want to change.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「変わる必要も、ない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There's no need to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There's no need to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは頑なだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was obstinate.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was obstinate.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「遅刻したんだって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I heard you were late for class?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I heard you were late for class?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…誰から聞いたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Who did you hear that from?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Who did you hear that from?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It was Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It was Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そう…あの子のことだから、おもしろおかしく笑っていたんでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I see... if it's that girl, she must've been laughing happily about it, huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I see... if it's that girl, she must've been laughing happily about it, huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「違うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's wrong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's wrong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「心配してたよ、二木さんのこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She was worried about you, Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She was worried about you, Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「寝ないで勉強しても遅刻しない二木さんが遅刻するなんてよほどだ、って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She was worried since you were late, and you're never late no matter how late into the night you study.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She was worried since you were late, and you're never late no matter how late into the night you study.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「予習復習もできてなかったぐらいだから、って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You also weren't ready for class either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You also weren't ready for class either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…毎日寝ないで勉強とか、すごいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You have a talent for operating on very little sleep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You have a talent for operating on very little sleep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ほめ殺しでもしたいのならよそでやってよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You can keep your backhanded compliments.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You can keep your backhanded compliments.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「本当にそう思ってるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I really think so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I really think so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…私は…常に努力しないと並以下だから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I... wouldn't be able to keep up if I didn't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I... wouldn't be able to keep up if I didn't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「全然ほめられることじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It's nothing to write home about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It's nothing to write home about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「やらないとだめになるからやってるだけよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm just doing it because I would fail otherwise.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm just doing it because I would fail otherwise.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「守らなければ怒られないのと同じで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm just doing this to protect myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm just doing this to protect myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「やっていれば維持できるから…やっているだけよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I have to work hard in order to maintain my grades... that's all there is to it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I have to work hard in order to maintain my grades... that's all there is to it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: どこか寂しそうに二木さんが呟く。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san's murmur felt somewhat lonely.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san's murmur felt somewhat lonely.

MESSAGE.JP: どれぐらいその努力を続けてきたのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: For how long has she been doing this?
MESSAGE.Translation: For how long has she been doing this?

MESSAGE.JP: 綻びが出てきたのは…なぜだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: And for how long has it been too much for her to bear?
MESSAGE.Translation: And for how long has it been too much for her to bear?

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ひとりにしてくれないかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Would you just leave me alone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Would you just leave me alone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うん。わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Right. I understand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Right. I understand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 教室を出る。
MESSAGE.EN: I left the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I left the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 机に行儀悪く座ったままの二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was still sitting at the desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was still sitting at the desk.

MESSAGE.JP: なんとか、ならないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Did I manage to do anything?
MESSAGE.Translation: Did I manage to do anything?

MESSAGE.JP: 頑なな二木さんの態度をほぐす方法が、今の僕には思いつかなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't think there's anything I can do to change her mind right now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't think there's anything I can do to change her mind right now.

MESSAGE.JP: 夏の暑い日。
MESSAGE.EN: A hot summer day.
MESSAGE.Translation: A hot summer day.

MESSAGE.JP: 私は火照った足を水で冷やしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I cooled my burning legs with some water.
MESSAGE.Translation: I cooled my burning legs with some water.

MESSAGE.JP: 陸上部でも今日の私以上に走ることはないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Even track club members don't have to run as much as I did today.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even track club members don't have to run as much as I did today.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ふぅ……」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Haa......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Haa......❞

MESSAGE.JP: 上は長袖のジャージを着ているからなおさら汗だくだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Wearing a long sleeved jersey made it even more suffocating.
MESSAGE.Translation: Wearing a long sleeved jersey made it even more suffocating.

MESSAGE.JP: 行儀が悪いと叱られるだろうが、私は蛇口の下に頭を入れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I put my head under the faucet. If someone saw, I'd probably get scolded for improper behavior.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put my head under the faucet. If someone saw, I'd probably get scolded for improper behavior.

MESSAGE.JP: 水音を聞きながら考える。
MESSAGE.EN: While listening to the sound of water, I thought to myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: While listening to the sound of water, I thought to myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 途中から地面にへたり込んだ葉留佳はどうなっただろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: How did Haruka do? She had stumbled halfway through...
MESSAGE.Translation: How did Haruka do? She had stumbled halfway through...

MESSAGE.JP: きゅ。蛇口を止めて顔を上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: I stopped the water and looked up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stopped the water and looked up.

MESSAGE.JP: いもうとがいた。
MESSAGE.EN: My little sister was there.
MESSAGE.Translation: My little sister was there.

MESSAGE.JP: 私たちは会話を交わさなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: We didn't exchange a word.
MESSAGE.Translation: We didn't exchange a word.

MESSAGE.JP: まだ日は高い。
MESSAGE.EN: The sun was still high.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sun was still high.

MESSAGE.JP: 昼間、会話しないほうがいいのはわかっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: We knew it was better not to talk during the day.
MESSAGE.Translation: We knew it was better not to talk during the day.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰が見ているかわからないのだから。
MESSAGE.EN: We didn't know if anybody would see us.
MESSAGE.Translation: We didn't know if anybody would see us.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…使う？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...You need this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...You need this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: それでも言ってしまったのはなぜだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet, why did I say that?
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet, why did I say that?

MESSAGE.JP: 腕も、足も傷だらけ泥だらけで、ふらふらしている姿を見たら、心配にもなる。
MESSAGE.EN: Her arms and legs were full of scratches and mud, and she was staggering on her feet. I became worried.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her arms and legs were full of scratches and mud, and she was staggering on her feet. I became worried.

MESSAGE.JP: これぐらいは、心配しても怒られないはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: If it's this much, I shouldn't be scolded for showing concern for her.
MESSAGE.Translation: If it's this much, I shouldn't be scolded for showing concern for her.

MESSAGE.JP: 蛇口をひねる。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned the faucet.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned the faucet.

MESSAGE.JP: 流れる水を見ている瞳はどんよりと曇っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: My eyes watching the flowing water were clouding over.
MESSAGE.Translation: My eyes watching the flowing water were clouding over.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「……どうかした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝......What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝......What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「う、ううん。なんでもないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Ah, no, it's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Ah, no, it's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「あなたこそ、どうしたの？　今日はいつも以上にだらしなかったじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝You too, what's wrong?　Aren't you sloppier than usual today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝You too, what's wrong?　Aren't you sloppier than usual today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: いもうとの顔色は悪かった。
MESSAGE.EN: She wasn't looking well.
MESSAGE.Translation: She wasn't looking well.

MESSAGE.JP: 走る前からそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was already like that before she ran.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was already like that before she ran.

MESSAGE.JP: 何も食べていないかのように、青白く、元気がなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was pale, as though she hadn't been eating.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was pale, as though she hadn't been eating.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Is that so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Is that so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「張り切りすぎじゃない？　ついていくの大変だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Aren't you just trying too hard?　I couldn't keep up...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Aren't you just trying too hard?　I couldn't keep up...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ちゃんと練習しなさいよ。真面目にやらないと張り合いがない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Please practice properly. If you don't take it seriously, you won't match me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Please practice properly. If you don't take it seriously, you won't match me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「手を抜くのもいいかげんにしなさいよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Stop being so shoddy as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Stop being so shoddy as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「練習、してるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I am... practicing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I am... practicing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…そう。なら、いいけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Is that so? That's fine, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Is that so? That's fine, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 家庭科の課題。
MESSAGE.EN: From home economics...
MESSAGE.Translation: From home economics...

MESSAGE.JP: マラソン大会。
MESSAGE.EN: ...to foot races.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...to foot races.

MESSAGE.JP: …ずっと続いている私たちの比べ合い。
MESSAGE.EN: Each and every time we were compared.
MESSAGE.Translation: Each and every time we were compared.

MESSAGE.JP: いもうとはそのうち、学校に行かなくなった。
MESSAGE.EN: My little sister stopped going to school.
MESSAGE.Translation: My little sister stopped going to school.

MESSAGE.JP: 負け続けたいもうとが自信を無くし、行きたくない、と言ったのだという。
