MESSAGE.EN: Her only support was crushed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her only support was crushed.

MESSAGE.JP: 混乱のあまり、この子は私を憎むことに感情のはけ口を見出したのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She was probably using her hatred toward me as a means to vent her emotions.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was probably using her hatred toward me as a means to vent her emotions.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@（だったら…理由のことなんか、知らない方がいい）
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@(If that's the case... it's better for her to not know the reason.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@(If that's the case... it's better for her to not know the reason.)

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@（知らないまま、私を憎んでいればいい）
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@(It's alright for her to keep hating me.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@(It's alright for her to keep hating me.)

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@（憎しみを抱えることで前を向いていけるのなら）
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@(If she can face forward by holding onto that hatred.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@(If she can face forward by holding onto that hatred.)

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@（それで少しでも生きようと思ってくれるのなら）
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@(If that allows her to keep even a little of the will to live.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@(If that allows her to keep even a little of the will to live.)

MESSAGE.JP: 悲劇に酔っぱらうことでも、ひとは生きてゆける。
MESSAGE.EN: Some people feed off the tragedy of their lives and this is what helps them through.
MESSAGE.Translation: Some people feed off the tragedy of their lives and this is what helps them through.

MESSAGE.JP: あぁ自分だけが辛いんだ、不幸なんだ、と自分以外を罵ることで自分を守ることができる。
MESSAGE.EN: In order to protect yourself, you act as if you're the only one who is suffering and put blame on others.
MESSAGE.Translation: In order to protect yourself, you act as if you're the only one who is suffering and put blame on others.

MESSAGE.JP: そのためには、敵が必要だ。
MESSAGE.EN: For that, an enemy is needed.
MESSAGE.Translation: For that, an enemy is needed.

MESSAGE.JP: わかりやすい敵が。
MESSAGE.EN: A simple, easily understood enemy.
MESSAGE.Translation: A simple, easily understood enemy.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@（私は…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@(I will...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@(I will...)

MESSAGE.JP: 私は『本当の敵』であり続けることしか出来なかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I can only keep on being that ❛true enemy.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I can only keep on being that ❛true enemy.❜

MESSAGE.JP: こころを明かせないのであれば、そうするしかなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: If I couldn't lay bare my heart, that was the only thing I could do.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I couldn't lay bare my heart, that was the only thing I could do.

MESSAGE.JP: それ以外の方法なんか…私には、わからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I... couldn't think of... any other way.
MESSAGE.Translation: I... couldn't think of... any other way.

MESSAGE.JP: 雨が降っている。服に泥が跳ねるのも構わず、私は走った。
MESSAGE.EN: It was raining. I ran without care for my muddied clothes.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was raining. I ran without care for my muddied clothes.

MESSAGE.JP: ぼろぼろの小屋。
MESSAGE.EN: The rundown shed.
MESSAGE.Translation: The rundown shed.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はぁ、はぁっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Haa, haa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Haa, haa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 扉を力任せに開ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I flung the door open with all my strength.
MESSAGE.Translation: I flung the door open with all my strength.

MESSAGE.JP: 私は、絶句した。
MESSAGE.EN: I was struck speechless.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was struck speechless.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな。だって。どうして。
MESSAGE.EN: This can't be... But why?
MESSAGE.Translation: This can't be... But why?

MESSAGE.JP: 目の前にいるのは、泥土の中で座り込んでいるいもうとの姿だった。
MESSAGE.EN: The sight of my sister, squatting in the mud, came before my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sight of my sister, squatting in the mud, came before my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 見上げる。屋根は穴だらけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked up. The roof was full of holes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked up. The roof was full of holes.

MESSAGE.JP: 壁はすきまだらけ。雨風がしのげるどころではない。
MESSAGE.EN: The walls were filled with gaps. This place couldn't withstand such rain and wind.
MESSAGE.Translation: The walls were filled with gaps. This place couldn't withstand such rain and wind.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「人の住む場所じゃない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝It's not a place to live...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝It's not a place to live...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 複数の足音が私に追いつく。
MESSAGE.EN: Several footsteps got closer.
MESSAGE.Translation: Several footsteps got closer.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「これは、どういうことなのか、説明してもらえますか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Just what is the meaning of this? Can somebody explain this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Just what is the meaning of this? Can somebody explain this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 振り返らず私は訊ねた。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked without turning back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked without turning back.

MESSAGE.JP: 『た、大したことじゃない』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛I-it's no big deal.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛I-it's no big deal.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『別に住んでいるわけじゃない』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛It's not like she's living here.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛It's not like she's living here.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『今日は、たまたま、そう、たまたまいただけだ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛She just happened to be here today. A pure coincidence.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛She just happened to be here today. A pure coincidence.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「……はるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝......Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝......Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 泥土に踏み出す。ぐしゃりと不愉快な音を立てた。
MESSAGE.EN: I stepped into the mud. *Splash*, it made an unpleasant sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stepped into the mud. *Splash*, it made an unpleasant sound.

MESSAGE.JP: 座り込んだいもうとは、ぼんやりと宙を見つめるだけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: My sister was squatting down, staring mindlessly into air.
MESSAGE.Translation: My sister was squatting down, staring mindlessly into air.

MESSAGE.JP: 白いプラスティックの皿が散乱している。
MESSAGE.EN: There were white plastic plates scattered around.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were white plastic plates scattered around.

MESSAGE.JP: 泥で汚れたその皿の上には、何がのっていたのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Just what was the purpose of those soiled plates?
MESSAGE.Translation: Just what was the purpose of those soiled plates?

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はるか……」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Haruka......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Haruka......❞

MESSAGE.JP: 側にしゃがみこんで、手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: I stepped into the mud and extended my hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stepped into the mud and extended my hands.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「……ひっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝......Hii!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝......Hii!❞

MESSAGE.JP: いもうとは頭を抱えて、後ずさる。
MESSAGE.EN: She held her head, retreating into the corner.
MESSAGE.Translation: She held her head, retreating into the corner.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あ、あぁ、あぁぅぅ……っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝A, aa, aaaau......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝A, aa, aaaau......❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Haruka?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Haruka?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いや……いやっ……もう、しっぱい、しないから、つぎは、つぎはがんばるからぁっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No...... no...... I won't fail anymore, next, next time, I will work hard!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No...... no...... I won't fail anymore, next, next time, I will work hard!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「わたし、がんばるからっ…がんばる、がんばるからぁぁっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I, will work hard... I will try!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I, will work hard... I will try!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 悲痛な叫びが耳を打つ。
MESSAGE.EN: The bitter screams pierced my ears.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bitter screams pierced my ears.

MESSAGE.JP: 私を認識できず、いもうとはわめくだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She couldn't recognize me, and just kept on wailing.
MESSAGE.Translation: She couldn't recognize me, and just kept on wailing.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「どうして……」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Why......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Why......❞

MESSAGE.JP: 立ち上がる。握りしめた拳が震えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood up. My clenched fists were shaking.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood up. My clenched fists were shaking.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「私の…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Just what...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Just what...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「わたしの、はるかに、なにをしたぁぁっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Just what did you do to my Haruka!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Just what did you do to my Haruka!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 胸ぐらを掴む。
MESSAGE.EN: I grabbed his collar.
MESSAGE.Translation: I grabbed his collar.

MESSAGE.JP: 親族の一人。
MESSAGE.EN: He was one of my relatives.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was one of my relatives.

MESSAGE.JP: 名前なんか思い出せない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't remember his name.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't remember his name.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「約束したじゃない。あなたたちは、私が頑張れば、はるかに何もしないって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Didn't you promise? As long as I work hard, you won't do anything to Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Didn't you promise? As long as I work hard, you won't do anything to Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「そう言ったのに！　これはなに？　これは、どういうことなのよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝You said that! What is this? What is the meaning of this!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝You said that! What is this? What is the meaning of this!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「答えなさいよ。答えなさい！　なんで黙ってるの！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Answer me. Answer me! Why are you not speaking?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Answer me. Answer me! Why are you not speaking?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「答えてよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Answer me!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Answer me!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 誰も喋らなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Nobody said anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nobody said anything.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝の家の人間たち。
MESSAGE.EN: The people from the Saigusa family.
MESSAGE.Translation: The people from the Saigusa family.

MESSAGE.JP: 私のすることに陰口を叩きながらも、消極的に、賛意を示してくれたはずだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought they'd been passively approving of my plans despite ridiculing them behind my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought they'd been passively approving of my plans despite ridiculing them behind my back.

MESSAGE.JP: 諦観と共に、反対はしなかったひとたち。
MESSAGE.EN: They'd accepted their fates and didn't oppose the state of things.
MESSAGE.Translation: They'd accepted their fates and didn't oppose the state of things.

MESSAGE.JP: 私がいる限り、失われるだけのひとたち。
MESSAGE.EN: They were bound to vanish as long as I was there.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were bound to vanish as long as I was there.

MESSAGE.JP: 二つの家の公平な扱いを実現する――長い間説得して、ようやく味方につけたひとたち。
MESSAGE.EN: Hadn't I persuaded them to become my allies in my mission for equality of the two families?
MESSAGE.Translation: Hadn't I persuaded them to become my allies in my mission for equality of the two families?

MESSAGE.JP: それなのに、なぜ？
MESSAGE.EN: Yet, why?
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet, why?

MESSAGE.JP: なぜ今更葉留佳をこんな目に…？
MESSAGE.EN: Why did they put Haruka in such a situation now...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why did they put Haruka in such a situation now...?

MESSAGE.JP: 『佳奈多、止めなさい』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Kanata, please stop.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Kanata, please stop.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『三枝さんたちにも理由があったのだよ。困窮していたからね』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛The Saigusas have their reasons too. They were suffering from poverty.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛The Saigusas have their reasons too. They were suffering from poverty.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『はけ口が必要だったのだ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛They needed an outlet for their anger.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛They needed an outlet for their anger.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「……っ」
`佳奈多@「知っていたのね。おじ様たちも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝You knew about it, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝You knew about it, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 私は二木の叔父たちをにらみ付けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I glared at the people from the Futaki family.
MESSAGE.Translation: I glared at the people from the Futaki family.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「『私に決まった』から、もうおしまいにする、と言ったのは、嘘だったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Didn't you promise you'd end it after I was chosen? Was that a lie?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Didn't you promise you'd end it after I was chosen? Was that a lie?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『嘘ではないよ。おしまいにした。比べることをやめたではないかね』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛We weren't lying. We ended it. Haven't we stopped comparing you two?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛We weren't lying. We ended it. Haven't we stopped comparing you two?❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「では、どうしてこんなこと…！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Then, why are such things...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Then, why are such things...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 叫んだ私は、ふと気がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: While shouting, I suddenly realized.
MESSAGE.Translation: While shouting, I suddenly realized.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…まさか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Could it be...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Could it be...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「まさか、私のせい、と言いたいの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Could it be, you are trying to say, it's my fault...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Could it be, you are trying to say, it's my fault...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沈黙。
MESSAGE.EN: Silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Silence.

MESSAGE.JP: 大人たちは是とも否とも口にしなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: The adults neither denied nor affirmed it.
MESSAGE.Translation: The adults neither denied nor affirmed it.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、沈黙した。
MESSAGE.EN: There was just silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was just silence.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…私が、おかしな慣習を止めさせようとしたから…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Because I wanted to stop this ridiculous custom...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Because I wanted to stop this ridiculous custom...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ――『私たち』の評判はよくない。
MESSAGE.EN: ――❛We❜ don't have a good reputation.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――❛We❜ don't have a good reputation.

MESSAGE.JP: 昔は地主だっただけだ。偉くもなんともない。
MESSAGE.EN: We used to own the lands here. That's all there's to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: We used to own the lands here. That's all there's to it.

MESSAGE.JP: それなのに社会という人間関係の中でとかく仕切ろうとする。まとめようとする。
MESSAGE.EN: But we tried to meddle in the human relationships called society. We tried to order other people around.
MESSAGE.Translation: But we tried to meddle in the human relationships called society. We tried to order other people around.

MESSAGE.JP: だから反感を買う。
MESSAGE.EN: Therefore the animosity.
MESSAGE.Translation: Therefore the animosity.

MESSAGE.JP: 例えば、自治会費や協力費という名目で各世帯から集金していることもそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: For example, using the pretext of ❛autonomy fee❜ or ❛cooperation fee❜ to collect money from other households.
MESSAGE.Translation: For example, using the pretext of ❛autonomy fee❜ or ❛cooperation fee❜ to collect money from other households.

MESSAGE.JP: 微々たる金額。そんなことしなくてもいいはずだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That was petty money. We didn't need to do that.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was petty money. We didn't need to do that.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…でも、みんな知ってるでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Still, you all knew about it, didn't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Still, you all knew about it, didn't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「どうして寄り合いで、道ばたで陰口叩かれているのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Why at the meetings, or on the roadside, people always gossip about us?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Why at the meetings, or on the roadside, people always gossip about us?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「大した力もないのに、見せかけの権威だけふりかざすから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Because you tried to put on a show of power, despite not having any.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Because you tried to put on a show of power, despite not having any.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「誰もが止めたい、と思っているはず…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Everyone wants to stop it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Everyone wants to stop it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 私は近所のひとたちに頭を下げて回った。
MESSAGE.EN: I had gone around bowing to everyone in the neighborhood.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had gone around bowing to everyone in the neighborhood.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@『お願いします。私だけじゃダメです』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❛Please. I need your help.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❛Please. I need your help.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@『みなさんからも言ってください。もう払いたくないと』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❛You must say it too. That you don't want to pay anymore.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❛You must say it too. That you don't want to pay anymore.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@『親族の全員が今のままでいいと思っているわけではないんです』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❛I don't think all my relatives like how things are now.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❛I don't think all my relatives like how things are now.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@『お願いします。協力してくださいっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❛Please help me.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❛Please help me.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 私は変えたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to change.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to change.

MESSAGE.JP: あの子が私に教えてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: That girl taught me.
MESSAGE.Translation: That girl taught me.

MESSAGE.JP: 私を敵だと今は認識しているあの子だけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: That girl who now only recognizes me as an enemy.
MESSAGE.Translation: That girl who now only recognizes me as an enemy.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも、私は約束を忘れたくなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite that, I did not want to forget our promise.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite that, I did not want to forget our promise.

MESSAGE.JP: 『わたしのことならいいよ。がまんする。がんばる』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Don't worry about me. I will endure. I will try my best.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Don't worry about me. I will endure. I will try my best.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『わたしはだめな子のままでいる。だから』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛I will keep being the bad child, so.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛I will keep being the bad child, so.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『…かなたなら、できるよ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛...Kanata, you can do it.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛...Kanata, you can do it.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『おねえちゃん、がんばって』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Onee-chan, do your best.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Onee-chan, do your best.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 冷笑されても、あしらわれても、断られても。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if I was treated with derision, even if I was rejected.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if I was treated with derision, even if I was rejected.

MESSAGE.JP: 扉を閉ざされても、無視されても、それでも。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if doors closed on me, even if I was ignored, even so.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if doors closed on me, even if I was ignored, even so.

MESSAGE.JP: 近所のひとに訴え続けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I appealed to my neighbors.
MESSAGE.Translation: I appealed to my neighbors.

MESSAGE.JP: こんなのおかしい。間違ってる。
MESSAGE.EN: This is not right. It's unjust.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is not right. It's unjust.

MESSAGE.JP: 歯を食いしばり、頭を下げ続けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I held it in and kept bowing my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I held it in and kept bowing my head.

MESSAGE.JP: 一つずつ無くしていけばいい。
MESSAGE.EN: Even a small change is fine.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even a small change is fine.

MESSAGE.JP: 小さなことから変えてゆけばいい。
MESSAGE.EN: It's fine if we begin the change from small things.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's fine if we begin the change from small things.

MESSAGE.JP: 大人たちは何れみな、私より先に死ぬ。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter what, the adults will die before me.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter what, the adults will die before me.

MESSAGE.JP: 全部変えてしまったら、あの子と一緒に、父さんたちを迎えに行こう。
MESSAGE.EN: After everything has changed, let's go and meet our parents, that girl and I together.
MESSAGE.Translation: After everything has changed, let's go and meet our parents, that girl and I together.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたり、手を繋いで。
MESSAGE.EN: The two of us, holding hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two of us, holding hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 夢みたいな話だけど、でも、時間は、あるのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It is like a dream, but time is definitely on my side.
MESSAGE.Translation: It is like a dream, but time is definitely on my side.

MESSAGE.JP: 全部終わったら、あの子に話そう。
MESSAGE.EN: After everything's over, I'll talk to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: After everything's over, I'll talk to her.

MESSAGE.JP: どれだけ時間が掛かっても、わかってくれるまで、理由を話して…。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter how long it takes, I will keep explaining until she understands...
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter how long it takes, I will keep explaining until she understands...

MESSAGE.JP: 許して貰おう。
MESSAGE.EN: She will forgive me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She will forgive me.

MESSAGE.JP: そう、考えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Or so I thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: Or so I thought.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…そうなの？　私が変えていこうとするのが気に入らなかった…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Is that it? You didn't like that I was trying to change things...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Is that it? You didn't like that I was trying to change things...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『そんな方向で頑張らなくてもよかったんだよ、佳奈多』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛You don't have to work so hard in that direction, Kanata.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛You don't have to work so hard in that direction, Kanata.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『変えなくて良い。変わらなくて良い。そのままであればいい』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛You don't have to change anything. You don't have to change. This is fine.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛You don't have to change anything. You don't have to change. This is fine.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「……それは、間違ってる、って言ってるのっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...I'm telling you this isn't right!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...I'm telling you this isn't right!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「もう止めたいって、みんな言ってる！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Everyone is saying ❛stop already❜!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Everyone is saying ❛stop already❜!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「あなたたちの中でも賛成してくれたひとがいる！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I know some of you support me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I know some of you support me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ねぇ、誰か、言ってよ！　間違ってる。変えなくちゃ！　そうでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Hey, somebody, say it please!　This is wrong, we have to change! Isn't that right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Hey, somebody, say it please!　This is wrong, we have to change! Isn't that right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沈黙。
MESSAGE.EN: Silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Silence.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「なんで…黙ってるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Why are you... being quiet?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Why are you... being quiet?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「おかしい！　こんなのおかしい！　間違ってる！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Weird! This is weird! It's wrong!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Weird! This is weird! It's wrong!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『しかし、佳奈多。佳奈多は代表ではないのだよ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Still, Kanata. You aren't our representative, right?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Still, Kanata. You aren't our representative, right?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『今はまだ。そうだろう？　相応しい結婚をするまでは』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Not yet. Isn't that so?　Not until after a proper marriage.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Not yet. Isn't that so?　Not until after a proper marriage.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「それは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝That is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝That is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「大学を卒業したあとの、話だったではないですか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Isn't that after I graduate from university...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Isn't that after I graduate from university...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんとか冷静さを取り戻そうとする。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to regain my composure.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to regain my composure.

MESSAGE.JP: 口調を戻してみても、私は動揺していた。
MESSAGE.EN: Even after I got back my tongue, I was still shaking.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even after I got back my tongue, I was still shaking.

MESSAGE.JP: 『ひと一人、養うのは大変なことだ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛It's not easy to raise a child.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛It's not easy to raise a child.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『働いたことがないきみにはわからないだろうが』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛You are not working, so you may not understand.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛You are not working, so you may not understand.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『家計に余裕のある家ではないのだよ、三枝さんたちは』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛The Saigusas are not a wealthy family.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛The Saigusas are not a wealthy family.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『かといって、佳奈多、おまえに妹を養う力があるかね？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Having said that, Kanata, do you have the ability to support your little sister?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Having said that, Kanata, do you have the ability to support your little sister?❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…何を、いきなり？　今はそんな話をしているわけでは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝What does it have to do with anything? Why are you talking about that now...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝What does it have to do with anything? Why are you talking about that now...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『…変えてもらっては困るんだよ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛...It's troublesome if you change things.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛...It's troublesome if you change things.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『三枝さんたちが何を言ったのか知らないが…』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛I don't know what the Saigusas said, but...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛I don't know what the Saigusas said, but...❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『おまえが変える必要もない』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛You don't need to change anything.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛You don't need to change anything.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「何が言いたいのですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝What are you trying to say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝What are you trying to say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『どうして変えたがる？　おまえは今のままで十分幸せじゃないか』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Why do you want to change? Aren't you plenty happy the way you are now?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Why do you want to change? Aren't you plenty happy the way you are now?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『おまえの欲しい物は全部与えただろう』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛We gave you everything you wanted, didn't we?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛We gave you everything you wanted, didn't we?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『みんなおまえのことを褒めそやしている。鼻が高いよ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Everyone is praising you. We are proud.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Everyone is praising you. We are proud.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『おまえは、必要な存在なんだよ。必要とされているんだ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛You are necessary. You are needed.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛You are necessary. You are needed.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『ここにいていいんだよ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛It's alright for you to be here.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛It's alright for you to be here.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『要らない子じゃない』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛You are not the unneeded child.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛You are not the unneeded child.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『おまえは幸せだ。そうだろう？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛You are happy. Isn't that right?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛You are happy. Isn't that right?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 違う。幸せなんかじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: No. I'm not happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: No. I'm not happy.

MESSAGE.JP: 監視され、やりたくもないことを強いられ、休むことも許されない。
MESSAGE.EN: Being under constant observation, forced to do things I don't want to, not getting any rest.
MESSAGE.Translation: Being under constant observation, forced to do things I don't want to, not getting any rest.

MESSAGE.JP: だから幸せなんかじゃない、とは思っていなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: But that wasn't why I wasn't happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: But that wasn't why I wasn't happy.

MESSAGE.JP: 辛くなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I wasn't suffering.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wasn't suffering.

MESSAGE.JP: そんなことは辛くなんかなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: That wasn't anything much.
MESSAGE.Translation: That wasn't anything much.

MESSAGE.JP: いもうとをこんな目にあわせていること。
MESSAGE.EN: When my sister is to suffer such treatment.
MESSAGE.Translation: When my sister is to suffer such treatment.

MESSAGE.JP: こんなのが、どうして幸せなものか。
MESSAGE.EN: How can I feel happy?
MESSAGE.Translation: How can I feel happy?

MESSAGE.JP: 『変えたい理由は……妹のためだろう？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛The reason you want to change...... is your sister, isn't it?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛The reason you want to change...... is your sister, isn't it?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『妹を救いたいからだろう？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛You want to save her, don't you?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛You want to save her, don't you?❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…そんなわけはありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...No, that's not it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...No, that's not it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「私は、親族一同が悪く言われる理由を取り除きたかっただけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I only want to remove any source of bad gossip about us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I only want to remove any source of bad gossip about us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「悪評を受けている部分を無くしていけば、権威だっていつか取り戻せるでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝If our bad reputation is gone, we may be able to gain authority one day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝If our bad reputation is gone, we may be able to gain authority one day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 私は自分の声が震えていることに気がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I realized my voice was trembling.
MESSAGE.Translation: I realized my voice was trembling.

MESSAGE.JP: 本当の理由を言えば、きっとこのひとたちはあの子を排除するだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: If I said the real reason, they'd definitely remove this girl.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I said the real reason, they'd definitely remove this girl.

MESSAGE.JP: 私の手の届かないところにあの子が行ってしまうことだけは避けたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: The last thing I wanted was for them to take her somewhere out of my reach.
MESSAGE.Translation: The last thing I wanted was for them to take her somewhere out of my reach.

MESSAGE.JP: おとなたちは誰も私たちを救ってくれなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Adults didn't save us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Adults didn't save us.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰かに助けを求めればいい？
MESSAGE.EN: Should I seek help from someone?
MESSAGE.Translation: Should I seek help from someone?

MESSAGE.JP: 逃げればいい？
MESSAGE.EN: Should I just run away?
MESSAGE.Translation: Should I just run away?

MESSAGE.JP: 言うのは簡単だ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's easy to say.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's easy to say.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな簡単に助けが通じるのなら。
MESSAGE.EN: If only help would come that easily.
MESSAGE.Translation: If only help would come that easily.

MESSAGE.JP: そんなにたやすいのだとしたら。
MESSAGE.EN: If only it were that simple.
MESSAGE.Translation: If only it were that simple.

MESSAGE.JP: どうして新聞やテレビで何人もの、何十人ものこどもたちのニュースが流れるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Why are there tens, hundreds of news about children on the newspaper and TV?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why are there tens, hundreds of news about children on the newspaper and TV?

MESSAGE.JP: その子たちは逃げることも思いつかなかったんだと笑いたいのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Do people want to laugh at the fact that they couldn't think of running away?
MESSAGE.Translation: Do people want to laugh at the fact that they couldn't think of running away?

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@（逃げることを考えて、諦めて、ただ下を向いて耐えるしかない辛さを知りもしないくせに！）
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@(Even though they thought about escaping, they gave up, and could only look down and endure the suffering!)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@(Even though they thought about escaping, they gave up, and could only look down and endure the suffering!)

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@（意に沿わないおまえは要らないと殴られる苦しさも味わったことがないくせに！）
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@(Even though you never understood their feelings when they are not needed, or when they are beaten!)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@(Even though you never understood their feelings when they are not needed, or when they are beaten!)

MESSAGE.JP: 当たり前が当たり前のようにあるひとたちはどこか遠い世界みたいに思ってる。
MESSAGE.EN: The people who took their lives for granted seemed so distant to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The people who took their lives for granted seemed so distant to me.

MESSAGE.JP: すぐそばに苦しんでるひとはいっぱいいるのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though there are people suffering close to them.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though there are people suffering close to them.

MESSAGE.JP: 踏みつぶされて、すりきれそうになってるのに、叫べばいい、とのんきに言う。
MESSAGE.EN: Some might ask why don't they scream for help when they are neglected and abused.
MESSAGE.Translation: Some might ask why don't they scream for help when they are neglected and abused.

MESSAGE.JP: 叫ぶことすらできないことだってあるのに！
MESSAGE.EN: Because some of them cannot even scream!
MESSAGE.Translation: Because some of them cannot even scream!

MESSAGE.JP: 『今すぐ妹を救う方法がある』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛There is an immediate way to save your sister now.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛There is an immediate way to save your sister now.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『なんだったら、両親と暮らすというおまえたちの夢を叶えてやってもいい』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛If you like, we can grant your dream of living together with your parents.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛If you like, we can grant your dream of living together with your parents.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「なに…を、言い出すのですか…あなたたちは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝What... are, you saying... you...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝What... are, you saying... you...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばれて、いたのか…？
MESSAGE.EN: Our dream... was known...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Our dream... was known...?

MESSAGE.JP: 両親を捜させていたこと。それも、つつぬけだったのだろうか…？
MESSAGE.EN: That we were searching for our parents. Did they know that too...?
MESSAGE.Translation: That we were searching for our parents. Did they know that too...?

MESSAGE.JP: 語尾は震え、私は自分が怯えていることに気がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: My sentence trailed off. I realized I was frightened.
MESSAGE.Translation: My sentence trailed off. I realized I was frightened.

MESSAGE.JP: 『今やろうとしていることをやめ、おまえ自身の未来を、今、捨てろ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Stop what you are doing now. Throw away your future. Now.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Stop what you are doing now. Throw away your future. Now.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『そうしたら、妹を今すぐ解放してやっていい』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛If you do that, your sister will be released.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛If you do that, your sister will be released.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…そんな条件が飲めるとでも？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...You think I will accept this condition?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...You think I will accept this condition?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 脅しだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a threat.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a threat.

MESSAGE.JP: あの子をこんな状態にしたのも、私を追い込むためなのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: They were trying to corner me by putting her in such a condition.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were trying to corner me by putting her in such a condition.

MESSAGE.JP: 私の養親たちは、私を屈服させようと必死のようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: My foster parents were desperately trying to make me yield.
MESSAGE.Translation: My foster parents were desperately trying to make me yield.

MESSAGE.JP: 表面上親族の方針に従って、あの子を見下し、辛く当っていた私の本心。
MESSAGE.EN: On the surface, I followed my relatives' plan, treating that girl badly and tormenting her.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the surface, I followed my relatives' plan, treating that girl badly and tormenting her.

MESSAGE.JP: 彼らは、それを問題にし始めたのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Those guys had began to question it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those guys had began to question it.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「決まったから待遇を悪化させないという約束も」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝The promise that you won't worsen her treatment after I was chosen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝The promise that you won't worsen her treatment after I was chosen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「私が頑張ればあの子に何もしないという約束も、守りもしなかったのに！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝If I work hard, you won't do anything to her, you couldn't even keep that promise!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝If I work hard, you won't do anything to her, you couldn't even keep that promise!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ――優秀な人形が必要だ。それ以外は要らない。
MESSAGE.EN: ――They need an excellent ❛doll.❜ That's all they need.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――They need an excellent ❛doll.❜ That's all they need.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…断ったら、どうなるのですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...What if I refuse?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...What if I refuse?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『今のままだろうな。きみの妹は』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛It'll remain as it is. You sister, that is.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛It'll remain as it is. You sister, that is.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『どちらが早いかな。きみの思惑が実現するのと、あの子が壊れるのと』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Which would be faster, your wishes coming true or her breaking?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Which would be faster, your wishes coming true or her breaking?❜

MESSAGE.JP: あの状態は、壊れているのも同じだったのに、二木の叔父たちは言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She's not far from the breaking point as it is, said the men from the Futaki family.
MESSAGE.Translation: She's not far from the breaking point as it is, said the men from the Futaki family.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…この、ひとでなしっ!!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...This is inhumane!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...This is inhumane!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「私たちを役立たずだのろくでなしだのと蔑むあなたたちのほうが…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝You who scorn us for being useless, good-for-nothing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝You who scorn us for being useless, good-for-nothing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「その言葉はお似合いだわっ!!!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Those words befit yourselves!!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Those words befit yourselves!!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『それが本音か。ふふ、あの男の娘はおまえのほうじゃないのか？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Is that what you think? Heh, could you actually be that man's daughter?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Is that what you think? Heh, could you actually be that man's daughter?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『しかし、妹のほうは何をされても従順だったらしいぞ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛I hear your sister not even once complained about her treatment.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛I hear your sister not even once complained about her treatment.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『何も出来ず逃げるだけしかできなかった母親と父親に似たのかな？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Did she take after her mother and father who couldn't do anything but run away?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Did she take after her mother and father who couldn't do anything but run away?❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…父さんたちの悪口を言うな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Don't speak ill of our parents.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Don't speak ill of our parents.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『悪口？　正当な評価だよ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Ill? It's a proper evaluation.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Ill? It's a proper evaluation.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『きみの両親たちは、最低じゃないか。実際君たちを捨てて逃げたんだ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Aren't your parents the worst? Leaving you two here and running away.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Aren't your parents the worst? Leaving you two here and running away.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『いやいや、責めまい。誰だって我が身がかわいい。そうだろう？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛'Well well, I can't blame them. Everybody treasures themselves first and foremost, isn't that right?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛'Well well, I can't blame them. Everybody treasures themselves first and foremost, isn't that right?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 嫌悪感のあまり、吐き気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt so terrible I wanted to vomit.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt so terrible I wanted to vomit.

MESSAGE.JP: 『佳奈多だって…同じだろう？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Kanata... you're the same, aren't you?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Kanata... you're the same, aren't you?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『彼女と境遇を代わればよい、と言ったとき、頷かなかったじゃないかね？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛When we asked if you wanted to take her place, you didn't nod, did you?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛When we asked if you wanted to take her place, you didn't nod, did you?❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「それは…それはっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝That... that is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝That... that is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 私は俯いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I hung my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hung my head.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、私の弱さだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That was my weakness.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was my weakness.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、変えようと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why, I thought I needed to change.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why, I thought I needed to change.

MESSAGE.JP: 頷けなかったこと。それが私の誤りだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't nod. That was my mistake.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't nod. That was my mistake.

MESSAGE.JP: 謝りたかった。でも、それはできない。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to apologize. Yet, I couldn't.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to apologize. Yet, I couldn't.

MESSAGE.JP: できないのなら、私は、あの子を救ってあげたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Since I couldn't do it, I wanted to save that girl.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since I couldn't do it, I wanted to save that girl.

MESSAGE.JP: 回り道でも、小さなことから変えていって、いつか、あの子と…。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though it's roundabout, even if I start from small things, someday, she will....
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though it's roundabout, even if I start from small things, someday, she will....

MESSAGE.JP: 思考がぐるぐる回って、出口が見つからない。
MESSAGE.EN: My thoughts were running in circles, but I couldn't find a way out.
MESSAGE.Translation: My thoughts were running in circles, but I couldn't find a way out.

MESSAGE.JP: 『佳奈多の、本当の望みはなんだね……？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛What is it you really wish for, Kanata......?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛What is it you really wish for, Kanata......?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 優しげな声。その声はするりと私の心の奥底に滑り込む。
MESSAGE.EN: A gentle voice. It slipped right into the depth of my heart.
MESSAGE.Translation: A gentle voice. It slipped right into the depth of my heart.

MESSAGE.JP: 私は周りを見渡した。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked around me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked around me.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰も彼も目を伏せ、私には応えてくれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone was looking down. Nobody responded to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone was looking down. Nobody responded to me.

MESSAGE.JP: あの子の笑顔も失った私はもう独りだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was alone, now that I had lost that girl's smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was alone, now that I had lost that girl's smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 助けはなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no help.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no help.

MESSAGE.JP: 救いもなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no savior.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no savior.

MESSAGE.JP: 大人じゃないという理由で。
MESSAGE.EN: Because we are not adults.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because we are not adults.

MESSAGE.JP: あるいはそこで産まれたという理由だけで。
MESSAGE.EN: Or possibly because of where we were born.
MESSAGE.Translation: Or possibly because of where we were born.

MESSAGE.JP: 多くのひとが傷つけられている。
MESSAGE.EN: A lot of people have been hurt.
MESSAGE.Translation: A lot of people have been hurt.

MESSAGE.JP: 私もそのひとりに過ぎなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I am just one of them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I am just one of them.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとりあがいても、所詮は無力なこどもだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I struggle by myself, in the end I am powerless.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I struggle by myself, in the end I am powerless.

MESSAGE.JP: かなうはずがない。
MESSAGE.EN: My wish won't be granted.
MESSAGE.Translation: My wish won't be granted.

MESSAGE.JP: 『妹を助けたいのだろう？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Do you want to save your sister?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Do you want to save your sister?❜

MESSAGE.JP: …そうだ、私の望みは…私がずっとずっと昔から望んでいたことは。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That's right, my wish... my wish of the longest time.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That's right, my wish... my wish of the longest time.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「……言いなりになれば……」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝If I do as you say...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝If I do as you say...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 俯く。地面が見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I hung my head and looked down.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hung my head and looked down.

MESSAGE.JP: 雨の音がやけに強く聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: The sound of the drumming rain became even stronger.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sound of the drumming rain became even stronger.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「私の、意志を、放棄すれば…本当に、あの子を助けてくれるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝If I give up on my freedom... will you really save that girl?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝If I give up on my freedom... will you really save that girl?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「もう、あの子に、絶対、なにも…しない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝You won't do anything to her? Ever... again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝You won't do anything to her? Ever... again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『しないとも』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Certainly not.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Certainly not.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「学校に行かせてあげてもいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝You will let her go to school?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝You will let her go to school?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『あぁ、いいよ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Ah, that's alright.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Ah, that's alright.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…母さんや父さんと一緒に住んでもいいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...She can live with our mother and father?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...She can live with our mother and father?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『好きにするといい』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Do as you like.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Do as you like.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「じゃあ、じゃあ、私……はるかと……手を繋いでも、いい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Then, then, I...... and Haruka...... can we hold hands?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Then, then, I...... and Haruka...... can we hold hands?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 顔を上げると、冷たい台詞が降ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: When I looked up, I was hit by cold words.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I looked up, I was hit by cold words.

MESSAGE.JP: 『それはダメだ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛That's not allowed.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛That's not allowed.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『してはならない』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛You must not do it.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛You must not do it.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 唇をかみ締めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I bit down on my lips.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bit down on my lips.

MESSAGE.JP: 手を繋ぐことも、許されないのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: You won't even let us hold hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: You won't even let us hold hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 私の未来を捨てる、とはそういうことなのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: This is what it means to throw away my future.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is what it means to throw away my future.

MESSAGE.JP: そう、理解した。
MESSAGE.EN: I realized that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I realized that.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、はるかは、助かる。
MESSAGE.EN: But I can save Haruka.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I can save Haruka.

MESSAGE.JP: それなら、もういいじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: That's fine, isn't it.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's fine, isn't it.

MESSAGE.JP: 私が、犠牲になれば、もうはるかもがんばらなくていい。
MESSAGE.EN: If I sacrifice myself, Haruka won't have to try so hard anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I sacrifice myself, Haruka won't have to try so hard anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: 時間はある。確かにある。
MESSAGE.EN: There's time. There's still time.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's time. There's still time.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、はるかが完全に壊れてしまったら、頑張っても意味がない。
MESSAGE.EN: But if Haruka breaks down, all will be lost.
MESSAGE.Translation: But if Haruka breaks down, all will be lost.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「今なら……はるかを、たすけてあげられる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Right now... I can save Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Right now... I can save Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それは希望のような気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw that as the light at the end of the tunnel.
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw that as the light at the end of the tunnel.

MESSAGE.JP: 今を維持すれば、はるかは助かる。
MESSAGE.EN: My uncles were trying to impress upon me...
MESSAGE.Translation: My uncles were trying to impress upon me...

MESSAGE.JP: だったら、現状を維持すればいい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...that Haruka would be saved if I continue down this path.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...that Haruka would be saved if I continue down this path.

MESSAGE.JP: このひと達はそう言っているのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: So why stop now?
MESSAGE.Translation: So why stop now?

MESSAGE.JP: それは、とても、とても、いい方法に、思われた。
MESSAGE.EN: That seemed like a very, extremely, good idea.
MESSAGE.Translation: That seemed like a very, extremely, good idea.

MESSAGE.JP: 私は、疲れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was... tired.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was... tired.

MESSAGE.JP: あの子の笑顔も理不尽に奪われた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her smile had been cruelly taken away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her smile had been cruelly taken away.

MESSAGE.JP: ううん…私が自分で奪ったのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: No... I was the one who took it.
MESSAGE.Translation: No... I was the one who took it.

MESSAGE.JP: 奪った笑顔はどこへ行ったのだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: Where had it gone?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where had it gone?

MESSAGE.JP: それが手に入らないのなら、もう私がいる意味がなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: All of this would be pointless if she couldn't get it back.
MESSAGE.Translation: All of this would be pointless if she couldn't get it back.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「……はるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝......Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝......Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 大事なはるか。
MESSAGE.EN: My precious Haruka.
MESSAGE.Translation: My precious Haruka.

MESSAGE.JP: 大切なはるか。
MESSAGE.EN: My important Haruka.
MESSAGE.Translation: My important Haruka.

MESSAGE.JP: 私の、いもうと。
MESSAGE.EN: My... little sister.
MESSAGE.Translation: My... little sister.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...I got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...I got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 私は、そう答えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I answered.
MESSAGE.Translation: I answered.

MESSAGE.JP: 最初から、こうすればよかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I should've done this from the beginning.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should've done this from the beginning.

MESSAGE.JP: 私が、人形でいるだけで、よかったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I should've just become a doll from the start.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should've just become a doll from the start.

MESSAGE.JP: 『よいおねえさん』になりたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to be a ❛good sister.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to be a ❛good sister.❜

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりしかいない姉妹だもの。
MESSAGE.EN: Since all we have is us two sisters.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since all we have is us two sisters.

MESSAGE.JP: 小さいころからひどい思い出ばかりだけど、楽しかったことがなかったわけじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: Our childhood was full of horrible memories, but there were fun times as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our childhood was full of horrible memories, but there were fun times as well.

MESSAGE.JP: あの子の笑顔のために、私はずっと努力してきたのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: For that girl's smile, I put in so much effort.
MESSAGE.Translation: For that girl's smile, I put in so much effort.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「わかった。あなたたちの…言いなりになる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I understand... I will do as you say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I understand... I will do as you say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今日まで…頑張ってきたけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I've worked hard... all this time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I've worked hard... all this time.

MESSAGE.JP: 私が諦めることで、いもうとが幸せになるのなら。
MESSAGE.EN: If my sister can become happy by my giving up.
MESSAGE.Translation: If my sister can become happy by my giving up.

MESSAGE.JP: それでもうよかった。
MESSAGE.EN: That is fine too.
MESSAGE.Translation: That is fine too.

MESSAGE.JP: それだけでよかった。
MESSAGE.EN: That alone is enough.
MESSAGE.Translation: That alone is enough.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「もうなにもしない。卒業前に…親戚の誰と結婚してもいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I won't interfere anymore. I'll even consent to marrying someone from within the family even before I graduate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I won't interfere anymore. I'll even consent to marrying someone from within the family even before I graduate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『よいおねえさん』の定義を間違えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: This is not the definition of a ❛good sister.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: This is not the definition of a ❛good sister.❜

MESSAGE.JP: いもうとを助けるために頑張るのは『よいおねえさん』ではなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Working hard in order to save one's sister is not a ❛good sister.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Working hard in order to save one's sister is not a ❛good sister.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「それで、はるかを、助けてくれるのなら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝If that can save Haruka, then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝If that can save Haruka, then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ――あのとき、やっぱり私は『葉留佳と代わってもいい』と言うべきだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ――That time, I really should have said ❛I will take her place.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ――That time, I really should have said ❛I will take her place.❜

MESSAGE.JP: そうしたら、あの子を苦しめなくて済んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: If I did that, her suffering would have ended.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I did that, her suffering would have ended.

MESSAGE.JP: 私さえいなければ、あの子はもっと幸せだったに違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: If I wasn't there, no doubt she would be all the happier.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I wasn't there, no doubt she would be all the happier.

MESSAGE.JP: 馬鹿なことしないで、私は自分を…心を殺せばよかったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Instead of acting like a fool, I should've just killed myself... no, my heart.
MESSAGE.Translation: Instead of acting like a fool, I should've just killed myself... no, my heart.

MESSAGE.JP: 簡単なことだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was simple.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was simple.

MESSAGE.JP: あのとき言えなかったことを、今、言っただけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I am only saying what I couldn't say back then.
MESSAGE.Translation: I am only saying what I couldn't say back then.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、それだけだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Just that...
MESSAGE.Translation: Just that...

MESSAGE.JP: 『そうか。物わかりの良い子だな。助かるよ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Alright. You are a good, understanding girl. That saved us a lot of trouble.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Alright. You are a good, understanding girl. That saved us a lot of trouble.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『約束しよう。きみの妹を解放してあげよう』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Let's make a promise. We'll release your sister.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Let's make a promise. We'll release your sister.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『ただし、きみが約束を守ったらの話だ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛However, it's only if you keep your end of the bargain.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛However, it's only if you keep your end of the bargain.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『卒業するまで、妹には今までどおり接しなさい』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Until you graduate, keep your contact with her as it is now.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Until you graduate, keep your contact with her as it is now.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…はい。わかりました…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Yes. I understand...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Yes. I understand...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 私は、もう、頷くだけの人形だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I am already a doll who can only nod.
MESSAGE.Translation: I am already a doll who can only nod.

MESSAGE.JP: 『思い出して』いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I ❛remembered.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I ❛remembered.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 何度も何度も繰り返して思い出すあの日の出来事。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter how many times it was, the events of that day kept coming back.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter how many times it was, the events of that day kept coming back.

MESSAGE.JP: かくあれかし、と無理矢理押しつけられた日。
MESSAGE.EN: That unreasonable day.
MESSAGE.Translation: That unreasonable day.

MESSAGE.JP: 私が全てを諦めた日。
MESSAGE.EN: The day I gave up everything.
MESSAGE.Translation: The day I gave up everything.

MESSAGE.JP: その延長線上の日々の終わりに。
MESSAGE.EN: The end of those drawn out days.
MESSAGE.Translation: The end of those drawn out days.

MESSAGE.JP: ――私は、もう何がしたいか…何を望んでいるのか、わからなくなっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ――I no longer knew... what I wanted to do, or what I wished for.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――I no longer knew... what I wanted to do, or what I wished for.

MESSAGE.JP: ひょっとしたら、助けて欲しかったのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I was hoping for someone to save me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I was hoping for someone to save me.

MESSAGE.JP: いもうとを『悲劇のお姫様』にするための『悪い魔女役』をしていたから。
MESSAGE.EN: Since I was the ❛evil witch❜ for the sake of my sister becoming the ❛tragic princess.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Since I was the ❛evil witch❜ for the sake of my sister becoming the ❛tragic princess.❜

MESSAGE.JP: もうやめたかったのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I may have wanted to stop.
MESSAGE.Translation: I may have wanted to stop.

MESSAGE.JP: 何もかも、私は――。
MESSAGE.EN: All of that was just...
MESSAGE.Translation: All of that was just...

MESSAGE.JP: …目を開けた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I open my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I open my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 白い天井が見える。
MESSAGE.EN: A white ceiling.
MESSAGE.Translation: A white ceiling.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 直枝の声がした。
MESSAGE.EN: Naoe's voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Naoe's voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 呼びかける。
MESSAGE.EN: I called her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I called her.

MESSAGE.JP: 返事はない。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no answer.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 身じろぐ気配がする。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a stir.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a stir.

MESSAGE.JP: カーテンの、向こう。
MESSAGE.EN: On the other side of the curtain.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the other side of the curtain.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…なに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...What...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...What...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 掠れ声。
MESSAGE.EN: A hoarse voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: A hoarse voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はカーテンを開けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I drew the curtain open.
MESSAGE.Translation: I drew the curtain open.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん…だいじょうぶ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san... are you alright?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san... are you alright?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは額に手を当てながら起きあがっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san sat up while holding her forehead.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san sat up while holding her forehead.

MESSAGE.JP: ぼんやりとした視線が僕を捉える。
MESSAGE.EN: Her wandering eyes caught me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her wandering eyes caught me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「覚えてる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you remember?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you remember?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「寮の前で倒れてたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You collapsed in front of the dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You collapsed in front of the dorm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは答えない。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san did not answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san did not answer.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「最近寝てないらしいって聞いたけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I heard you haven't been sleeping well lately.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I heard you haven't been sleeping well lately.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「疲れてるんだよ。だから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's probably exhaustion, so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's probably exhaustion, so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「だから、何？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝So, what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝So, what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 平淡な、冷えた声。
MESSAGE.EN: A flat, cold voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: A flat, cold voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私が疲れようとどうしようとあなたには関係ないでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Whether I'm tired or not is none of your business, is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Whether I'm tired or not is none of your business, is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…関係ないことはないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...That's not true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...That's not true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「関係ない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It has nothing to do with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It has nothing to do with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「関係ないかもしれないけど、心配するよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That may be so, but I am worried about you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That may be so, but I am worried about you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「『どうして』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝❛Why❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝❛Why❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 呟く二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san mutters.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san mutters.

MESSAGE.JP: 呟いたあと、唇を微かにゆがめた。
MESSAGE.EN: She muttered to herself, and I saw her lips twist slightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She muttered to herself, and I saw her lips twist slightly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「心配だからだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm worried about you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm worried about you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「理由になってない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There's no reason to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There's no reason to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「理由なんか要らないからだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't need a reason for that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't need a reason for that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クドだって、葉留佳さんだって、心配してる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud and Haruka-san were worried too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud and Haruka-san were worried too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さっきまで葉留佳さんとクドは本当に心配そうに見守っていたのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: They were watching over her worriedly until a while ago.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were watching over her worriedly until a while ago.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「理由がなければ心配しちゃいけないっていう法はないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's no rule saying I need a reason to worry about you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's no rule saying I need a reason to worry about you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だから心配してる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, I am worried.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, I am worried.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたの言うとおりかもしれないけど…でも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What you said may be right... but.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What you said may be right... but.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ほうっておいて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Just leave me alone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Just leave me alone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしてそう言えるのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why are you saying that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why are you saying that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんは意固地になっているだけのように思えるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think you are just being stubborn.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think you are just being stubborn.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「意固地？　意固地、ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Stubborn? Stubborn, huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Stubborn? Stubborn, huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…小学生のころにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Back in elementary school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Back in elementary school.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 感情がうかがい知れない無表情のままの唐突な呟き。
MESSAGE.EN: She suddenly started muttering emotionlessly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She suddenly started muttering emotionlessly.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「クラスメイトがいたの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I had a classmate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I had a classmate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「印象の薄い子だった。いつも教室の隅のほうにいた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝She didn't leave much of an impression. She was always in the corner of the classroom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝She didn't leave much of an impression. She was always in the corner of the classroom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「勉強も運動も出来るというわけでもない。目立たない子」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝She wasn't good at studying or sports. She did not stand out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝She wasn't good at studying or sports. She did not stand out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「よくいるでしょ？　クラス替えした４月、いつも俯いてるひと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There are lots of people like that, right? Always with their heads down during the class rearrangement in April.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There are lots of people like that, right? Always with their heads down during the class rearrangement in April.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「彼女もそういう子だった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝She was that kind of person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝She was that kind of person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「だから友達もいない。そんなクラスメイト」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That's why she didn't have any friends. That kind of classmate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That's why she didn't have any friends. That kind of classmate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは誰の話？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who are you talking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who are you talking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私の話じゃないのは確かね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Well, certainly not myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Well, certainly not myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「でも私の話でもある…クラスの中で話すのは私ぐらいなものだったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝But it's related to me... I was probably the only person who talked to her in the class.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝But it's related to me... I was probably the only person who talked to her in the class.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「長袖のジャージを貸したのがきっかけだったかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I think it started when I borrowed her long-sleeved jersey.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I think it started when I borrowed her long-sleeved jersey.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私と彼女はいつも長袖ジャージ着ててね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝The two of us were always wearing long-sleeved jerseys.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝The two of us were always wearing long-sleeved jerseys.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは唇を片端だけ吊り上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san's lips curved.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san's lips curved.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「彼女が『どうして隠していた』のか、私は知らない。訊かなかったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I didn't know ❛what she was hiding.❜ I didn't ask.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I didn't know ❛what she was hiding.❜ I didn't ask.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「彼女も私に訊ねなかった。…だから、私たちは会話出来たのかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝She didn't ask me either.... That's probably why we were able to talk.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝She didn't ask me either.... That's probably why we were able to talk.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ある日…きっかけはなんだったのか忘れた。着替えがあったから多分体育だったのかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝One day... I forgot the occasion. It was probably PE, because we had to change.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝One day... I forgot the occasion. It was probably PE, because we had to change.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「その子のジャージから包帯が見えていた。それを、他の女の子が見つけたの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I saw the bandage under that girl's jersey. The other girls saw it too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I saw the bandage under that girl's jersey. The other girls saw it too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「その包帯はね、ちょっと黒ずんでた。薬か、血のせいか。両方でしょうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Those bandages were a little dark. It could've been from a medical injection, or blood. Or both.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Those bandages were a little dark. It could've been from a medical injection, or blood. Or both.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あの年頃って、なんか妙に潔癖症になったりする子は多いんじゃないかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Back then, somehow there were a lot of girls who were clean freaks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Back then, somehow there were a lot of girls who were clean freaks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「どうなったと思う？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What do you think happened?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What do you think happened?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は首を振った。
MESSAGE.EN: I shook my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shook my head.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わからないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「『怪我してるの？』『…うん、そうなの』。それでおしまい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝❛Are you injured?❜, ❛...Yeah, that's right.❜ And that was it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝❛Are you injured?❜, ❛...Yeah, that's right.❜ And that was it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…その場はそれでおしまい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...It ended with just that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...It ended with just that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「でもその次の休み時間、ジャージ脱がされてた彼女がいた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝But during the following break, her jersey was taken.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝But during the following break, her jersey was taken.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「誰がやったのか、誰がしたのか、あるいは誰がし向けたのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Who did it? Who took it? Who was responsible for it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Who did it? Who took it? Who was responsible for it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「気詰まりな空気。誰かが言った…『病院行ったほうがいいよ』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It was awkward. ❛You should go to the hospital❜... somebody said.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It was awkward. ❛You should go to the hospital❜... somebody said.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ひどい台詞。取り繕うにも程がある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Those were horrible words. Unreasonable words.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Those were horrible words. Unreasonable words.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ずっと彼女は長袖で隠してた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝She was hiding it with her jersey all that time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝She was hiding it with her jersey all that time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「お医者さん、行ってないはずはないのにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There's no way she hadn't gone to the doctor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There's no way she hadn't gone to the doctor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…いじめが始まったのはその後すぐのことよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...The bullying started right after that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...The bullying started right after that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんは、その子と…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, that girl...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, that girl...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それっきりだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That was it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That was it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あのころ…今もそうだけど…私には余裕がなくて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That time... just like now... I couldn't afford to worry about anyone else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That time... just like now... I couldn't afford to worry about anyone else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私の頭を占めていたのはいつもただひとりのことだけだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There was only one thing in my mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There was only one thing in my mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「妹のこと。大切で大事な妹のこと…ただそれだけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝My little sister. My precious, important sister... only that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝My little sister. My precious, important sister... only that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それ以外の何かを背負う余裕はなかったのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I couldn't afford to shoulder anything else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I couldn't afford to shoulder anything else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「彼女に構えば、私や私の妹にも累が及ぶ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝If I tried to help that classmate out, I would drag my sister and I into the whole mess.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝If I tried to help that classmate out, I would drag my sister and I into the whole mess.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いじめってそういうものでしょ、と二木さんは呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Bullying is like that, isn't it, muttered Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Bullying is like that, isn't it, muttered Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…その子は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...The girl...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...The girl...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…クラス替えがあったあと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...After the class rearrangement,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...After the class rearrangement,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「どうなったかは、知らない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I don't know what happened to her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I don't know what happened to her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「転校したんだって、言われた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I was told she transferred.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I was told she transferred.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…きっとその後も追い詰められてたんでしょうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I'm sure she was driven into a corner after that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I'm sure she was driven into a corner after that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは僕を見つめる。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san looked at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san looked at me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんでそんな話を、僕にするの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why are you telling me all this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why are you telling me all this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「直枝。あなたの手はちっぽけだわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Naoe. You hands are really tiny.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Naoe. You hands are really tiny.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ううん、直枝だけじゃない。私だって、誰だってその手は小さくか弱く」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝No, it's not just you, Naoe. Everyone's hands are tiny and weak, mine included.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝No, it's not just you, Naoe. Everyone's hands are tiny and weak, mine included.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ただひとつだって、守ることができるかどうか定かじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Sometimes we can't even protect one simple thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Sometimes we can't even protect one simple thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…誰彼構わず手をさしのべた先には何が待っていると思う？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Do you know what awaits when you try to help every single person?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Do you know what awaits when you try to help every single person?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「崖から落ちかけたひとがふたりいるとする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Two people are about to fall off the cliff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Two people are about to fall off the cliff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それを見ているあなたは両方助けようとする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You see that and try to help both of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You see that and try to help both of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そして、自分ひとり、転落する」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝But end up being the only one who falls.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝But end up being the only one who falls.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そんなの馬鹿馬鹿しいじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Isn't that stupid?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Isn't that stupid?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That's why.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That's why.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「だから、その手は空けておきなさいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That's why, please take back that hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That's why, please take back that hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「直枝、あなたの手は、誰にでも向けられるものではないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Naoe, your hands can not reach others.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Naoe, your hands can not reach others.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「近しいひともそれは望まないでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝The people close to you don't wish for that either, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝The people close to you don't wish for that either, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私が彼女を見捨てたように」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Just like how I forsook that girl.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Just like how I forsook that girl.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたも私なんかに構わないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Please don't care about me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Please don't care about me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-sa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-sa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぱん、と伸ばした手が振り払われる。
MESSAGE.EN: Phaw, my outstretched hand was slapped away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Phaw, my outstretched hand was slapped away.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私はずっと独りでやってきたし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I have been alone all this time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I have been alone all this time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたみたいに守られて生きてきたわけじゃない！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Unlike you, there was no one to protect me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Unlike you, there was no one to protect me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私には味方なんかいなかった！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I didn't have a single friend who could be there for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I didn't have a single friend who could be there for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「正義の味方なんか全然現われなかった！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝No one helped me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝No one helped me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「抱きしめてくれるひとも、慰めてくれるひとも！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I had no one to hold me, no one to console me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I had no one to hold me, no one to console me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「大好きな妹すら、私を嫌っていたのに！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Even my precious sister hates me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Even my precious sister hates me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: シーツを握りしめて二木さんは叫ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san screamed while clenching the bed sheet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san screamed while clenching the bed sheet.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そんな私が…今更何を望むのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What can a person like me... what can I hope for now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What can a person like me... what can I hope for now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「別に大した望みじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It's not a big wish.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It's not a big wish.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私は今を続けたいだけなの！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I only want this present to continue!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I only want this present to continue!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それなのに、心配してる、ですって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Yet, you are worried, you say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Yet, you are worried, you say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「何を心配するっていうのよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What do you mean, ❛worried❜!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What do you mean, ❛worried❜!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「もう終わってしまうかもしれないこの日常を心配しなさいよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Worry about these normal days that are about to end!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Worry about these normal days that are about to end!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私のことなんか、どうでもいいんだから！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'll be fine no matter what happens to me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'll be fine no matter what happens to me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは、僕をにらんでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san glared at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san glared at me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうでもよくはないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's not fine at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's not fine at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は藁かもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I may be only a straw.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I may be only a straw.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「頼りない、一本の藁かもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Only an unreliable straw...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Only an unreliable straw...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、僕には」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕にはきみが、今にも流されそうになっているように見える」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even I can see that you are about to fall off at any moment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even I can see that you are about to fall off at any moment.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「一本の藁自身すら、身を差し伸べたいと思えるほどに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even if it's just one straw, I want to stretch it out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even if it's just one straw, I want to stretch it out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だから、僕はどうでもいいとは思わない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's why, I don't think anything's fine at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's why, I don't think anything's fine at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Eh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Eh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんが僕に頼んだこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san asked me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san asked me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんだか、わかる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did you know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did you know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…そんなの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...That...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...That...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「わかるわけ、ない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There's no way I would know about that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There's no way I would know about that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@『おねえちゃんのこと、好いてあげてほしいの』
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❛Please try to find it in yourself to like her.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❛Please try to find it in yourself to like her.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@『今、辛いのはおねえちゃんだから』
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❛Right now, Onee-chan is the one suffering.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❛Right now, Onee-chan is the one suffering.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…頼まれたから…心配してくれるというわけね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...So you are worried... because you were asked to, huh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...So you are worried... because you were asked to, huh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「違うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's wrong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's wrong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「違わない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝No it isn't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝No it isn't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あの子もお節介ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That girl is too meddlesome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That girl is too meddlesome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「なんでそんなこと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Why is she...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Why is she...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私は、だって、そんなこと望んでもいないのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Even though... I didn't wish for any of that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Even though... I didn't wish for any of that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…望んでも…いない…のに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Even though... I didn't... ask....❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Even though... I didn't... ask....❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんの言葉が、床に落ちる。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san's words fell to the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san's words fell to the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: さっきの叫びを思い出したのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She probably recalled her shouting earlier.
MESSAGE.Translation: She probably recalled her shouting earlier.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…勝手な、ものだわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I'm so selfish.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I'm so selfish.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ほんとうに、自分勝手な、自分が、嫌になる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I hate myself for being so selfish...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I hate myself for being so selfish...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「謝っても許されることではないのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝After all the unforgivable things I've done...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝After all the unforgivable things I've done...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それなのに、あの子からそんなこと頼まれたあなたに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I still find myself wanting to rely on you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I still find myself wanting to rely on you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「すがってしまいそうな私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Even knowing what she asked you for.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Even knowing what she asked you for.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…最低だわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...This is the worst.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...This is the worst.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「最低」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝The worst.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝The worst.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「差し伸べられた手を取ることは『最低なこと』じゃないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not ❛the worst❜ to take the hand held out to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not ❛the worst❜ to take the hand held out to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕だってそうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was the same.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was the same.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんも、多分、そう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san too, probably.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san too, probably.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「誰かに助けて貰って、嬉しかったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Because we were saved by someone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Because we were saved by someone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「苦しんでるひとがいたら、助けてあげたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝When we see a person suffering, we want to help them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝When we see a person suffering, we want to help them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そのことを重荷に思う必要なんかない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think of that as a burden.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think of that as a burden.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「助けて貰ったぶんだけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If someone helped you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If someone helped you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「誰かを手助けするよう強くなればいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Become stronger to help someone else in return.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Become stronger to help someone else in return.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そうやって強くなりたいと、僕は、思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I want to become stronger by doing that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I want to become stronger by doing that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…どうして…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Why...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Why...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「どうして、あなたはそんなに簡単に手を差し出すの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Why can you reach out your hand so easily?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Why can you reach out your hand so easily?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「誰も助からないのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You won't save anyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You won't save anyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「『それだけじゃ』何も救えないのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That's not enough to save anyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That's not enough to save anyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それなのに、どうして、手を差し出すの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Despite that, why do you still hold out your hand?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Despite that, why do you still hold out your hand?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…どうして…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Why...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Why...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは僕に問う。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san asked me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san asked me.

MESSAGE.JP: どうして？
MESSAGE.EN: Why?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why?

MESSAGE.JP: …そう、『どうして』？
MESSAGE.EN: ...Yes, ❛why❜?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Yes, ❛why❜?

MESSAGE.JP: どこかで『どうして』と、訊かれたなと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I was asked ❛why❜ somewhere before.
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I was asked ❛why❜ somewhere before.

MESSAGE.JP: その『どうして』に、なんて僕は答えただろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: To that ❛why,❜ what did I answer?
MESSAGE.Translation: To that ❛why,❜ what did I answer?

MESSAGE.JP: わからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…どこまでもおひとよし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...How simpleminded can you be.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...How simpleminded can you be.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「救いようのない、底抜けの大馬鹿ね、直枝」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You are a hopeless, incurable idiot, Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You are a hopeless, incurable idiot, Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よく言われる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I get that a lot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I get that a lot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 主に二木さんに。
MESSAGE.EN: Mostly from Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Mostly from Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小さな手だってことはわかってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know my hands are small.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know my hands are small.❞

MESSAGE.JP: どこかで答えた『どうして』の答え。
MESSAGE.EN: The answer to that 'why' from somewhere in the past.
MESSAGE.Translation: The answer to that 'why' from somewhere in the past.

MESSAGE.JP: それはわからなかったけれど、僕は二木さんの『どうして』に答える。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't have that one, but I could answer Futaki-san's ❛why.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't have that one, but I could answer Futaki-san's ❛why.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いつだって僕たちは押しつぶされそうなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We can be crushed easily.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We can be crushed easily.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、だからこそ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, because of that,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, because of that,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「手を繋ぐのだと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think we should hold hands with others.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think we should hold hands with others.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そして手を差し出すのだと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And reach out with them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And reach out with them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: リトルバスターズはそうして出来ていった。
MESSAGE.EN: The Little Busters was able to do that.
MESSAGE.Translation: The Little Busters was able to do that.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとりひとりでは成し得ないから、みんなは集まった。
MESSAGE.EN: Because we couldn't accomplish anything by ourselves, we gathered together.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because we couldn't accomplish anything by ourselves, we gathered together.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんだって、それを望んでる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san too... wishes for that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san too... wishes for that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんの手を取ればいい。クドの手でもいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's alright to take Haruka-san's hands. Or Kud's.❞
