MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's alright to take Haruka-san's hands. Or Kud's.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんの手は今まで空いていたのだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Your hands have been empty this whole time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Your hands have been empty this whole time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「その手で、伸ばされた手を掴めばいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝With those two hands, you can grasp the ones extended to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝With those two hands, you can grasp the ones extended to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は、昔、伸ばされた手を、掴んだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A long time ago, I took those outstretched hands.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A long time ago, I took those outstretched hands.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ここにいられる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's the reason I stand here now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's the reason I stand here now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…二木さんが望んでくれるなら、僕だって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...If you wish for it, Futaki-san, then I will too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...If you wish for it, Futaki-san, then I will too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それは無意識だろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: It may have been unconsciously.
MESSAGE.Translation: It may have been unconsciously.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんの右手が何かを求めるようにシーツの上をさまよう。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san's right hand seemed to be searching for something on the sheet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san's right hand seemed to be searching for something on the sheet.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はそっと指でふれた。
MESSAGE.EN: I softly touched it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I softly touched it.

MESSAGE.JP: 震える彼女の手を。
MESSAGE.EN: That trembling hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: That trembling hand.

MESSAGE.JP: トラウマを刺激しないよう、そっと。
MESSAGE.EN: Trying not to trigger her traumatic experiences.
MESSAGE.Translation: Trying not to trigger her traumatic experiences.

MESSAGE.JP: 視線があう。
MESSAGE.EN: Our eyes met.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our eyes met.

MESSAGE.JP: 目を伏せた二木さんは、ゆるゆると僕の指に自分の指を絡めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san averted her eyes, but slowly entwined her fingers around mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san averted her eyes, but slowly entwined her fingers around mine.

MESSAGE.JP: 戸惑うように、怖がっているかのような動きに、僕はそっと握ることで応える。
MESSAGE.EN: Their movements were perplexed, a little afraid. I gently returned her grasp.
MESSAGE.Translation: Their movements were perplexed, a little afraid. I gently returned her grasp.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…関係ないのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Even though it has nothing to do with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Even though it has nothing to do with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「放っておいてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Just leave me alone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Just leave me alone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…放って、おいてよ…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Leave me, alone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Leave me, alone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の指を強く握りしめながら、二木さんはぽろぽろと泣き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: While strongly holding my hands, large tear drops began falling down.
MESSAGE.Translation: While strongly holding my hands, large tear drops began falling down.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ほうって、おいて、よ……ぅっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Leave, me, alone...... uu!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Leave, me, alone...... uu!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「う、あぁぁぁぁ……っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Uaaaaa......!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Uaaaaa......!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の手を握りしめて、二木さんは、静かに、深く、長く、嗚咽した。
MESSAGE.EN: While holding my hands, Futaki-san, quietly, deeply, cried for a long time.
MESSAGE.Translation: While holding my hands, Futaki-san, quietly, deeply, cried for a long time.

MESSAGE.JP: 壁越しに、嗚咽が聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: The sobbing can be heard from the other side of the wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sobbing can be heard from the other side of the wall.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「三枝さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Saigusa-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Saigusa-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 壁にもたれた私を、クド公が心配そうに呼ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: Little Kud looks at me worriedly, as I lean against the wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: Little Kud looks at me worriedly, as I lean against the wall.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…だいじょうぶだよ、クド公」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...It's alright, Little Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...It's alright, Little Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…そうでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Is that so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Is that so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「とても、辛そうですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You look... really pained.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You look... really pained.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「とても…とても、辛そうですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Really, really pained.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Really, really pained.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私が辛いなら、クド公も辛いだろうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If I'm in pain, then aren't you the same?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If I'm in pain, then aren't you the same?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…そう、見えますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Do I look that way?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Do I look that way?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ううん。見えないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No, you don't look it at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No, you don't look it at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「嬉しそうだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You seem happy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You seem happy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうしてクド公は笑っていられるのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wonder why you can keep smiling?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wonder why you can keep smiling?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私は泣きそうだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm about to cry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm about to cry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「胸が苦しくって、辛くて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝My chest hurts.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝My chest hurts.❞

MESSAGE.JP: じわり、とこみ上げてくる何かで視界がかすむ。
MESSAGE.EN: My vision is blurred out by something welling up inside me.
MESSAGE.Translation: My vision is blurred out by something welling up inside me.

MESSAGE.JP: 慌てて制服でこすった。
MESSAGE.EN: I quickly wipe my eyes with my uniform.
MESSAGE.Translation: I quickly wipe my eyes with my uniform.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それでも、嬉しい、のでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Still, you are happy, aren't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Still, you are happy, aren't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド公は笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: Little Kud laughs.
MESSAGE.Translation: Little Kud laughs.

MESSAGE.JP: 辛くても、苦しくても、それでも目の前のクド公は笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite the bitterness and the pain, Little Kud smiles.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite the bitterness and the pain, Little Kud smiles.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「嬉しいときは笑うものですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝When something good happens, you should smile.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝When something good happens, you should smile.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「三枝さんも、笑ってください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's why you should smile too, Saigusa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's why you should smile too, Saigusa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「笑顔はひとを強くします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Smiles make people stronger.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Smiles make people stronger.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「誰かの笑顔は、誰かの強さになる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝One person's smile will become another person's strength.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝One person's smile will become another person's strength.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「だから、笑ってください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So, please smile.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So, please smile.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 私はクド公の手を引っ張った。
MESSAGE.EN: I pull on Little Kud's hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pull on Little Kud's hands.

MESSAGE.JP: ぎゅっと抱え込む。
MESSAGE.EN: I hug her tightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hug her tightly.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「さ、三枝さんっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Sa-saigusa-san!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Sa-saigusa-san!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「しばらく…こうさせて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Let me be like this... for a while.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Let me be like this... for a while.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「三枝さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Saigusa-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Saigusa-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…わかりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Understood.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Understood.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 私より小さなクド公は、ぽんぽん、と背中を叩いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud, who is even smaller than I am, pats me on the back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud, who is even smaller than I am, pats me on the back.

MESSAGE.JP: 私をあやすように。
MESSAGE.EN: As if to comfort me.
MESSAGE.Translation: As if to comfort me.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ん……」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝N......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝N......❞

MESSAGE.JP: 目を閉じる。
MESSAGE.EN: I close my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I close my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…やっぱり、姉妹さんですねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...You really are sisters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...You really are sisters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…なにが？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Who is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Who is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「佳奈多さんも、時々、私を抱きしめて泣いていました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Kanata-san, too, sometimes holds me and cries.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Kanata-san, too, sometimes holds me and cries.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「おふたりとも、泣き虫さんですねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You two really are cry-babies.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You two really are cry-babies.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん…双子だからね、私たち」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah... since, we are twins.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah... since, we are twins.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうでした、ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド公が小さく笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: Little Kud gave a quiet laugh.
MESSAGE.Translation: Little Kud gave a quiet laugh.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「誰にでも見せるわけじゃないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't show this to just anybody.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't show this to just anybody.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「普段は泣いたりなんかしない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I normally never cry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I normally never cry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私は道化だからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Since I am the clown.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Since I am the clown.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「道化が泣いたら、白い化粧が落ちちゃうでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If a clown cries, her white makeup will run.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If a clown cries, her white makeup will run.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だから…普段は…泣いたり、しないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So... normally... I don't, cry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So... normally... I don't, cry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声がかすれているのがわかる。
MESSAGE.EN: I know my voice is becoming hoarse.
MESSAGE.Translation: I know my voice is becoming hoarse.

MESSAGE.JP: 滑稽で、みっともない姿。
MESSAGE.EN: This laughable, unsightly me.
MESSAGE.Translation: This laughable, unsightly me.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも、クド公の声はいつもどおり穏やかで…そして優しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, Kud's voice is, as always, calm... and gentle.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, Kud's voice is, as always, calm... and gentle.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それが悪い、と言っているわけではありませんよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I don't think that is a bad thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I don't think that is a bad thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「誰かにすがりたいときは誰にだってあるものです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Everyone will have times when they want to cling onto another.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Everyone will have times when they want to cling onto another.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「謝らなくてもいいんですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You don't have to apologize.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You don't have to apologize.❞

MESSAGE.JP: こんな私の姿を見ても、クド公は笑わなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if I look like this, Kud doesn't laugh at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if I look like this, Kud doesn't laugh at me.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、静かに、続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: The silence continues.
MESSAGE.Translation: The silence continues.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「差し伸べられた手を取ることが弱さではないのと同じで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's not weakness to take the hand offered to you. This is the same.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's not weakness to take the hand offered to you. This is the same.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「誰かにすがって泣くことが、弱さではないのだと思います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I don't think clinging onto someone and crying is weakness.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I don't think clinging onto someone and crying is weakness.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…そばにいる誰か、に気がつけたとき、自分のことがよりわかるのかもです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...When you notice someone by your side, you may get to know yourself better...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...When you notice someone by your side, you may get to know yourself better...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それは弱さではない、と私は思います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I don't think that is weakness.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I don't think that is weakness.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「だから、ごめんなさい、はしなくていいのですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So, you don't have to say sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So, you don't have to say sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ごめん、よりは、ありがとう、か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Say ❛thank you❜ rather than ❛sorry,❜ huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Say ❛thank you❜ rather than ❛sorry,❜ huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…リキもきっと、そう言いますよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Riki, too, would probably say that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Riki, too, would probably say that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ん、そうだろうね…そうだったね…ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝N, that's right... that's right... thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝N, that's right... that's right... thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…でも、ひどいな、こんなのって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Still, this is cruel.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Still, this is cruel.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「何がですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ううん。なんでもないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No. It's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No. It's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 忘れることを望めば忘れられるのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Can I forget something simply by wishing so?
MESSAGE.Translation: Can I forget something simply by wishing so?

MESSAGE.JP: あるいは忘れさせてくれるのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Will I be made to forget?
MESSAGE.Translation: Will I be made to forget?

MESSAGE.JP: それでも繰り返すことを楽しむためには、覚えていなくてはならなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: However, I have to keep my memories in order to enjoy these repetitions.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, I have to keep my memories in order to enjoy these repetitions.

MESSAGE.JP: ――ひどいな、こんなの。
MESSAGE.EN: ――This is, cruel.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――This is, cruel.

MESSAGE.JP: 覚えているからこそ…その先がないっていうのは、ひどいな。
MESSAGE.EN: It is because I remember that I know there's nothing ahead.
MESSAGE.Translation: It is because I remember that I know there's nothing ahead.

MESSAGE.JP: ひどいな、こんなの。
MESSAGE.EN: This is too cruel.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is too cruel.

MESSAGE.JP: クド公を抱きしめながら、私は静かに泣いた。
MESSAGE.EN: While holding Kud, I cry quietly.
MESSAGE.Translation: While holding Kud, I cry quietly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん…あれ、クドは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san... where's Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san... where's Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「先に帰る、ってさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She said she'd go back first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She said she'd go back first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: すん、と葉留佳さんは鼻をすすった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san sniffed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san sniffed.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうかしたの？　理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What's wrong, Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What's wrong, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの笑顔。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san's smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san's smile.

MESSAGE.JP: まるでさっきまで泣いていたかのように頬に赤みが差している。
MESSAGE.EN: Her red cheeks looked as if she was crying until a moment ago.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her red cheeks looked as if she was crying until a moment ago.

MESSAGE.JP: 気のせいだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Was it my imagination?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was it my imagination?

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おねえちゃんの様子はどう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝How's Onee-chan doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝How's Onee-chan doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…泣いたら緊張がゆるんだのか、眠っちゃったみたいだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It seems she was able to relax after crying, and she's sleeping now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It seems she was able to relax after crying, and she's sleeping now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寝息を確認するまで、握っていた手の感触を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I recalled the sensation of her hand holding mine until I confirmed she was asleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: I recalled the sensation of her hand holding mine until I confirmed she was asleep.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だいぶ気を張ってたからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She was holding back a lot, huh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She was holding back a lot, huh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねぇ葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Nn?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Nn?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんには、葉留佳さんの手が必要だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san needs your hands.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san needs your hands.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 頷く葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そうだと、思った」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I thought so, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I thought so, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「姉妹だもの、わかるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝We are sisters after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝We are sisters after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「小さいころは逆だったのにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Though it's the reverse of when we were kids.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Though it's the reverse of when we were kids.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いつもおねえちゃんのほうから私の手を握ってくれた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan was always the one taking my hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan was always the one taking my hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だから、今度は私の番…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So now, it's my turn...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So now, it's my turn...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 決意がこもった目で、葉留佳さんは僕にそう告げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san said to me with resolute eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san said to me with resolute eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 手配をした。
MESSAGE.EN: I made the arrangements.
MESSAGE.Translation: I made the arrangements.

MESSAGE.JP: 両親を見つけ、家を借り、転校する準備を整えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Look for our parents, rent a house, and the preparations for a transfer were completed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Look for our parents, rent a house, and the preparations for a transfer were completed.

MESSAGE.JP: 初めて会う両親は、一目で苦労していたのだな、とわかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It only took a glance to understand that the parents I had met for the first time were struggling.
MESSAGE.Translation: It only took a glance to understand that the parents I had met for the first time were struggling.

MESSAGE.JP: 青白い顔をした母は、布団に寝たままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: My pale mother was still sleeping in the futon.
MESSAGE.Translation: My pale mother was still sleeping in the futon.

MESSAGE.JP: 医者にもかかれずやせこけた表情。
MESSAGE.EN: Unable to even call a doctor, her visage was skinny.
MESSAGE.Translation: Unable to even call a doctor, her visage was skinny.

MESSAGE.JP: 父は日々の暮らしに追われ、疲労が強くにじんでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: My father who was struggling to make ends meet, with growing fatigue.
MESSAGE.Translation: My father who was struggling to make ends meet, with growing fatigue.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はじめまして。三枝佳奈多です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Nice to meet you. I am Kanata Saigusa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Nice to meet you. I am Kanata Saigusa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 母と父は、悲しげな目で私を見た。
MESSAGE.EN: My parents looked at me with sad eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: My parents looked at me with sad eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 娘に『はじめまして』と言われる親の気持ちはどんなものだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: What did my parents feel when they heard their daughter say ❛nice to meet you❜?
MESSAGE.Translation: What did my parents feel when they heard their daughter say ❛nice to meet you❜?

MESSAGE.JP: 私にわかるわけもなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't fathom it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't fathom it.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「今はまだ二木ですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Although I'm Futaki at the moment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Although I'm Futaki at the moment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「もうすぐそうなりますから、そう名乗ります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝This will change soon, so I use that name now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝This will change soon, so I use that name now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手短に状況を話した。
MESSAGE.EN: I explained my situation briefly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I explained my situation briefly.

MESSAGE.JP: 夏の終わりまでの住居も仕事も金銭も用意する。
MESSAGE.EN: By the summer's end, I would prepare them a residence, a job and money.
MESSAGE.Translation: By the summer's end, I would prepare them a residence, a job and money.

MESSAGE.JP: 少なくとも、母の体調は回復し、父も余裕ができるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Even a little, that will help mom recover and give dad a bit more breathing space.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even a little, that will help mom recover and give dad a bit more breathing space.

MESSAGE.JP: あの子の前で『ふつうのかぞく』を装うことができるはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: We should be able to set up a ❛normal family❜ in front of that girl.
MESSAGE.Translation: We should be able to set up a ❛normal family❜ in front of that girl.

MESSAGE.JP: `父@「…すまないな。年端もいかぬおまえにそこまでして貰って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝...I'm sorry. For someone as young as you to do so much...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝...I'm sorry. For someone as young as you to do so much...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「お二人には、葉留佳と住んでもらいます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Haruka will be living together with you two.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Haruka will be living together with you two.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `父@「葉留佳と？　いいのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝Haruka? Is that alright?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝Haruka? Is that alright?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はい。よろしくお願いします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Yes. Please treat her well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Yes. Please treat her well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `父@「あの子は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝That girl...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝That girl...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…とても、ひどい、状況です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Her condition is... really horrible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Her condition is... really horrible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `父@「…そうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝...I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝...I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「三枝の家で、ひどい扱いを受けて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝At the Saigusas, she has been mistreated cruelly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝At the Saigusas, she has been mistreated cruelly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笑えているだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Will she be able to laugh?
MESSAGE.Translation: Will she be able to laugh?

MESSAGE.JP: せっかく両親を迎えることができたのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I was finally able to meet our parents.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I was finally able to meet our parents.

MESSAGE.JP: こんなひどい結末だけしか用意できなくて。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't prepare anything other than this horrible conclusion.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't prepare anything other than this horrible conclusion.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「いろいろなことを忘れてしまっています」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝She has forgotten a lot of things.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝She has forgotten a lot of things.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あの子にどれぐらい私を慕う気持ちが残っているのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder if she still holds any feeling of love toward me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder if she still holds any feeling of love toward me.

MESSAGE.JP: 人間は簡単に壊れてしまうものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: A human is a fragile being.
MESSAGE.Translation: A human is a fragile being.

MESSAGE.JP: 私のために、と決意してくれたあの子を壊してしまったのは……私だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The person who broke this girl who had steeled themselves for my sake was none other than me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The person who broke this girl who had steeled themselves for my sake was none other than me.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…私を、あなたたちを、憎んでいます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...She hates me, and you two.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...She hates me, and you two.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `父@「私たちは当然だが…何故おまえも？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝We are a given, but why you too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝We are a given, but why you too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `父@「…話したくないのなら、いい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝...It's alright if you don't want to talk about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝...It's alright if you don't want to talk about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `父@「すまなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 父は深く頭を下げた。
MESSAGE.EN: My father bowed low.
MESSAGE.Translation: My father bowed low.

MESSAGE.JP: `父@「何を言っても許してもらえるはずもない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝I shouldn't be expecting forgiveness from you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝I shouldn't be expecting forgiveness from you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `父@「けれど、謝りたい。すまなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝But I want to apologize. I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝But I want to apologize. I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 父と母が語ったこと。
MESSAGE.EN: My parents told me.
MESSAGE.Translation: My parents told me.

MESSAGE.JP: 路頭に迷い、辛酸を極め、それでも私たちを何度も助けようとして失敗したこと。
MESSAGE.EN: How out on the streets, at the ends of hardships, they still tried to save us many times but failed.
MESSAGE.Translation: How out on the streets, at the ends of hardships, they still tried to save us many times but failed.

MESSAGE.JP: どうして私たちが生まれたのかということ。
MESSAGE.EN: They told me why we were born.
MESSAGE.Translation: They told me why we were born.

MESSAGE.JP: 全てを教えて貰っても、私の心は何の感情も浮かんでこなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even after I was told everything, no feelings came to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even after I was told everything, no feelings came to me.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、幸福なんてどこにもない、というだけのことだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Just a feeling that happiness was nowhere to be found.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just a feeling that happiness was nowhere to be found.

MESSAGE.JP: `父@「…晶のことだが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝...About Shou...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝...About Shou...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「面会はもうしました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I already saw him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I already saw him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今も塀の中にいるもうひとりの父。
MESSAGE.EN: The other father I have that is now confined within those walls.
MESSAGE.Translation: The other father I have that is now confined within those walls.

MESSAGE.JP: `父@「…佳奈多…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝...Kanata...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝...Kanata...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 最初は突き放されたが、本来は聡いひとだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was refused bluntly at first, but he was actually quite smart.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was refused bluntly at first, but he was actually quite smart.

MESSAGE.JP: 私の覚悟を目に取ったのか、話をしてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe he saw the resolution in my eyes, but he talked to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe he saw the resolution in my eyes, but he talked to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…嘘の演技も続けているうちに本当みたいになってしまうものです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...At some point during all the acting and lies, they became the truth.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...At some point during all the acting and lies, they became the truth.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 不幸は溢れている。
MESSAGE.EN: Overflowing sorrow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Overflowing sorrow.

MESSAGE.JP: きっと世の中のどこかに、幸せいっぱいのひとがいるのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: In this world, there's surely someone with a lot of happiness.
MESSAGE.Translation: In this world, there's surely someone with a lot of happiness.

MESSAGE.JP: そういう幸福の代わりに、不幸がどこかで産まれるのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: In place of that happiness, sorrow was probably also born somewhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: In place of that happiness, sorrow was probably also born somewhere.

MESSAGE.JP: 自分だけが不幸だとは思えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't think we were the only ones suffering.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't think we were the only ones suffering.

MESSAGE.JP: あの子が自分だけが不幸だと思いこんでいたとしても、間違いだと指摘したくはなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if that girl thought she was the only one unhappy, I didn't want to correct her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if that girl thought she was the only one unhappy, I didn't want to correct her.

MESSAGE.JP: そうやって思い込むことで生きていこうと思ってくれるのなら。
MESSAGE.EN: If thinking that would let her go on living.
MESSAGE.Translation: If thinking that would let her go on living.

MESSAGE.JP: それだけで私はよかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was fine with it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was fine with it.

MESSAGE.JP: `父@「すまない、佳奈多…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝I'm sorry, Kanata...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝I'm sorry, Kanata...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「私は…憎んでいません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I... don't hate you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I... don't hate you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 生きているだけましだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Just being alive is enough.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just being alive is enough.

MESSAGE.JP: それは間違っていると誰かがささやく。
MESSAGE.EN: Someone whispered that it's wrong.
MESSAGE.Translation: Someone whispered that it's wrong.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ただ、もう、私にはこれぐらいしか葉留佳にしてあげられないんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝However, this is... all I could do for Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝However, this is... all I could do for Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 両親と暮らすこと。
MESSAGE.EN: Living together with our parents.
MESSAGE.Translation: Living together with our parents.

MESSAGE.JP: 学校に行くこと。
MESSAGE.EN: Being able to go to school.
MESSAGE.Translation: Being able to go to school.

MESSAGE.JP: できないのは、ひとつだけ。
MESSAGE.EN: There's only one thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's only one thing.

MESSAGE.JP: あの子の『りそうのかぞく』にはひとり頭数が足りないが。
MESSAGE.EN: There's only one thing missing from her ❛ideal family.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: There's only one thing missing from her ❛ideal family.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「あの子はもう私に笑ってくれません…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝That girl will no longer smile at me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝That girl will no longer smile at me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 憎んでいるのなら、『そのひとり』は省いてもいいだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: If she hates me, it's fine for that ❛one thing❜ to not be there.
MESSAGE.Translation: If she hates me, it's fine for that ❛one thing❜ to not be there.

MESSAGE.JP: 口にすると鈍い痛みが襲ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: When I said it, I was assailed by a sharp pain.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I said it, I was assailed by a sharp pain.

MESSAGE.JP: もう私の夢が叶うことはないにちがいない。
MESSAGE.EN: My dreams can no longer be fulfilled.
MESSAGE.Translation: My dreams can no longer be fulfilled.

MESSAGE.JP: あの子が私の手を握り『おねえちゃん』と笑顔を向けてくれること。
MESSAGE.EN: For that girl to hold my hand, smile and call me ❛Onee-chan.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: For that girl to hold my hand, smile and call me ❛Onee-chan.❜

MESSAGE.JP: きっと、もう、無い。
MESSAGE.EN: I know that's... no longer possible.
MESSAGE.Translation: I know that's... no longer possible.

MESSAGE.JP: それだけでよかったのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I would settle for that alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I would settle for that alone.

MESSAGE.JP: 他には何も欲しくなかったのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I didn't wish for anything else.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I didn't wish for anything else.

MESSAGE.JP: 私は、それさえあれば、よかったのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I'd be fine as long as I can have that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I'd be fine as long as I can have that.

MESSAGE.JP: 学校に行けばきっと楽しいことがあるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure she will find happy things once she goes to school.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure she will find happy things once she goes to school.

MESSAGE.JP: そこでも私からいじめられるとはいえ、あそこで暮らすよりは、ずっとずっといい。
MESSAGE.EN: That is a lot better than living at that place, even if she still has to be bullied by me.
MESSAGE.Translation: That is a lot better than living at that place, even if she still has to be bullied by me.

MESSAGE.JP: 友達や仲間もできるかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: She may be able to make friends.
MESSAGE.Translation: She may be able to make friends.

MESSAGE.JP: 私が手に入れられなかったそれを、あの子は手に入れるかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: She may be able to grasp the things that were out of my reach.
MESSAGE.Translation: She may be able to grasp the things that were out of my reach.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「夏が終わったら、街を出てください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝When summer ends, please leave this town.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝When summer ends, please leave this town.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「葉留佳と一緒に暮らしてあげてください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Please let Haruka live with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Please let Haruka live with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `父@「佳奈多、おまえは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝What about you, Kanata?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝What about you, Kanata?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「もう二度と会うことはないでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝We probably will never meet again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝We probably will never meet again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「葉留佳にそれを告げることも許されていません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I am not even allowed to tell Haruka that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I am not even allowed to tell Haruka that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「夏の終わりまでの短い間。それまでです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝You can keep pretending to be a ❛happy family❜ until the end of summer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝You can keep pretending to be a ❛happy family❜ until the end of summer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…『たのしいかぞくごっこ』ができるのは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝That's not a lot of time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝That's not a lot of time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「あの子は楽しい、とは受け取ってくれないでしょうけれど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝And she may not think of it as happiness.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝And she may not think of it as happiness.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「あなたたちと暮らすのは、あの子の夢でもあったのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝But to be able to live with you was that girl's dream.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝But to be able to live with you was that girl's dream.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「だから、どんなときでも『楽しい』と言ってあげてください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Therefore, no matter what, please always tell her you're happy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Therefore, no matter what, please always tell her you're happy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『楽しい』なんて両親から言われたら反発するだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She will probably protest if they say they're happy to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She will probably protest if they say they're happy to her.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも言ってほしい、と私は頼んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, I want them to say it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, I want them to say it.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「一緒にいて楽しい、と言われたことすらなかったのですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝No one has ever told her they're happy to be with her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝No one has ever told her they're happy to be with her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何が楽しいかも。
MESSAGE.EN: What things are fun.
MESSAGE.Translation: What things are fun.

MESSAGE.JP: 親とどんな会話をするのかも。
MESSAGE.EN: What you're supposed to talk about with your parents.
MESSAGE.Translation: What you're supposed to talk about with your parents.

MESSAGE.JP: そして自分がしたい会話の中身もやり方もあの子は知らないのだから。
MESSAGE.EN: Or even what she wants to talk about, or how to go about it. She knows none of that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Or even what she wants to talk about, or how to go about it. She knows none of that.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…だから、どんなに気まずくても楽しい、と言ってください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝So even if things feel awkward, please tell her you're having fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝So even if things feel awkward, please tell her you're having fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `父@「…わかった。そうしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝...I understood. I'll do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝...I understood. I'll do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: こっけいな依頼だと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I too think it was a laughable request.
MESSAGE.Translation: I too think it was a laughable request.

MESSAGE.JP: 自然に会話もできない私たち。
MESSAGE.EN: We who couldn't talk naturally.
MESSAGE.Translation: We who couldn't talk naturally.

MESSAGE.JP: 奪われたものはどこへ消えていったのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Where have the things stolen from us gone?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where have the things stolen from us gone?

MESSAGE.JP: 父たちも、母も、私も、葉留佳も――親族達も、幸福には見えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Father, mother, Haruka, and I, none of us could see any happiness.
MESSAGE.Translation: Father, mother, Haruka, and I, none of us could see any happiness.

MESSAGE.JP: 叔父達だって憐れだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Our relatives were also pitiful.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our relatives were also pitiful.

MESSAGE.JP: かわいそうなひとたち。
MESSAGE.EN: Pitiful people.
MESSAGE.Translation: Pitiful people.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰かを踏みにじることでしか自分を確認できないひとたち。
MESSAGE.EN: They can only assert themselves by taking advantage of others.
MESSAGE.Translation: They can only assert themselves by taking advantage of others.

MESSAGE.JP: 母は布団からそっと手を伸ばした。
MESSAGE.EN: Mother gently extended her hand from under the blanket.
MESSAGE.Translation: Mother gently extended her hand from under the blanket.

MESSAGE.JP: 私の手をそっと触れる。
MESSAGE.EN: I softly took that hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I softly took that hand.

MESSAGE.JP: ごめんなさいね、と言いたげに。
MESSAGE.EN: As if to say ❛I'm sorry.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: As if to say ❛I'm sorry.❜

MESSAGE.JP: やせた母の腕は頼りなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: My mother's thin arm didn't look reliable at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: My mother's thin arm didn't look reliable at all.

MESSAGE.JP: 不思議と、涙は出てこなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It's strange, but tears couldn't come out.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's strange, but tears couldn't come out.

MESSAGE.JP: だって、私はもうずっとずっと、人形だったから。
MESSAGE.EN: Since I was a doll, had been all this time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since I was a doll, had been all this time.

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Good morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Good morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 最後の『記憶』を見たあと、最初に聞いたのはいもうとの声だった。
MESSAGE.EN: The first thing I heard after I saw those ❛memories,❜ was ❛good morning.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: The first thing I heard after I saw those ❛memories,❜ was ❛good morning.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 連れてこられたのは、クドリャフカの部屋だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had been taken to Kudryavka's room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had been taken to Kudryavka's room.

MESSAGE.JP: あれから私は翌日の昼まで寝ていたことになる。
MESSAGE.EN: I slept from then until noon the next day.
MESSAGE.Translation: I slept from then until noon the next day.

MESSAGE.JP: これだけ長く眠ったのは久しぶりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It has been a while since I slept so long.
MESSAGE.Translation: It has been a while since I slept so long.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はい、座って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Here, sit up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Here, sit up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…どうしてクドリャフカの部屋なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Why Kudryavka's room?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Why Kudryavka's room?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「クド公が『使ってください』って言ってくれたからだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Since Little Kud told me to go and use it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Since Little Kud told me to go and use it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 部屋を見渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked around the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked around the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 何度か入ったことのある部屋。
MESSAGE.EN: The room I'd entered before.
MESSAGE.Translation: The room I'd entered before.

MESSAGE.JP: 言って気づく。『今回は私の部屋でもある』んだから、当たり前だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I realize how silly my question must be, since this was my room as well now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I realize how silly my question must be, since this was my room as well now.

MESSAGE.JP: …結局、いつも大して使うことは出来てないけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...In the end, I wasn't able to use it much.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...In the end, I wasn't able to use it much.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「この部屋って心地いいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝This room has a nice feel, doesn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝This room has a nice feel, doesn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…そうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳も何度か入っただろう部屋。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka had also entered this room before.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka had also entered this room before.

MESSAGE.JP: 感想は同じらしかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It seems our impressions were similar.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seems our impressions were similar.

MESSAGE.JP: 私もこの部屋は心地いいと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I also think this room has a pleasant feel to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I also think this room has a pleasant feel to it.

MESSAGE.JP: 素の私が、ここにいた、そんな思いがよぎる。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly it occurs to me that I could always be myself in this room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly it occurs to me that I could always be myself in this room.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「座って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Can you sit?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Can you sit?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ベッドに腰掛ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I sit down on the bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sit down on the bed.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「全部、嘘だったんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It was all a lie, wasn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It was all a lie, wasn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…そうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...That's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...That's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ずっと、うそ、ついてた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I have been... lying, this whole time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I have been... lying, this whole time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ごめんね、はるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I'm sorry, Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I'm sorry, Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「『もういいよ』って私、あのとき、ゆったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝❛It's fine,❜ I said that back then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝❛It's fine,❜ I said that back then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「覚えてない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Do you remember?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Do you remember?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そのあとのこと。教えて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Tell me what happened after that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Tell me what happened after that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「夏が終わったら、どうするつもりだったか、教えて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What did you plan after that summer, tell me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What did you plan after that summer, tell me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …事情を話す。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I explain the situation.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I explain the situation.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳は黙って聞いてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka listens quietly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka listens quietly.

MESSAGE.JP: 話し終わると葉留佳はぽつりと言った。
MESSAGE.EN: When I am done, Haruka sighs.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I am done, Haruka sighs.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おねえちゃん、辛かったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan, it must've been tough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan, it must've been tough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「大変だったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's must've been hard for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's must've been hard for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「よしよし…えらかったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There, there... good girl.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There, there... good girl.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「かなたは、もうひとりじゃないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Kanata, you're no longer alone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Kanata, you're no longer alone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…はる…か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Haru... ka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Haru... ka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笑って頭を撫でてくれた葉留佳。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka pats my head with a smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka pats my head with a smile.

MESSAGE.JP: ずっと夢見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The dream I held all this time.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dream I held all this time.

MESSAGE.JP: 何もかも話して、いもうとに許して貰うこと。
MESSAGE.EN: Telling her everything, and having my sister forgive me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Telling her everything, and having my sister forgive me.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なぁに、おねえちゃん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What, Onee-chan?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What, Onee-chan?❞

MESSAGE.JP: えがおの、いもうと。
MESSAGE.EN: My smiling... sister.
MESSAGE.Translation: My smiling... sister.

MESSAGE.JP: そっと私の頭を抱きしめてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: She gently embraces my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gently embraces my head.

MESSAGE.JP: あたたかなその手。
MESSAGE.EN: Those warm hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those warm hands.

MESSAGE.JP: その温もり。
MESSAGE.EN: That warmth.
MESSAGE.Translation: That warmth.

MESSAGE.JP: ずっと求めていて…そして、その温もりを、やがてもうすぐ失うという『げんじつ』。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd been longing for it all this time... but the ❛reality❜ is that I will lose that warmth soon.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd been longing for it all this time... but the ❛reality❜ is that I will lose that warmth soon.

MESSAGE.JP: それが切なくて、くやしくて、でも、今こうしていることが嬉しくて。
MESSAGE.EN: That's painful and frustrating, but now, I also feel happy just being like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's painful and frustrating, but now, I also feel happy just being like this.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「はるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「私、あなたをここに連れてきてよかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I'm glad I brought you here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I'm glad I brought you here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「感謝してる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm grateful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm grateful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「自分だけが辛いと思いこんでいた私が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I thought I was the only one suffering.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I thought I was the only one suffering.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「その誤りに気がつけたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I noticed that was a mistake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I noticed that was a mistake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「過去ばかり見ていた私が、願った未来の姿」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I was always letting the past shape the future.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I was always letting the past shape the future.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今だけがずっと続くことを願っていたけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wish this moment would last forever, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wish this moment would last forever, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも、どんな現実だって時は流れていく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No matter what, time will keep on flowing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No matter what, time will keep on flowing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今のままでずっといることなんかできないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So this moment cannot last forever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So this moment cannot last forever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だから、もう今だけを望まなくていい…望んじゃだめなんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So, you don't have to wish for this moment anymore... no, you must not wish for it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So, you don't have to wish for this moment anymore... no, you must not wish for it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おねえちゃんも、もう演じなくていいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan too, you don't have to put up an act anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan too, you don't have to put up an act anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: かつての日々のように。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like the days back then.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like the days back then.

MESSAGE.JP: 不器用な私に向かって、いもうとは私を励ましてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: When my sister encouraged me, that clumsy me.
MESSAGE.Translation: When my sister encouraged me, that clumsy me.

MESSAGE.JP: 私の願い。
MESSAGE.EN: My wish.
MESSAGE.Translation: My wish.

MESSAGE.JP: この子に許して貰うこと。
MESSAGE.EN: That this girl would forgive me.
MESSAGE.Translation: That this girl would forgive me.

MESSAGE.JP: それを為すだけの強さを、いもうとは身につけてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: My sister has become strong enough to make my wish come true.
MESSAGE.Translation: My sister has become strong enough to make my wish come true.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…うん。そうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Yes. That's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Yes. That's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ありがとう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Thank you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Thank you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それでさ、私からのアドバイスがあるんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah, I have some advice for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah, I have some advice for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「？　なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝?　What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝?　What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今後について、のアドバイスだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝An advice for what's coming.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝An advice for what's coming.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒会役員@「…辞めたい？　いきなりだね。理由は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Council Officer@❝...She wants to quit?　That's so sudden. What's the reason?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Council Officer@❝...She wants to quit?　That's so sudden. What's the reason?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「寮会の仕事に専念したいから、だそうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She said she wants to focus on the dorm committee.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She said she wants to focus on the dorm committee.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒会役員@「む、なるほどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Council Officer@❝Hmm, I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Council Officer@❝Hmm, I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 委員会辞任届出書はあっさり受理された。
MESSAGE.EN: The committee resignation form was easily accepted.
MESSAGE.Translation: The committee resignation form was easily accepted.

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒会役員@「前から二木さんはがんばりすぎてたと思うから。いいんじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Council Officer@❝Futaki-san, I always thought you had a tendency to overwork yourself. I'm sure this is for the best.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Council Officer@❝Futaki-san, I always thought you had a tendency to overwork yourself. I'm sure this is for the best.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒会役員@「引き継ぎだけはしっかり確認するから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Council Officer@❝I will make sure the transition goes smoothly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Council Officer@❝I will make sure the transition goes smoothly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒会役員@「そのあとで腕章を返還してください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Council Officer@❝Please return the arm band.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Council Officer@❝Please return the arm band.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう言われて生徒会室を出た。
MESSAGE.EN: After being told that, I leave the student council's room.
MESSAGE.Translation: After being told that, I leave the student council's room.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ごめんなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀副委員長の一年生に頭を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: I bow to the freshman disciplinary committee chairman.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bow to the freshman disciplinary committee chairman.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「強権振り回しておいて、こんな放り出しちゃうようなことして、ごめんなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I'm sorry for leaving the responsibilities of the committee like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I'm sorry for leaving the responsibilities of the committee like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 副委員長が黙っているのを見かねたのか、脇から委員たちが言う。
MESSAGE.EN: As if unable to keep watching silently, the prefects around speak up.
MESSAGE.Translation: As if unable to keep watching silently, the prefects around speak up.

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員２@「いいですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 2@❝That's alright.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 2@❝That's alright.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員２@「どのみち、二年の夏過ぎたら、どこの委員長も引退です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 2@❝No matter what, all committee chairmen will retire after the summer of the second year.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 2@❝No matter what, all committee chairmen will retire after the summer of the second year.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員２@「少し早いだけですからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 2@❝This is a bit ahead of schedule, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 2@❝This is a bit ahead of schedule, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員３@「あとはお任せくださいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 3@❝Please leave the rest to us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 3@❝Please leave the rest to us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員４@「寮会のほうでは引き続きがんばってくださいねーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 4@❝Do your best with the dorm committee's work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 4@❝Do your best with the dorm committee's work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「…今までおつかれさまでした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝...Thank you for all your hard work until now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝...Thank you for all your hard work until now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「この間はすみませんでした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝I'm sorry for the other day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝I'm sorry for the other day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…ううん。あなたは悪くない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Ah, that wasn't your fault.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Ah, that wasn't your fault.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「色々無理してたのは私だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝It was all due to me being unreasonable.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝It was all due to me being unreasonable.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ああなるのも、当然だった。自業自得ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝It's natural things turned out that way. I only reap what I sow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝It's natural things turned out that way. I only reap what I sow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ごめんなさい。それから、ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I'm sorry. And, thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I'm sorry. And, thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「さて、次は剣道部へゴー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Alright, now to the kendo club!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Alright, now to the kendo club!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ランニングしていた女子剣道部の主将をつかまえた。
MESSAGE.EN: I catch the captain of the girls' kendo club when she's running.
MESSAGE.Translation: I catch the captain of the girls' kendo club when she's running.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「主将」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Captain.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Captain.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子の主将@「二木さん？　どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Captain@❝Futaki-san? What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Captain@❝Futaki-san? What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子の主将@「ひょっとして、お休みから復帰？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Captain@❝Could it be that you are returning from your break?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Captain@❝Could it be that you are returning from your break?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「いえ、その逆です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝No, it's the opposite.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝No, it's the opposite.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 顧問に退部届を出してきたことを告げる。
MESSAGE.EN: I tell her that I already talked to the club adviser about resigning.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tell her that I already talked to the club adviser about resigning.

MESSAGE.JP: `女子の主将@「そう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Captain@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Captain@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ずるずると入ったままで、ご迷惑お掛けしました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I'm sorry for the trouble I caused for entering half-heartedly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I'm sorry for the trouble I caused for entering half-heartedly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 頭を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: I lower my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I lower my head.

MESSAGE.JP: `女子の主将@「しょうがないわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Captain@❝It can't be helped.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Captain@❝It can't be helped.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子の主将@「それに、二木さん、剣道好きじゃなかったものね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Captain@❝You didn't like kendo either, did you, Futaki-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Captain@❝You didn't like kendo either, did you, Futaki-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 顔を上げると、苦笑している主将がいた。
MESSAGE.EN: When I look up, the captain is smiling wryly.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I look up, the captain is smiling wryly.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うわ、バレバレ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Wow, you got busted.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Wow, you got busted.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…すみません…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...I'm sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...I'm sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子の主将@「いいのよ。気にしないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Captain@❝That's fine. Don't sweat it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Captain@❝That's fine. Don't sweat it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 主将は笑って許してくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: The captain lets me go with a laugh.
MESSAGE.Translation: The captain lets me go with a laugh.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんから相談されていたこと。
MESSAGE.EN: What Haruka-san had asked me to convey to Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: What Haruka-san had asked me to convey to Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 荷を下ろせばいい、と伝えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Please tell her to stop overworking herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Please tell her to stop overworking herself.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんも素直に従ってくれたようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It seems Futaki-san had taken my advice.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seems Futaki-san had taken my advice.

MESSAGE.JP: それを寮長に報告しに来ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: We went to report that to the dorm head.
MESSAGE.Translation: We went to report that to the dorm head.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「思い切ったことをしたわね、三枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Quite a bold step you made, Saigusa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Quite a bold step you made, Saigusa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いやーまー、今まで働きすぎだったんですよ、わが姉は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah, it's nothing, she was working way too hard up till now, that sister of mine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah, it's nothing, she was working way too hard up till now, that sister of mine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「確かにねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Certainly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Certainly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんも同じ意見だったみたいだしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun seems to think so too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun seems to think so too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「時期的にはよかったんじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't the timing good as well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't the timing good as well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「無理が出てたのは明らかだったし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's obvious she is quitting because of overwork.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's obvious she is quitting because of overwork.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「迷惑振りまいて悪かったわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm so sorry for all the trouble I caused.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm so sorry for all the trouble I caused.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「自覚があるのはいいことだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's alright as long as you reflect on it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's alright as long as you reflect on it.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝――!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝――!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは俯いて前髪を弄っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san looked down, twisting her forelocks with a finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san looked down, twisting her forelocks with a finger.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「やられてるわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝He got you there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝He got you there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やられてるねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝He got you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝He got you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「な、なによ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝W-what!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝W-what!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「独りで出来ることは限られてるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There are things you can't do by yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There are things you can't do by yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「自分だけの役割、と気張って潰れるよりもさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rather than wearing yourself out overexerting yourself on your duties,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rather than wearing yourself out overexerting yourself on your duties,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「周りに振るっていうほうがいいと思うな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think it's better to look around for help at those times.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think it's better to look around for help at those times.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうそう。塵も積もれば山となる、とかなんとか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's right. Many a little makes a mickle, or something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's right. Many a little makes a mickle, or something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっとそれは違うんじゃないかな、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's not how the saying goes, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's not how the saying goes, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「えぇー。どこが違うのーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eeh? What did I get wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eeh? What did I get wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちの会話を、どこか困ったような顔をして聞いている二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san looked somewhat troubled, watching our conversation.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san looked somewhat troubled, watching our conversation.

MESSAGE.JP: 時々唇の端が動いているのは、笑ってくれているのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: From time to time the ends of her lips moved, as if about to smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: From time to time the ends of her lips moved, as if about to smile.

MESSAGE.JP: それがとても微笑ましかった。
MESSAGE.EN: That was heartening to see.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was heartening to see.

MESSAGE.JP: とんとん、と書類を揃える音がする。
MESSAGE.EN: Tap, tap. The sound of a pile of papers being arranged.
MESSAGE.Translation: Tap, tap. The sound of a pile of papers being arranged.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あとはコピーすればいいんだっけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I should go and make copies, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I should go and make copies, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そうね。その資料はそれで作業おしまい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That's right. That'll be all for those documents.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That's right. That'll be all for those documents.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「んんーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hnn.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hnn.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 背伸びをした。
MESSAGE.EN: I stretched my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stretched my back.

MESSAGE.JP: 委員会の引継ぎ資料作成も終わりが見えてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: The planning for the committee's succession was about to be done.
MESSAGE.Translation: The planning for the committee's succession was about to be done.

MESSAGE.JP: 学祭用の基礎資料が大部分を占めている。
MESSAGE.EN: They were mostly documents regarding the school festival.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were mostly documents regarding the school festival.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「おつかれさま」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Thanks for your hard work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Thanks for your hard work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんも、おつかれさま」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You too, Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You too, Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: すっかり馴染んでしまった寮長室。
MESSAGE.EN: I've gotten completely used to the dorm heads' room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I've gotten completely used to the dorm heads' room.

MESSAGE.JP: ちなみに男子寮長は推薦面接のため留守。
MESSAGE.EN: By the way, the male dorm head is currently out for an interview.
MESSAGE.Translation: By the way, the male dorm head is currently out for an interview.

MESSAGE.JP: 女子寮長は就活のため大阪へ行ってるのでこれまた留守。
MESSAGE.EN: The female dorm head is also out job hunting in Osaka.
MESSAGE.Translation: The female dorm head is also out job hunting in Osaka.

MESSAGE.JP: 『面接のひとが怖くないといいわねぇ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛I hope the interviewer isn't scary.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛I hope the interviewer isn't scary.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 風呂敷に荷物を包んでにこやかに校門を出て行く寮長をさっき見送ったんだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw the dorm head off at the school gates earlier, as she was holding her belongings wrapped in a piece of cloth...
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw the dorm head off at the school gates earlier, as she was holding her belongings wrapped in a piece of cloth...

MESSAGE.JP: だいじょうぶだろうか、あのひと。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder if she'll be alright.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder if she'll be alright.

MESSAGE.JP: そういうわけで、部屋にいるのは僕と二木さんだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Because of that, Futaki-san and I were the only two people in the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because of that, Futaki-san and I were the only two people in the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「直枝も、物好きね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You're so weird, Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You're so weird, Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何が？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「結局ずっと私の手伝いとか寮会の仕事をしてるじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You ended up helping me with the dorm committee work all this time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You ended up helping me with the dorm committee work all this time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あぁ…そうだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah... That's right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah... That's right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でもデスクワーク、向いてるらしいからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It seems I'm suited for desk work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It seems I'm suited for desk work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…どうして、あなたは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Why are, you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Why are, you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうかした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is something wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is something wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「別に。なんでもないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝No, it's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝No, it's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「気になるよ。訊きたいことがあったら訊いてくれないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm interested. If you want to ask something, go ahead and ask.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm interested. If you want to ask something, go ahead and ask.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…その」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...That.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...That.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「どうして、手伝うの続けてくれたのかな、って思っただけよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It's just that I was wondering, why did you keep helping me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It's just that I was wondering, why did you keep helping me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あれだけ邪険にしたのに、どうして、って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Even though I was that cold toward you, why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Even though I was that cold toward you, why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そう、思っただけよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That's what I was wondering.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That's what I was wondering.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは、僕の目を見て言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san looked into my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san looked into my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「また、どうして、だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This question again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This question again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…そうね。『どうして』ばかりだわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...That's right. Yet another ❛why.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...That's right. Yet another ❛why.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「全然笑えないわね、私…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I can't seem to laugh about it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I can't seem to laugh about it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんを放っておけなかったんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It was because I couldn't leave you alone, Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It was because I couldn't leave you alone, Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「『どうして』？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝❛Why❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝❛Why❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんの質問に、僕は――。
MESSAGE.EN: At Futaki-san's question, I――.
MESSAGE.Translation: At Futaki-san's question, I――.

MESSAGE.JP: 思考が空転した。
MESSAGE.EN: My thoughts raced.
MESSAGE.Translation: My thoughts raced.

MESSAGE.JP: 始まりは恭介のミッションだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was originally one of Kyousuke's missions.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was originally one of Kyousuke's missions.

MESSAGE.JP: 何度か仕事を手伝って、二木さんの素顔を知った。
MESSAGE.EN: After helping her out for a long time, I got to know Futaki-san's honest face.
MESSAGE.Translation: After helping her out for a long time, I got to know Futaki-san's honest face.

MESSAGE.JP: それから葉留佳さんとの関わりも。
MESSAGE.EN: I got involved with Haruka-san after that too.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got involved with Haruka-san after that too.

MESSAGE.JP: …僕に頼んだ葉留佳さんの表情を何故か思い出した。
MESSAGE.EN: ...For some reason, I recalled Haruka-san's expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...For some reason, I recalled Haruka-san's expression.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@『あの通りの性格だけど』
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❛Her personality is as it is, but...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❛Her personality is as it is, but...❜

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@『おねえちゃんのこと、好いてあげてほしいの』
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❛But find it in yourself to like Onee-chan.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❛But find it in yourself to like Onee-chan.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@『嫌わないであげてほしい』
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❛Please don't hate her.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❛Please don't hate her.❜

MESSAGE.JP: どうしてかわからないけれど、葉留佳さんの顔が思い浮かんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't really know why, but Haruka-san's face rose to my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't really know why, but Haruka-san's face rose to my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 心の中の何かが、戸惑っているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Somewhere in my heart, there was a perplexed feeling.
MESSAGE.Translation: Somewhere in my heart, there was a perplexed feeling.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、それがなぜか悲しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: And, somehow, it felt sad.
MESSAGE.Translation: And, somehow, it felt sad.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…あなたはおひとよしだものね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...You sure are kind-hearted.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...You sure are kind-hearted.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんが、唇の端を微かに動かす。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san's lip twitched.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san's lip twitched.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、どこかさみしげで、それでいて儚げな笑みに見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: That smile was as lonely as it was fleeting.
MESSAGE.Translation: That smile was as lonely as it was fleeting.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「よかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm glad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm glad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「もしも…同情とか…それ以外の…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝If... it was something other than... like sympathy or...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝If... it was something other than... like sympathy or...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…それ以外の感情に由来する、って言ったら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...If you said the reason was something other than that,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...If you said the reason was something other than that,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「直枝のこと、大嫌いになるところだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I would have really hated you, Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I would have really hated you, Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それが、正解」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あの子たちに悪いものね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That'd be bad for those girls too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That'd be bad for those girls too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ごめんなさい、答えづらい質問をして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm sorry for asking you such a question.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm sorry for asking you such a question.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「忘れてくれると、嬉しい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Please forget that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Please forget that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは、きっと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That is, surely...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That is, surely...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 始まりは恭介のミッションだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was originally one of Kyousuke's missions.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was originally one of Kyousuke's missions.

MESSAGE.JP: 何度か仕事を手伝って、二木さんの素顔を知った。
MESSAGE.EN: After helping her out for a long time, I got to know Futaki-san's honest face.
MESSAGE.Translation: After helping her out for a long time, I got to know Futaki-san's honest face.

MESSAGE.JP: それから葉留佳さんとの関わりも。
MESSAGE.EN: I got involved with Haruka-san after that too.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got involved with Haruka-san after that too.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、辛いことにずっとずっと独りで耐えてきたこと。
MESSAGE.EN: And all this time, that Futaki-san kept holding onto her painful memories alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: And all this time, that Futaki-san kept holding onto her painful memories alone.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんのこと、好きだから、放っておけなかったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, I couldn't leave you alone, because I like you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, I couldn't leave you alone, because I like you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私、回りくどいの嫌だから、単刀直入に言うけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I hate beating around the bush, so I'll get straight to the point.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I hate beating around the bush, so I'll get straight to the point.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「嫌な子だけど、最初から印象最悪だったんだもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm sure you noticed when you first met me that I'm not a nice person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm sure you noticed when you first met me that I'm not a nice person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「今更、その最悪を超すことはないだろうから、訊くわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And I don't think I've done anything since to change that, so let me ask you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And I don't think I've done anything since to change that, so let me ask you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「他に好きな子がいないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Do you have any other girl you like?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Do you have any other girl you like?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたの『１番』は、他にいないの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Do you have anyone who is your ❛number one❜...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Do you have anyone who is your ❛number one❜...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「いちばん、すきなのは、私じゃないでしょう…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝The one you love the most... isn't me, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝The one you love the most... isn't me, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…好きな子は、いる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I have someone I like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I have someone I like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは俯いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san hung her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san hung her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「じゃあ、その子にそうやって言いなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Then, please go tell that girl that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Then, please go tell that girl that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「きっとその子も直枝のことが好きだろうから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm sure that girl'd like you too, Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm sure that girl'd like you too, Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「大好きだろうから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝She'd probably return your feelings.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝She'd probably return your feelings.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「頷いてくれるだろうから…喜んでくれるだろうから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝She'd probably nod... she'd probably be very glad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝She'd probably nod... she'd probably be very glad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そうやって、言ってあげるといいわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You should go tell her that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You should go tell her that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だから言うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's why I'm saying it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's why I'm saying it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「好きだから…二木さんに言う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝am telling you... Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝am telling you... Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんが、好きなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, I like you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, I like you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんのからだが硬直する。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san's body froze up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san's body froze up.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「な、なに、それっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝W-what's that!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝W-what's that!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「なんで私なのっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Why me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Why me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「こんな最低の…私になにを言ってるの！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝How could you say that... given how horrible I am?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝How could you say that... given how horrible I am?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…それでも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Despite that,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Despite that,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は好きなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I like you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I like you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなこと抜きで…きっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sure... despite all that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sure... despite all that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんを…ひとりでいた二木さんを、助けたかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san... I wanted to help you in your loneliness.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san... I wanted to help you in your loneliness.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ううん。ひとりで抱え込んでいたから、手伝ってあげたかったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No. It's because you were holding it in all by yourself that I wanted to help you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No. It's because you were holding it in all by yourself that I wanted to help you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それだけだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's just that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's just that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「難しいこと、抜きで…ただそれだけなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Without anything complicated... that's all I thought.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Without anything complicated... that's all I thought.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…直枝…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Naoe...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Naoe...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは僕を驚いたように見つめる。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san looked at me with surprise.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san looked at me with surprise.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…おひとよしにも程があるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...There's a limit to being kind-hearted.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...There's a limit to being kind-hearted.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…そんな…言葉を…口に出来るなんて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...To be able to... say... those words...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...To be able to... say... those words...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「最低ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You're the worst.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You're the worst.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…ほんとうに、最低ね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Really, you're the worst...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Really, you're the worst...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いつか言われたことに対する答えだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Someone once asked me what I would do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Someone once asked me what I would do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…落とし穴に落ちかけてるひとがいたら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...if I found someone who had fallen into a pit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...if I found someone who had fallen into a pit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「引っ張り上げたいと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think I'd try to pull them out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think I'd try to pull them out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「一人じゃ無理だったら、誰かに手伝って貰って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If I didn't think I could do it by myself, I'd get help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If I didn't think I could do it by myself, I'd get help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんや、クドや来ヶ谷さんの助力を願ったように。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like how I asked Haruka-san, Kud and Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like how I asked Haruka-san, Kud and Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんは見捨てればいい、って言ったけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, you said to just leave them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, you said to just leave them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなことしない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I can't do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I can't do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それが、僕の答えだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That is my answer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That is my answer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そして、そうする理由のひとつが…その」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And the one reason for that is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And the one reason for that is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕の気持ちなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...how I feel about you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...how I feel about you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…直枝」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はそっと二木さんの頬に手を当てた。
MESSAGE.EN: I softly touched Futaki-san's cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: I softly touched Futaki-san's cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは拒まなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san didn't shift away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san didn't shift away.

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝N...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝N...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 黙って、唇を重ねる。
MESSAGE.EN: Quietly, our lips touched.
MESSAGE.Translation: Quietly, our lips touched.

MESSAGE.JP: 重なっていたのはほんの一瞬だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was only for a brief moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was only for a brief moment.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…よかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I'm glad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I'm glad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なにが？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...About?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...About?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「風紀委員辞めることにしておいて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That I decided to resign from my post in the disciplinary committee.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That I decided to resign from my post in the disciplinary committee.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「でも、もうすぐ辞めるからって、こんなことしてるなんて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝But, to do this just because I'll be quitting soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝But, to do this just because I'll be quitting soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 腕章を触る二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san touched her arm band.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san touched her arm band.

MESSAGE.JP: そう、今はまだ二木さんは風紀委員長なのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's right, Futaki-san was still the chairman of the disciplinary committee.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's right, Futaki-san was still the chairman of the disciplinary committee.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「いい加減ね、私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I sure am bold.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I sure am bold.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「退学ものね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I could get expelled.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I could get expelled.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沈んだ口調で言う二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san said quietly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san said quietly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…まぁ、その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Well, that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Well, that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今までが融通効かなさすぎてたと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think you need to be so rigid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think you need to be so rigid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、これは風紀破りを推奨してるわけじゃなくってさっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I'm not telling you to break the rules or anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I'm not telling you to break the rules or anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんというか…いい加減なところがあったとしてもさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But how should I put this... you are Haruka-san's sister, after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But how should I put this... you are Haruka-san's sister, after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よく考えたら、二木さんは葉留佳さんの姉なわけで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So even if you are a bit of a troublemaker...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So even if you are a bit of a troublemaker...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…二木さんの葉留佳さんっぽいところじゃないかと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I think that's just something you two have in common.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I think that's just something you two have in common.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「上手くやろうと意識しすぎて、失敗するところなんかもそうだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You try so hard to do everything well that you end up stumbling...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You try so hard to do everything well that you end up stumbling...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういうのが素にあるなら、無理に取り繕わなくてもいいんじゃないかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...but since that's a part of what makes you you, I don't think it's something you need to change.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...but since that's a part of what makes you you, I don't think it's something you need to change.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「前も言ったけど、二木さんのいいところは、仕事のことだけじゃないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I've said it before but, working isn't your only good point.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I've said it before but, working isn't your only good point.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは俯いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san hung her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san hung her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 頬が微かに染まっていて…照れているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her cheeks blushed ever so slightly... she looked embarrassed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her cheeks blushed ever so slightly... she looked embarrassed.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「馬鹿」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Stupid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Stupid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…馬鹿ね、直枝は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...You're stupid, Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...You're stupid, Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうかもね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は笑って、受け流してあげた。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned aside with a smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned aside with a smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは立ち上がった。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「お茶、淹れてあげるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'll pour some tea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'll pour some tea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…なに、その顔は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...What's with that face?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...What's with that face?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ううん…ちょっとびっくりしただけだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah no... I was just a bit surprised.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah no... I was just a bit surprised.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「これでも茶道の心得ぐらいあるのよ。初級だけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I also have some knowledge of tea ceremony. Only the basics though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I also have some knowledge of tea ceremony. Only the basics though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そういう意味で驚いたわけじゃないんだけど…まぁ、いいか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wasn't surprised because of that, though... but whatever.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wasn't surprised because of that, though... but whatever.
