MESSAGE.Translation: But still, Haruka-san and Futaki-san are living here now.

MESSAGE.JP: なくなってしまうことより、ずっと、ずっとましだ。
MESSAGE.EN: This is a lot, lot better than not being here at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is a lot, lot better than not being here at all.

MESSAGE.JP: 辛くて、苦しくて、悲しくて、泣きそうでも。
MESSAGE.EN: Even when it was painful, tough, and sad.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even when it was painful, tough, and sad.

MESSAGE.JP: 勝てなくても、負けそうでも。
MESSAGE.EN: Even when there was no way to win.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even when there was no way to win.

MESSAGE.JP: 自分から、諦めたくはなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: They didn't want to give up.
MESSAGE.Translation: They didn't want to give up.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…おひとよしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...You're kind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...You're kind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ほんとうに、あなたはおひとよしだわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Really, you're too kind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Really, you're too kind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「じゃ、約束してくれる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Then, will you promise me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Then, will you promise me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「夏の終わりに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝At the end of summer...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝At the end of summer...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「『いっしょに逃げよう』、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝❛Let's run away together.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝❛Let's run away together.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私の前で…そう言ってくれる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Can you say that in front of me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Can you say that in front of me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私の約束を私のために、守ってくれる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝My promise for my sake, can you keep that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝My promise for my sake, can you keep that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、約束する」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I promise.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I promise.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は再び頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded again.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「まるで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝This is like...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝This is like...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「プロポーズみたいよ、直枝？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝A proposal, Naoe?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝A proposal, Naoe?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そうかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Maybe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Maybe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私なんかに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝To someone like me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝To someone like me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「他の女の子ではなくて？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Not another girl?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Not another girl?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うん。二木さんが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah. Futaki-san is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah. Futaki-san is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんが、僕は好きだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san is the one I love, after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san is the one I love, after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんの微かな笑み。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san smiled warmly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san smiled warmly.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ね、直枝」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Hey, Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Hey, Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「めをつむって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Close your eyes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Close your eyes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そっと優しいキスを二木さんは僕にくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san gave me a gentle kiss.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san gave me a gentle kiss.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やはは。よかったね、おねえちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yahah. Isn't that great, Onee-chan?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yahah. Isn't that great, Onee-chan?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「約束する」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I promise.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I promise.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が言うと、二木さんは立ち止まった。
MESSAGE.EN: As I said that, Futaki-san stopped.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I said that, Futaki-san stopped.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは、笑ってくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: She smiled.
MESSAGE.Translation: She smiled.

MESSAGE.JP: それはとても自然な笑顔だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a very natural smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a very natural smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ありがとう、直枝…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Thank you, Naoe...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Thank you, Naoe...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ありがとう、はるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Thank you, Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Thank you, Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「みんなに、ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Thank you, everyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Thank you, everyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんが、本当の意味で、笑ってくれたようで、嬉しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm glad that Futaki-san is able to truly smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm glad that Futaki-san is able to truly smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が望んでいたのは、こんな二木さんの笑顔だったんだ、と。
MESSAGE.EN: Her smile is what I had been wishing for.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her smile is what I had been wishing for.

MESSAGE.JP: そう思ったのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That's what I thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's what I thought.

MESSAGE.JP: ゆっくりと視界が白濁していく。
MESSAGE.EN: My vision slowly grows blurred.
MESSAGE.Translation: My vision slowly grows blurred.

MESSAGE.JP: どこへゆくのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Where am I going?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where am I going?

MESSAGE.JP: …いや、どこにもゆけないのだ、きっと。
MESSAGE.EN: ...No, I'm not going anywhere, I'm sure.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...No, I'm not going anywhere, I'm sure.

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「…これでよかったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝...Are you fine with this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝...Are you fine with this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「本当に、良かったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Are you truly fine with this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Are you truly fine with this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「さぁ、どうだろうね。私にはわかんないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Well, I'm not really sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Well, I'm not really sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「これでよかったのか、わるかったのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Is this for the best? Or will it make things worse?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Is this for the best? Or will it make things worse?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「初めは、外から眺めていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝At first, I watched from the sidelines.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝At first, I watched from the sidelines.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「声を聞いて、誘いを受けて、見つけた」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝But I heard voices inviting me, so I found my way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝But I heard voices inviting me, so I found my way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「とてもたのしくて、ゆめのような」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝To times that were full of fun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝To times that were full of fun...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Almost like a dream.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Almost like a dream.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「…続けてもよかったのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝...It's okay to keep it going, you know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝...It's okay to keep it going, you know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「終わらせたい、と願っちゃったからね、私」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝But well, I kind of wished for it to come to an end.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝But well, I kind of wished for it to come to an end.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@『…はじめて、もう終わらせたいと…私は思ったんだ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❛...For the first time... I want to put an end to this.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❛...For the first time... I want to put an end to this.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@『…あなたが終わらせたいと言うなら終わらせましょう』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❛...If you say we should end it, then let's end it.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❛...If you say we should end it, then let's end it.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 白い闇。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a blinding white.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a blinding white.

MESSAGE.JP: 目の前には、おねえちゃんが立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Onee-chan was standing in front of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Onee-chan was standing in front of me.

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「…続けることが、最初の願いだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝...At first, I wished to keep going.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝...At first, I wished to keep going.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「居場所をみつけて…だからただ続けばいいと思ってた」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝I had found a place for me... so I just wanted things to continue as they were.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝I had found a place for me... so I just wanted things to continue as they were.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「ただ、それだけだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝That's all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝That's all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「でも、私が本当に願っていたのは」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝But what I really wished for...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝But what I really wished for...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「おねえちゃんと仲直りできる私になりたかったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝I wanted to be able to make up with you, Onee-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝I wanted to be able to make up with you, Onee-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「誰も信じられないまま…誰にも信じて貰えないまま…」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Neither trusting nor being trusted by anyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Neither trusting nor being trusted by anyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「そんなの、嫌だったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝I hated that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝I hated that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「たのしかったなぁ…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝You know, it was fun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝You know, it was fun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「おもしろかったなぁ…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝...and interesting...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝...and interesting...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「にぎやかで、あたたかくて、やさしくて」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝...and noisy, warm, and kind...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝...and noisy, warm, and kind...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「きびしくて、つらくて、かなしくて」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝...and tough, painful, and sad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝...and tough, painful, and sad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「それがとても、とても、すきだったなぁ…っ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Still, I really, really, liked it...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Still, I really, really, liked it...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 視界は白く、白く濁っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: My vision is growing white, becoming hazy.
MESSAGE.Translation: My vision is growing white, becoming hazy.

MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝...That's why, we should return it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝...That's why, we should return it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「そうだよ。『これ』は、私のものじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝That's right. ❛This❜ isn't mine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝That's right. ❛This❜ isn't mine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「みんなのものなの」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝It's everyone's.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝It's everyone's.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「私ひとりじゃ、持っていてはいけないもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝I can't keep it all for myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝I can't keep it all for myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「だから、はるちんはぽいしちゃうのだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝So Haruchin will throw it away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝So Haruchin will throw it away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「グローブの匂いも、グラウンドの土埃も、夕暮れの光も」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝The smell of the gloves, the dust on the ground, the evening light too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝The smell of the gloves, the dust on the ground, the evening light too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「好きなひとの温もりも、友達の優しさも、なにもかも！」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝The warmth of the person I like, the kindness of my friends, everything!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝The warmth of the person I like, the kindness of my friends, everything!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「抱えきれないほどもらったから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝I received so much I couldn't hold it all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝I received so much I couldn't hold it all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「もう、要らないんだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝I don't need any of it anymore!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝I don't need any of it anymore!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …『ふたり』とも、今が続けばいいと願っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The two of us wished for this to keep going forever.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two of us wished for this to keep going forever.

MESSAGE.JP: いつか終わるのだとしても、先が絶望しかないのなら。
MESSAGE.EN: If there is nothing but despair left when  it all comes to an end...
MESSAGE.Translation: If there is nothing but despair left when  it all comes to an end...

MESSAGE.JP: もう進むのは嫌だと思っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I would hate to keep going.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I would hate to keep going.

MESSAGE.JP: ――でも、やっぱり変わらなくちゃ。
MESSAGE.EN: ――But it has to change.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――But it has to change.

MESSAGE.JP: 願いを捨てて――少しあそこは変わることだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: by giving up my wish, something will probably change, even if it's something small.
MESSAGE.Translation: by giving up my wish, something will probably change, even if it's something small.

MESSAGE.JP: 変化の果て、その先に何があるのかは、私には手が届かないことだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Wherever this ultimately leads, I won't be here to see it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Wherever this ultimately leads, I won't be here to see it.

MESSAGE.JP: 『残る』つもりはなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I will not ❛stay.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I will not ❛stay.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 楽しくて、嬉しくて、大好きな日々。
MESSAGE.EN: Those fun, interesting, dear days.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those fun, interesting, dear days.

MESSAGE.JP: 終わらせないと進めないのなら…。
MESSAGE.EN: If I can't move on unless they come to an end....
MESSAGE.Translation: If I can't move on unless they come to an end....

MESSAGE.JP: …進めようと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: ...then I'll put an end it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...then I'll put an end it.

MESSAGE.JP: みんなには何も言わず決めたけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't tell anyone that I had made up my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't tell anyone that I had made up my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 『賛成』だったけど、『反対』になったから。
MESSAGE.EN: My desire to continue became a desire to stop.
MESSAGE.Translation: My desire to continue became a desire to stop.

MESSAGE.JP: 空気が読めないのはいつものことだし。
MESSAGE.EN: I was never one to just go with the flow.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was never one to just go with the flow.

MESSAGE.JP: きまぐれに、脈絡もなく、ただ、進みたいから、決めた。
MESSAGE.EN: For no reason, at a whim, I decided I wanted to move on.
MESSAGE.Translation: For no reason, at a whim, I decided I wanted to move on.

MESSAGE.JP: 自分で決めたことだから…。
MESSAGE.EN: Since I made this decision myself...
MESSAGE.Translation: Since I made this decision myself...

MESSAGE.JP: …悲しくなんかない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It wasn't sad.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It wasn't sad.

MESSAGE.JP: 辛くなんかない。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't painful.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't painful.

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「もう求めないから…望まないから…願わないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝I will let go of what I want... what I hope for... what I wish for.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝I will let go of what I want... what I hope for... what I wish for.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 苦しくなんかない。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't tough.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't tough.

MESSAGE.JP: …それなのに、どうして私は泣いているのだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Still, why was I crying...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Still, why was I crying...

MESSAGE.JP: 私の手に、重ねられる手。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt a hand on top of mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt a hand on top of mine.

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「…ほんとうに、馬鹿ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝...You really are silly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝...You really are silly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: おねえちゃんが私の手を握る。
MESSAGE.EN: Onee-chan was holding my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Onee-chan was holding my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: ほんとうに小さい頃、そうしていたように。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like when we were really young.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like when we were really young.

MESSAGE.JP: 昔から『ふたり』しかいなかったから。
MESSAGE.EN: There has only ever been just the two of us here.
MESSAGE.Translation: There has only ever been just the two of us here.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとの温もりで、自分を確認していたのだと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps because of that, I only knew that that I was truly here because of that warmth.
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps because of that, I only knew that that I was truly here because of that warmth.

MESSAGE.JP: そうでもしないと外の世界と区別があやふやで。
MESSAGE.EN: Otherwise I wouldn't be able to tell here from the outside world.
MESSAGE.Translation: Otherwise I wouldn't be able to tell here from the outside world.

MESSAGE.JP: 満たされることのないまま、大きくなってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: But I had grown up before that wish was ever fulfilled.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I had grown up before that wish was ever fulfilled.

MESSAGE.JP: 手を握ってくれるだけでよかったのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though someone taking my hand would have been enough.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though someone taking my hand would have been enough.

MESSAGE.JP: 手を繋げるだけで良かったのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though just holding hands would have been enough.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though just holding hands would have been enough.

MESSAGE.JP: ――そんなささやかな願いも、また、消えてゆく――。
MESSAGE.EN: ――That simple wish, too, was starting to fade――.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――That simple wish, too, was starting to fade――.

MESSAGE.JP: 何もかも無くなりそうなときに願うこと。
MESSAGE.EN: A wish made when everything was fading.
MESSAGE.Translation: A wish made when everything was fading.

MESSAGE.JP: その願いすら消えていく残酷な世界。
MESSAGE.EN: This cruel world in which that wish itself would disappear.
MESSAGE.Translation: This cruel world in which that wish itself would disappear.

MESSAGE.JP: 無かったものは、消えていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Things that weren't there, disappear.
MESSAGE.Translation: Things that weren't there, disappear.

MESSAGE.JP: 最後に残るのは、最初からあったものだけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The only things that remain are those that were there in the first place.
MESSAGE.Translation: The only things that remain are those that were there in the first place.

MESSAGE.JP: そのときに、理樹くんと鈴ちゃんが決めればいい。
MESSAGE.EN: So when the time comes, it'll be all right for Riki-kun and Rin-chan to decide.
MESSAGE.Translation: So when the time comes, it'll be all right for Riki-kun and Rin-chan to decide.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりならきっとうまくやっていけるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: If it's them, they'll definitely make it.
MESSAGE.Translation: If it's them, they'll definitely make it.

MESSAGE.JP: それに関わるのはお節介が過ぎるというものだった。
MESSAGE.EN: To interfere with that would have been too much.
MESSAGE.Translation: To interfere with that would have been too much.

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「もしも私にまた会ったら」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝If you meet me again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝If you meet me again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「あなたはどうするの」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝What will you do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝What will you do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「もういちど、あやまるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝I will apologize again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝I will apologize again.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝And then?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝And then?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「そのあとのことは、そのときかんがえるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝I'll think about that when the time comes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝I'll think about that when the time comes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「そのあとなんて…ないかもしれないのに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝...Even though it may not?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝...Even though it may not?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「あると信じてるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝I believe it will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝I believe it will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「根拠もなにもないけど、でも、きっと、たぶん、おそらく、めいびー」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝I have no proof, but, I'm sure, probably, perhaps, maybe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝I have no proof, but, I'm sure, probably, perhaps, maybe.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝You are silly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝You are silly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「…ほんとうに…ばかね」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝...Really... silly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝...Really... silly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「私はむつかしいことよくわかんないからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝This is all too difficult for me to understand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝This is all too difficult for me to understand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「…だから、ばいばい、おねえちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝...So, bye-bye, Onee-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝...So, bye-bye, Onee-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「うん…『またね』…はるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Yeah... ❛See you later❜... Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Yeah... ❛See you later❜... Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手を離す。
MESSAGE.EN: Our hands separate.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our hands separate.

MESSAGE.JP: もう握れないと思ったその手を、私は離した。
MESSAGE.EN: I let go, of that hand which I thought I would never hold again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let go, of that hand which I thought I would never hold again.

MESSAGE.JP: 『みんな、あとはがんばれーっ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Do your best, everyone.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Do your best, everyone.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 私は、届くはずのない声援を送った。
MESSAGE.EN: I send an encouragement that shouldn't reach anyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I send an encouragement that shouldn't reach anyone.

MESSAGE.JP: 力の限り。
MESSAGE.EN: With all my strength.
MESSAGE.Translation: With all my strength.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、それだけを、叫んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Just, simply, shouting.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just, simply, shouting.

MESSAGE.JP: ゆっくりと、目を開ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I slowly opened my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I slowly opened my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: その真っ白い風景に、一瞬既視感を覚えた。
MESSAGE.EN: The blinding white I see gives me a sense of deja vu for an instant.
MESSAGE.Translation: The blinding white I see gives me a sense of deja vu for an instant.

MESSAGE.JP: …どこだろう、ここは。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Where am I?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Where am I?

MESSAGE.JP: まとまらない思考はやめにして、微かに頭を傾けた。
MESSAGE.EN: While collecting my thoughts, I weakly turn my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: While collecting my thoughts, I weakly turn my head.

MESSAGE.JP: ベッドに寝ている。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sleeping on a bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sleeping on a bed.

MESSAGE.JP: 包帯で巻かれている自分の腕。
MESSAGE.EN: My arms are wrapped in bandages.
MESSAGE.Translation: My arms are wrapped in bandages.

MESSAGE.JP: その傍らに、見覚えのある髪留め。
MESSAGE.EN: Next to them is a familiar hair tie.
MESSAGE.Translation: Next to them is a familiar hair tie.

MESSAGE.JP: 似た色合いの髪の毛。
MESSAGE.EN: And hair the same color as mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: And hair the same color as mine.

MESSAGE.JP: ふとんに崩れ落ちるように、伏せているひとからは、寝息が聞こえてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: With the blanket about to fall over, I can hear the sleeping breaths of the person watching over me.
MESSAGE.Translation: With the blanket about to fall over, I can hear the sleeping breaths of the person watching over me.

MESSAGE.JP: そのひとは、シーツをきつく握りしめていた。
MESSAGE.EN: That person is holding the sheet tightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: That person is holding the sheet tightly.

MESSAGE.JP: 血の気がなくなるぐらい強く強く握りしめていた。
MESSAGE.EN: In a grip so powerful that her hands had turned pale.
MESSAGE.Translation: In a grip so powerful that her hands had turned pale.

MESSAGE.JP: 言葉にならない。
MESSAGE.EN: Words don't come.
MESSAGE.Translation: Words don't come.

MESSAGE.JP: 言葉にはできない。
MESSAGE.EN: Nothing comes to mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nothing comes to mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 記憶はどこかぼんやりしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: My memory is very hazy.
MESSAGE.Translation: My memory is very hazy.

MESSAGE.JP: 口にしたいことがあるのに、言いたいことがあるのに。
MESSAGE.EN: There is something that I wanted to put into words... something that I wanted to talk about.
MESSAGE.Translation: There is something that I wanted to put into words... something that I wanted to talk about.

MESSAGE.JP: 何も言えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: But I couldn't say anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I couldn't say anything.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうしてだろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wonder why...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wonder why...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 最初にしたのは、だから、そっと髪の毛に触れることだった。
MESSAGE.EN: So the first thing I did was gently touched her hair.
MESSAGE.Translation: So the first thing I did was gently touched her hair.

MESSAGE.JP: そのひとの髪留めに指がふれた途端、言葉が漏れた。
MESSAGE.EN: The moment I touched her hair ties, I found my voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: The moment I touched her hair ties, I found my voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「『ごめんね』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝❛I'm sorry.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝❛I'm sorry.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「『ありがとう』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝❛Thank you.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝❛Thank you.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今見たような、あるいはずっと昔みたような記憶がちかちかと光る。
MESSAGE.EN: A memory that felt at once both ancient and recent flickered through my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: A memory that felt at once both ancient and recent flickered through my head.

MESSAGE.JP: ふと気がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I realized right then.
MESSAGE.Translation: I realized right then.

MESSAGE.JP: もう、黒い気持ちは感じなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I no longer had those dark feelings.
MESSAGE.Translation: I no longer had those dark feelings.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「誰も悪くない、か…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No one meant to be evil.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No one meant to be evil.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 嘘くさい言葉。口にしてみたらほんとうに嘘くさくて笑ってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Those meaningless words. If I spoke them, I would laugh of their silliness.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those meaningless words. If I spoke them, I would laugh of their silliness.

MESSAGE.JP: どんなことにでも、悪意が潜んでいると思いこもうとしていた私。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought there had to be malicious intent.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought there had to be malicious intent.

MESSAGE.JP: でもそうじゃなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: But that was wrong.
MESSAGE.Translation: But that was wrong.

MESSAGE.JP: 悪意しかないわけじゃなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't all malice.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't all malice.

MESSAGE.JP: 私を好きと言ってくれるひとがいた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was someone who said he liked me.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was someone who said he liked me.

MESSAGE.JP: その可能性があった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a possibility.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a possibility.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな欠片の記憶があれば、私は誰だって許せそうな気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: As long as I clung to that hazy memory, I felt I could forgive anyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: As long as I clung to that hazy memory, I felt I could forgive anyone.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだって受け止めて生きていける気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt I could accept everything and keep moving forward no matter what.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt I could accept everything and keep moving forward no matter what.

MESSAGE.JP: 私だけが辛いわけじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: I was not the only one suffering.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was not the only one suffering.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰もが辛いことを抱えている。
MESSAGE.EN: Someone else was also holding in their pain.
MESSAGE.Translation: Someone else was also holding in their pain.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、許そう。
MESSAGE.EN: So I decided to forgive.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I decided to forgive.

MESSAGE.JP: 私を、私以外の誰かを、誰か以外の何もかもを。
MESSAGE.EN: Me, someone other than me, and everyone and everything else.
MESSAGE.Translation: Me, someone other than me, and everyone and everything else.

MESSAGE.JP: ――それが、私のたったひとつ学んだこと。
MESSAGE.EN: ――That is the only thing I learned.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――That is the only thing I learned.

MESSAGE.JP: これは私が得た『強さ』と言っていいんじゃないだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Can I call what I've gained here ❛strength?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Can I call what I've gained here ❛strength?❜

MESSAGE.JP: この欠片があれば…どんなことがあっても。
MESSAGE.EN: With this fragment of memory... no matter what happens.
MESSAGE.Translation: With this fragment of memory... no matter what happens.

MESSAGE.JP: 悪意にぶつかって絶望することなんかない。
MESSAGE.EN: I won't despair because I face evil.
MESSAGE.Translation: I won't despair because I face evil.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（私は、私のままでいいから）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(It's all right to be myself.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(It's all right to be myself.)

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（誰かの代わりになれないことに、絶望しなくていい）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(I won't despair over not replacing someone else.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(I won't despair over not replacing someone else.)

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（誰かのせいにしない）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(I won't blame anyone.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(I won't blame anyone.)

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（誰かが悪いと決めつけたりしない）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(I won't make anyone out to be evil.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(I won't make anyone out to be evil.)

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（それが…『誰も悪くない』世界だってことだと、思う）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(I'd like to believe in a world where no one acts with malice.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(I'd like to believe in a world where no one acts with malice.)

MESSAGE.JP: 生まれてきてしまったんだもの、俯いたままじゃ、つまんない。
MESSAGE.EN: It'd be a waste to spend your entire life looking down.
MESSAGE.Translation: It'd be a waste to spend your entire life looking down.

MESSAGE.JP: 顔を上げて、前を向いて。
MESSAGE.EN: Lift your face, and look forward.
MESSAGE.Translation: Lift your face, and look forward.

MESSAGE.JP: いつの日か、好きなひとたちから、みんなから、必要とされるよう、がんばろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Someday, the person you like, everyone, will need you, so try your best.
MESSAGE.Translation: Someday, the person you like, everyone, will need you, so try your best.

MESSAGE.JP: 目を閉じる。
MESSAGE.EN: I close my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I close my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: さぁ、これから、何をしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, what should I do from now on?
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, what should I do from now on?

MESSAGE.JP: ゆっくり、考えることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: Slowly I think.
MESSAGE.Translation: Slowly I think.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…確認するね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...A final check.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...A final check.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 商店街の中にホテルがある。
MESSAGE.EN: There's a hotel in the shopping district.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's a hotel in the shopping district.

MESSAGE.JP: 駅前のホテルとどちらが格式が高いのはわからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It might be a higher class one than the station-front hotel.
MESSAGE.Translation: It might be a higher class one than the station-front hotel.

MESSAGE.JP: そのホテルで、二木さんの学園生活が終止符を打たれる…予定だ。
MESSAGE.EN: At that hotel, Futaki-san's school life will end... or so it's planned.
MESSAGE.Translation: At that hotel, Futaki-san's school life will end... or so it's planned.

MESSAGE.JP: 広場で僕たちは最後の打ち合せをしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: We had our last meeting in the market square.
MESSAGE.Translation: We had our last meeting in the market square.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…みんな、見て」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Everyone look.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Everyone look.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 地図を広げる。
MESSAGE.EN: I spread open the map.
MESSAGE.Translation: I spread open the map.

MESSAGE.JP: ホテルのフロアの見取り図。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a sketch of the hotel floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a sketch of the hotel floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 周辺の地図。
MESSAGE.EN: And the surrounding area.
MESSAGE.Translation: And the surrounding area.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ここが非常階段。非常ベルを鳴らすと、自動的にシャッターが降りる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is the emergency exit. When the emergency bell rings, the automatic shutters will close.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is the emergency exit. When the emergency bell rings, the automatic shutters will close.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「階段はこことここ。非常ベルに連動してエレベーターは止まる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The stairs are here and here. The elevator will stop when the alarm rings.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The stairs are here and here. The elevator will stop when the alarm rings.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ルートは固定されるわけだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝The route would be fixed then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝The route would be fixed then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あたしはどっち行けばいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Where should I go?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Where should I go?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴は恭介と一緒に非常階段。で、僕と二木さんは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin will be with Kyousuke at the fire exit. So Futaki-san and I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin will be with Kyousuke at the fire exit. So Futaki-san and I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「階段方面ですね。つまりエレベーター」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝In the direction of the stair. In other words, the elevator.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝In the direction of the stair. In other words, the elevator.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん、科学部部長に頼んだものは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, the thing we asked from the science club?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, the thing we asked from the science club?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「もらってきてます。機械室の基盤に取り付ければいいんですよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I have it. I only need to install it in the machine room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I have it. I only need to install it in the machine room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ストレルカ、ヴェルカ、がんばってくださいー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Strelka, Belka, do your best.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Strelka, Belka, do your best.❞

MESSAGE.JP: オン。
MESSAGE.EN: Woof.
MESSAGE.Translation: Woof.

MESSAGE.JP: ヴァウ。
MESSAGE.EN: Grr.
MESSAGE.Translation: Grr.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんのボディガードよろしく２匹の犬たちが返事をする。
MESSAGE.EN: The two bodyguards of Nishizono-san replied.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two bodyguards of Nishizono-san replied.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが止まったエレベーターを強制的に使用可能にする装置をつける。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san will install the device that forces the stopped elevator to move.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san will install the device that forces the stopped elevator to move.

MESSAGE.JP: 非常階段には身代わりを。
MESSAGE.EN: Leave the stand-in by the fire escape.
MESSAGE.Translation: Leave the stand-in by the fire escape.

MESSAGE.JP: それから、逃走経路の確保。
MESSAGE.EN: From there, we'll secure our escape route.
MESSAGE.Translation: From there, we'll secure our escape route.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「クーちゃんと私でタクシーのとこで待ってればいいんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Is it alright for Kuu-chan and I to hold the taxi?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Is it alright for Kuu-chan and I to hold the taxi?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「同乗者のひとまちのふり、ちゃんとできるでしょうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I wonder if I can pretend to be a normal passenger...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I wonder if I can pretend to be a normal passenger...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「だいじょーぶ！　ふたりで練習したから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝You'll be fine!　We practiced.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝You'll be fine!　We practiced.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そ、そうですよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝T-that's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝T-that's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「恭介氏たちは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What about Kyousuke and the rest?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What about Kyousuke and the rest?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もう潜入済みだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They've probably entered already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They've probably entered already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「きょーすけはあの黒いすーつとかいう服、どこから持ってきたんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Where did Kyousuke get that black suit-like thing from?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Where did Kyousuke get that black suit-like thing from?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「恭介さんは就職活動のために手配したとかいってたけど？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I think he said he got that for his job hunting or something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I think he said he got that for his job hunting or something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんでもありだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Anything goes for him...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Anything goes for him...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「私と謙吾少年と真人少年でひっかきまわせばいいのだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Young men Kengo and Masato and I will create a ruckus, alright?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Young men Kengo and Masato and I will create a ruckus, alright?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そのすきに二木女史をかっさらう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Using the opening, grab Miss Futaki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Using the opening, grab Miss Futaki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういうことになるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's the plan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's the plan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 分担を確認する。
MESSAGE.EN: We confirmed our roles.
MESSAGE.Translation: We confirmed our roles.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「それにしても少年、計画を立てているときは楽しそうだったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I must note though, you really seemed to enjoy drawing up this plan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I must note though, you really seemed to enjoy drawing up this plan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そう？　そうかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Really? You may be right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Really? You may be right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介もいつもこんな気持ちだったのかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder if Kyousuke always felt like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder if Kyousuke always felt like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何かを企むってすっごく楽しいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's really fun to scheme something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's really fun to scheme something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんか爽やかに笑ってるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's a refreshing smile.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's a refreshing smile.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「すごくにこにこだねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝You're really beaming.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝You're really beaming.❞

MESSAGE.JP: メールがきた。
MESSAGE.EN: A text came.
MESSAGE.Translation: A text came.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介からだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was from Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was from Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 『そろそろ開始時間だぜ。用意はいいか？』
MESSAGE.EN: [It's almost time. Are the preparations alright?]
MESSAGE.Translation: [It's almost time. Are the preparations alright?]

MESSAGE.JP: うん。そっちはどう？
MESSAGE.EN: Yeah. How about you?
MESSAGE.Translation: Yeah. How about you?

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介たちに返信する。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke replied.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke replied.

MESSAGE.JP: 『ok』
MESSAGE.EN: [ok].
MESSAGE.Translation: [ok].

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介に続いて、真人から。
MESSAGE.EN: After Kyousuke, it was Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: After Kyousuke, it was Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 『いつでもこい！』
MESSAGE.EN: [Come whenever!]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Come whenever!]

MESSAGE.JP: そして謙吾から。
MESSAGE.EN: And Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: And Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: 『任せておけ』
MESSAGE.EN: [Leave it to us]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Leave it to us]

MESSAGE.JP: 携帯を閉じた。
MESSAGE.EN: I closed the cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I closed the cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、はじめよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, shall we start?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, shall we start?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ミッションスタート！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Mission Start!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Mission Start!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `みんな@「お
MESSAGE.EN: `Everyone@❝O
MESSAGE.Translation: `Everyone@❝O

MESSAGE.JP: ～け～！」「わかった！」「ラジャー！」「わかりました」「了解した」「オン！」「ヴァウ～」
MESSAGE.EN: ～kay～!❞ ❝Got it!❞ ❝Roger!❞ ❝Understood.❞ ❝Gotcha.❞ ❝Woof!❞ ❝Grr～❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ～kay～!❞ ❝Got it!❞ ❝Roger!❞ ❝Understood.❞ ❝Gotcha.❞ ❝Woof!❞ ❝Grr～❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちは駆けだした。
MESSAGE.EN: We moved out.
MESSAGE.Translation: We moved out.

MESSAGE.JP: 暗がりに潜みながら会話を聞く。
MESSAGE.EN: I hear a conversation while hiding in the darkness.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hear a conversation while hiding in the darkness.

MESSAGE.JP: どちらの家の多数も、飽いているのに、誰も一部の強硬派を止めようとしない。
MESSAGE.EN: People who are feeling fed up are in the majority, in either families, but they won't try to stop the few hardliners.
MESSAGE.Translation: People who are feeling fed up are in the majority, in either families, but they won't try to stop the few hardliners.

MESSAGE.JP: きっかけが必要なのです、と大人たちは言った。
MESSAGE.EN: We need an opportunity, said the adults.
MESSAGE.Translation: We need an opportunity, said the adults.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝と、二木の大人たちはそう言った。
MESSAGE.EN: The adults from the Saigusa family, and Futaki were speaking.
MESSAGE.Translation: The adults from the Saigusa family, and Futaki were speaking.

MESSAGE.JP: きっかけが欲しい。
MESSAGE.EN: We want an opportunity.
MESSAGE.Translation: We want an opportunity.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰もがそう思っているのに誰も動けない。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone thinks that, but nobody is moving.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone thinks that, but nobody is moving.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんと、二木さんは、ふたりだけだったから縛られていた。
MESSAGE.EN: They could not act before because it was just Haruka-san and Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: They could not act before because it was just Haruka-san and Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、葉留佳さんと二木さんはもう『ふたりだけ』じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: But it's no longer ❛just the two❜ of them.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it's no longer ❛just the two❜ of them.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちがいる。
MESSAGE.EN: We are here.
MESSAGE.Translation: We are here.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちで、そのきっかけとやらを作ってしまえばいい。
MESSAGE.EN: We just need to create that opportunity for them.
MESSAGE.Translation: We just need to create that opportunity for them.

MESSAGE.JP: 大人たちが出来ないのなら、大人になる前に、僕たちは行動すべきだった。
MESSAGE.EN: If the adults can't do it, before becoming adults ourselves, we must do it.
MESSAGE.Translation: If the adults can't do it, before becoming adults ourselves, we must do it.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わずかな光しかない暗がりの中、身近にいる温もりがそっと訊ねてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: In the faint light, a voice came from the nearby warmth.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the faint light, a voice came from the nearby warmth.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ほんとによかったのかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Was it really okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Was it really okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何が？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だって、こんなことにみんなを巻き込んじゃってさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, to get everyone involved in this mess.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, to get everyone involved in this mess.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「むしろ進んで協力してくれてるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rather, it's us volunteering to help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rather, it's us volunteering to help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だって、僕たちは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Since, we are...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Since, we are...❞

MESSAGE.JP: リトルバスターズ、だからね。
MESSAGE.EN: The Little Busters, after all.
MESSAGE.Translation: The Little Busters, after all.

MESSAGE.JP: 口にしなくても、葉留佳さんには伝わったようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if I didn't say it, it seems Haruka-san understood.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if I didn't say it, it seems Haruka-san understood.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あはは。そうだったね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahaha, that's right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahaha, that's right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…仲間って認めてくれて、ありがとね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Thanks for accepting me as a comrade.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Thanks for accepting me as a comrade.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小さく呟く葉留佳さんに、僕は何も答えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't answer Haruka-san's gentle whisper.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't answer Haruka-san's gentle whisper.

MESSAGE.JP: そんなこと、当たり前だったから。
MESSAGE.EN: Since that was an obvious thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since that was an obvious thing.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、僕たちがしようとしていること。
MESSAGE.EN: And, what we had been aiming for.
MESSAGE.Translation: And, what we had been aiming for.

MESSAGE.JP: 改めて自分の考えたことを思い起こす。
MESSAGE.EN: I recalled my idea once again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I recalled my idea once again.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんの相手との顔見合わせ。
MESSAGE.EN: To meet face-to-face with Futaki-san's partner.
MESSAGE.Translation: To meet face-to-face with Futaki-san's partner.

MESSAGE.JP: もう決まり切った過程をぶちこわしてやれ。
MESSAGE.EN: Destroy their plan.
MESSAGE.Translation: Destroy their plan.

MESSAGE.JP: 奪うつもり満々の世界に、それは誰の物でもない、と宣言してやれ。
MESSAGE.EN: To declare to them that no one belongs to another in this world full of ❛taking.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: To declare to them that no one belongs to another in this world full of ❛taking.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らは僕らだけのものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: We only belong to ourselves.
MESSAGE.Translation: We only belong to ourselves.

MESSAGE.JP: やがて来る過酷のためにも。
MESSAGE.EN: Confronted by the harsh reality to come.
MESSAGE.Translation: Confronted by the harsh reality to come.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちは僕たちの未来の手綱を取り返すんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: We are taking back control over our future.
MESSAGE.Translation: We are taking back control over our future.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そろそろ、二木さんがくる時間かな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's about time for Futaki-san to come...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's about time for Futaki-san to come...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ねぇ、理樹くん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey, Riki-kun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey, Riki-kun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん？　なに、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes? What, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes? What, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…あのね…わた、私…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...About that... I-I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...About that... I-I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「言わなくちゃ…ずっと言わなくちゃって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Got something to say... that I've wanted to say...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Got something to say... that I've wanted to say...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「こんなときになるまで…言えないなんて、臆病すぎるけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝For me... not to say this until now, I'm a coward, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝For me... not to say this until now, I'm a coward, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも、私は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Still, I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Still, I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…私は…理樹くんのことが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I... Riki-kun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I... Riki-kun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だから、私…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I mean I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I mean I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 薄暗いそこで葉留佳さんは瞳を閉じたようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It seems Haruka-san had closed her eyes in this faint darkness.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seems Haruka-san had closed her eyes in this faint darkness.

MESSAGE.JP: 小さく震えている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was trembling a little.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was trembling a little.

MESSAGE.JP: そっと唇を重ねた。
MESSAGE.EN: I softly put our lips together.
MESSAGE.Translation: I softly put our lips together.

MESSAGE.JP: 見開かれた葉留佳さんの瞳。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san opened her eyes widely.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san opened her eyes widely.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ん…、理樹、くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Nn..., Riki... -kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Nn..., Riki... -kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「続きはまたあとでね、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We'll continue later, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We'll continue later, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん…ありがと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yeah... thank you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yeah... thank you...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝N...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝N...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そっと葉留佳さんの頬を撫でた。
MESSAGE.EN: I gently pat her cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gently pat her cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はそっと葉留佳さんの頭を撫でた。
MESSAGE.EN: I gently patted her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gently patted her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…理樹くん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Riki-kun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Riki-kun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 触れた途端、葉留佳さんは目を見開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: The moment I touched her, Haruka-san opened her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: The moment I touched her, Haruka-san opened her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の意図を、察して、息をのむ葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: As if she read my intentions, Haruka-san swallowed.
MESSAGE.Translation: As if she read my intentions, Haruka-san swallowed.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…おねえちゃんを、よろしくね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Please take care of, Onee-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Please take care of, Onee-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは、笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was smiling.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was smiling.

MESSAGE.JP: 笑いながら、瞳からころん、と雫が一粒落ちた。
MESSAGE.EN: While smiling, a droplet fell from her eye.
MESSAGE.Translation: While smiling, a droplet fell from her eye.

MESSAGE.JP: ごめん、とは言わなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't apologize.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't apologize.

MESSAGE.JP: 『二木さんを好いてほしい』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Please like Futaki-san.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Please like Futaki-san.❜

MESSAGE.JP: それも葉留佳さんの願いだということを、僕はいつかどこかで知っていたから。
MESSAGE.EN: That was Haruka-san's wish. Somewhere inside me, I've already known that.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was Haruka-san's wish. Somewhere inside me, I've already known that.

MESSAGE.JP: ぶる、と携帯が１回震えた。
MESSAGE.EN: *Brr*, the cellphone vibrated.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Brr*, the cellphone vibrated.

MESSAGE.JP: 時間だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It's time.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's time.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんが入ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san entered.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san entered.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いくよ、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's go, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's go, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おねえちゃん!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 俯いていた二木さんは驚きの表情を浮かべる。
MESSAGE.EN: A surprised expression came over Futaki-san's dejected face.
MESSAGE.Translation: A surprised expression came over Futaki-san's dejected face.

MESSAGE.JP: その瞬間、ぱんぱんぱん！　と音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: At that moment, *boom*, *boom*.
MESSAGE.Translation: At that moment, *boom*, *boom*.

MESSAGE.JP: ねずみ花火やら色々な花火が盛大に撒かれた音。
MESSAGE.EN: Fireworks went off in all directions.
MESSAGE.Translation: Fireworks went off in all directions.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「少年」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Young man.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Young man.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ソファを軽やかに飛び越した来ヶ谷さんが煙幕筒をいくつか投げる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san lightly leaped over the sofa and threw several cylinders spilling smoke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san lightly leaped over the sofa and threw several cylinders spilling smoke.

MESSAGE.JP: 煙幕が効くのはわずか数分。
MESSAGE.EN: It takes only a few moments for the smoke screen to start working.
MESSAGE.Translation: It takes only a few moments for the smoke screen to start working.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕と葉留佳さんは走る。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san and I ran.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san and I ran.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「かなたっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Kanata!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Kanata!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 驚いた大人たちが僕たちを取り押さえようとする。
MESSAGE.EN: The surprised adults tried to stop us.
MESSAGE.Translation: The surprised adults tried to stop us.

MESSAGE.JP: ぶんっ、と何かが振り下ろされる音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: *Thud*, a sound of someone falling down.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Thud*, a sound of someone falling down.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は屈む。
MESSAGE.EN: I crouched.
MESSAGE.Translation: I crouched.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato!❞

MESSAGE.JP: いけよ、理樹！　と叫び声が聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear his voice saying ❛Go, Riki!❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear his voice saying ❛Go, Riki!❜

MESSAGE.JP: 伸ばされる腕を、電気スタンドの柄が払う。
MESSAGE.EN: His extended arm was holding the handle of a desk lamp.
MESSAGE.Translation: His extended arm was holding the handle of a desk lamp.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謙吾っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kengo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kengo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 返事は、ひゅん、という風切り音。
MESSAGE.EN: The reply was the whoosh of cutting air.
MESSAGE.Translation: The reply was the whoosh of cutting air.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、打撃音。
MESSAGE.EN: And a sound of impact.
MESSAGE.Translation: And a sound of impact.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ふたりともありがとねーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Thanks, you two.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Thanks, you two.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あ、あなたたち、なんてことを…っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Y-you guys, what are you doi...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Y-you guys, what are you doi...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「大立ち回りだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝There's a big fight out there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝There's a big fight out there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「どうしてあなたが待合室に居るのかと思ったら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What are you doing in the waiting room...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What are you doing in the waiting room...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「これは棗先輩の計画ですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Is this Natsume-senpai's plan?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Is this Natsume-senpai's plan?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そのとおり、と言いたいところだが、残念ながら違う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I want to say yes, but it wouldn't be true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I want to say yes, but it wouldn't be true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹と三枝さ。首謀者はな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki and Saigusa are the masterminds.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki and Saigusa are the masterminds.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よう、理樹。二木には誰も触ってないぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yo, Riki. Nobody touched Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yo, Riki. Nobody touched Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺の名にかけて、二木は無事だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I swear on my name she's unharmed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I swear on my name she's unharmed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがとう恭介。鈴！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks, Kyousuke, Rin!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks, Kyousuke, Rin!❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Nn!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Nn!❞

MESSAGE.JP: びしりと構えた鈴は、飛んできた誰かの靴をたたき落としたところだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin stiffened up for a second, the sound of someone's shoes falling could be heard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin stiffened up for a second, the sound of someone's shoes falling could be heard.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「身代わりお願いするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll entrust you to be the substitute.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll entrust you to be the substitute.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「了解」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Gotcha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Gotcha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう言いながら髪のリボンに手を掛ける鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin replied while holding a ribbon in her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin replied while holding a ribbon in her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃいこうか鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Shall we go, Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Shall we go, Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「嫌だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「……なっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝......Wha!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝......Wha!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「といいたいところだが、はるかのためだ。行ってやる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝... Is what I wanted to say, but it's for Haruka. I'll go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝... Is what I wanted to say, but it's for Haruka. I'll go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「やれやれ、成長したな、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oh my, you've grown, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh my, you've grown, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は鈴の頭を軽くなで、それから僕を見た。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke patted Rin's head lightly, and looked at us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke patted Rin's head lightly, and looked at us.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「後始末は任せろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Leave the rest to us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Leave the rest to us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…棗先輩」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Natsume-senpai.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Natsume-senpai.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なんだ、二木」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What is it, Futaki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What is it, Futaki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…色々、ひどいことを言ったような気がする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I've said various horrible things, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I've said various horrible things, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ごめんなさい。それから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm sorry, and...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm sorry, and...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…感謝してる。本当に。心から」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I'm grateful. From the bottom of my heart. Really.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I'm grateful. From the bottom of my heart. Really.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二言三言、二木さんが呟く。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san mumbled a few words.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san mumbled a few words.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「気にするな。お互い様だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Don't mind that. I feel the same.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Don't mind that. I feel the same.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は軽く笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke smiled impishly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke smiled impishly.

MESSAGE.JP: なんでもないお安い御用さ、とでも言うような笑み。
MESSAGE.EN: A smile that was saying this much is nothing.
MESSAGE.Translation: A smile that was saying this much is nothing.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹、またあとでな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝See you later, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝See you later, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それだけ言うと恭介は鈴と共に煙幕の向こうに消えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke said that and disappeared into the smoke screen with Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke said that and disappeared into the smoke screen with Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おねえちゃん、行こうっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan, let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Onee-chan, let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんの手を取りながら走りだす。
MESSAGE.EN: I ran while taking Futaki-san's hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ran while taking Futaki-san's hands.

MESSAGE.JP: あぁ、いつだったか、こうして走った気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, I feel I ran like this before.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, I feel I ran like this before.

MESSAGE.JP: あのときも、誰かから逃げていたような。
MESSAGE.EN: That time too, we were running from someone.
MESSAGE.Translation: That time too, we were running from someone.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「葉留佳、あなたはなんてことを…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Haruka, what are you doin...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Haruka, what are you doin...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だって、しょうがないじゃん！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It can't be helped!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It can't be helped!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「『終わりにしようと思った』んだからっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Since I thought ❛Let's end this❜!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Since I thought ❛Let's end this❜!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「馬鹿ね…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You're an idiot...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You're an idiot...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…ほんとうに、馬鹿ね…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Really, an idiot...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Really, an idiot...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「行こう、おねえちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Let's go, Onee-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Let's go, Onee-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 非常ベルの音がけたたましくなっている。
MESSAGE.EN: The fire alarm made a shrill noise.
MESSAGE.Translation: The fire alarm made a shrill noise.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちはエレベーターホールへ向けて走る。
MESSAGE.EN: We ran toward the elevator.
MESSAGE.Translation: We ran toward the elevator.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、走った。
MESSAGE.EN: We just ran.
MESSAGE.Translation: We just ran.

MESSAGE.JP: 寝ころんでいる葉留佳さんを見てため息をつく二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san sighed after looking at Haruka-san who was lying down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san sighed after looking at Haruka-san who was lying down.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…でも、ほんとに、どうするのよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...But, seriously, what are we doing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...But, seriously, what are we doing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 途方にくれたように体操座りをした二木さんが呟く。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san whispered at a loss, while squatting down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san whispered at a loss, while squatting down.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「学校のこととかあるのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Even though you have school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Even though you have school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「休学届けはもう３人分出してきたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝We already handed in the temporary absence form for the three of us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝We already handed in the temporary absence form for the three of us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あと、これこれ。当座のお金」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And, here. Money for now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And, here. Money for now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あいはぶお金！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ai habu money!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ai habu money!❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Wha!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Wha!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんだけのお金じゃないからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not just Haruka-san's money.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not just Haruka-san's money.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 苦笑しながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: I said, smiling wryly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said, smiling wryly.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うぃーはぶお金！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Wii habu money!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Wii habu money!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「言い直さなくていいからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You don't have to say that again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You don't have to say that again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「まぁ、それはともかくとして…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, anyway, for now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, anyway, for now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「半年ぐらい時間をおいて戻ればいいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It'll be alright if we wait for half a year before coming back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It'll be alright if we wait for half a year before coming back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「両親ズも了承済みなのですヨ。色々貰ったんだよん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Our parents also agreed. We got various things from them too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Our parents also agreed. We got various things from them too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「もちろんきちんと出世払いね！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Of course, I'll properly pay them back!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Of course, I'll properly pay them back!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「借用書もここに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝We owe them this much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝We owe them this much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんも押印済！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There's also Riki-kun's stamp!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There's also Riki-kun's stamp!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…直枝、あなた…このアホの子に合わせてあげなくてもいいのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Naoe, you... you didn't have to go along with this stupid kid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Naoe, you... you didn't have to go along with this stupid kid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんの目が笑ってない。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san's eyes were not smiling.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san's eyes were not smiling.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「むかーっ！　はるちんアホの子じゃないぞっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Muka-! Haruchin is not a stupid kid!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Muka-! Haruchin is not a stupid kid!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやまぁ…葉留佳さんなりに真剣なんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah well... Haruka-san is serious in her own way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah well... Haruka-san is serious in her own way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「つっこまないであげてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Please don't reply to her jokes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Please don't reply to her jokes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くん、アホの子発言も否定してよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, deny that I'm a stupid kid!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, deny that I'm a stupid kid!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そいうわけだから、わかってあげて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's why, please understand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's why, please understand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「スルーされた!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm being ignored?!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm being ignored?!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ね、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うう…はるちんはアホの子じゃないやい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uu... Haruchin is not a stupid kid...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uu... Haruchin is not a stupid kid...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、それはわかったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I know that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I know that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…むう…まぁいいけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Muu... well, it's fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Muu... well, it's fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今回のことは親戚のひとたちのほとんども賛成してくれたし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝This time most of our relatives also approve of it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝This time most of our relatives also approve of it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ま、私たちをいじめてたやつらは、あとで告発してやるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝As for the people who bullied us, I'll report them to police later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝As for the people who bullied us, I'll report them to police later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「父上が入ったのと、同じ場所で頭冷やしてくればいいのですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝They should cool their heads in the same place our father was in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝They should cool their heads in the same place our father was in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「改心したらはるちんは許してやらんこともない！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If they reform their wicked ways, there's nothing Haruchin can't forgive!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If they reform their wicked ways, there's nothing Haruchin can't forgive!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは快活に言い切った。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san spoke her resolution clearly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san spoke her resolution clearly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ま、そういうわけだから、諦めてよ二木さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's how things are, so give up already, Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's how things are, so give up already, Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…仲直りしたい、と言ってきたかと思ったら、いきなり奪いにくるなんて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Just as I thought you wanted to make up with me, you come and kidnap me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Just as I thought you wanted to make up with me, you come and kidnap me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「どうかしてるんじゃないの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What's wrong with you...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What's wrong with you...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 携帯が立て続けに着信音を鳴らす。
MESSAGE.EN: My cellphone gave several ring tones in succession.
MESSAGE.Translation: My cellphone gave several ring tones in succession.

MESSAGE.JP: 画面をみてから、葉留佳さんに渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at the screen and handed it to Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at the screen and handed it to Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あはは！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahaha!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahaha!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんに見せる葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san looked at Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san looked at Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…あなたたちは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You two...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You two...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ほんとうに、馬鹿ばっかりだわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...really are just idiots.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...really are just idiots.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みんなからのメール。
MESSAGE.EN: There were texts from everyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were texts from everyone.

MESSAGE.JP: そのどれもが同じだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Every one of them was the same.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every one of them was the same.

MESSAGE.JP: 『がんばれー！』
MESSAGE.EN: [Do your best!]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Do your best!]

MESSAGE.JP: 一時的な逃避行。
MESSAGE.EN: A temporary escape.
MESSAGE.Translation: A temporary escape.

MESSAGE.JP: 戻ったら戻ったで、苦難は続くだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Even after we come back, the hardships will continue.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even after we come back, the hardships will continue.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、葉留佳さんと二木さんが手を取り合えば、悲しいことを無くすことは可能だろう。
MESSAGE.EN: But as long as Haruka-san and Futaki-san's hands are joined, that sadness may go away.
MESSAGE.Translation: But as long as Haruka-san and Futaki-san's hands are joined, that sadness may go away.

MESSAGE.JP: 長い時間をかけて。
MESSAGE.EN: It'll take a long time.
MESSAGE.Translation: It'll take a long time.

MESSAGE.JP: ゆっくりと。
MESSAGE.EN: Let's take it slowly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Let's take it slowly.

MESSAGE.JP: 時間は無限ではないけれど、繰り返しの時間より短いけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: Our time is not unlimited, and it may be shorter than those repeating days, yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our time is not unlimited, and it may be shorter than those repeating days, yet.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも、何かを成すには、長すぎる時間だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, for something to happen, there is time a-plenty.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, for something to happen, there is time a-plenty.

MESSAGE.JP: 振り仰ぐ空は、どこまでも青かった。
MESSAGE.EN: As I look up, the blue sky continues everywhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I look up, the blue sky continues everywhere.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どこへ行こうかなぁ。あったかいところがいいなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Where shall we go? A warm place would be nice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Where shall we go? A warm place would be nice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あー、バイトしよ、バイト」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah, let's work part time, part time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah, let's work part time, part time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「オムレツ・$K76オムライス$K0専門店なんかどうかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝How about at an $K76omelette rice$K0 shop?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝How about at an $K76omelette rice$K0 shop?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「まかないごはん美味しそうだし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I bet the staff meals are delicious there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I bet the staff meals are delicious there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 脳天気なことを呟いている葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was chatting merrily.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was chatting merrily.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あのね、はるか…そんなことより考えることが沢山あるでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Hey Haruka... Aren't there more important things to think about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Hey Haruka... Aren't there more important things to think about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: それを見て二木さんは呆れている。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san already looked tired.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san already looked tired.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いやぁ、はっはっは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, hahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, hahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「笑って誤魔化さないの！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Don't laugh it off!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Don't laugh it off!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ほんとうに、ばかね！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You really are an idiot!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You really are an idiot!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「しょうがないよ、だっておねえちゃんの妹だもん！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It can't be helped. I'm Onee-chan's sister after all!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It can't be helped. I'm Onee-chan's sister after all!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私は関係ないでしょう私は!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That has nothing to do with me, does it!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That has nothing to do with me, does it!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やははー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yahahaー.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yahahaー.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 姉妹の賑やかな声を聞きながら、僕はずっと青空を見上げていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Listening to the sisters' laughter, I looked up at the blue sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: Listening to the sisters' laughter, I looked up at the blue sky.

SELECT.JP: 好きだから$d答えられない
SELECT.EN: Because I like you$dI can't answer
SELECT.Translation: Because I like you$dI can't answer

SELECT.JP: キスをする$dキスをしない
